T03n1146u_001:4: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṅgatāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:8: maitreyeṇa dayāvatā bhagavatā netuṃ svayaṃ sarvathā |
T03n1146u_001:24: vyākhyāṃ tena parāṃ sadarthaviṣayāṃ kartuṃ samabhyudyatāḥ ||5 ||
T03n1146u_001:26: sarvatraiva hyarthasaṃśayena sarveṣāṃ sambandhābhidheyaprayojanaprayojanāvasāyapūrvikā pravṛttiriti sambandhādīni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vācyāni
T03n1146u_001:27: tathā hi yadi sambandhābhidheyamasyā na kathyeta,
T03n1146u_001:29: tathā satyapi sambandhābhidheye niṣpāditakriye karmaṇyaviśeṣābhidhāyi sādhanamityādi-sādhananyāyamatipatatīti nyāyātsūtrāntarāsaṅgṛhītaviśiṣṭapravṛttyaṅgaprayojanarahitaṃ prajñāpāramitāsūtraratnaṃ śraddhānusāriṇo'
T03n1146u_001:30: pi śrotumapi nādriyanta ityādāvasādhāraṇaṃ kriyāphalaṃ sūtre pravṛttikāmānāṃ pravṛttaye tadgatameva prayojanaṃ vācyaṃ nānyagatamanyathā hyasaṅgatābhidhānaṃ syāt |
T03n1146u_001:31: sūtre hi paraṃ pravartayituṃ sūtrādau prayojanamabhidhīyate na vyasanitayā |
T03n1146u_001:35: sūtraṃ ca viśiṣṭārthapratipādanaparaṃ vacanamucyate nābhidheyamātraṃ nāpi śabdamātramarthapratipādanasāmarthyaśūnyamato nābhidheyādigatamabhidhānīyam
T03n1146u_001:49: bhyasyamānaḥ svopeyaphaladāyaka ityupāyāvagamāya sūtre pravṛttistasmātpravṛttyaṅgaprādhānyena prayojanamevāvaśyaṃ darśanīyam |
T03n1146u_001:50: taccopāyabhūtasambandhādiśūnyena granthenāśakyaṃ darśayitumiti sūtrasya prayojanaprayojanopāyatāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ sambandhādikathanam | tacca
T03n1146u_001:56: na punaraśakyaṃ tatsādhanānuṣṭhānamanyathā jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkārārthamiva na pravarteta kaścit |
T03n1146u_001:58: tathāhyabhimatārthaparisamāptyā puruṣasyākāṅkṣāvicchedādato nāparamūrdhvaṃ prayojanaṃ mṛgyamiti ko'
T03n1146u_001:63: sa hi nāma pṛthagupādānamarhati yo yasminnabhihite'
T03n1146u_001:69: tathā hi saṃpradarśyamānaḥ śāstraprayojanayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvalakṣaṇa upadarśanīyo,
T03n1146u_001:72: tathā hīdamasya prayojanamiti darśayatā darśitaṃ bhavatīdamasya sādhanamiti |
T03n1146u_001:73: na hi yo yanna sādhayati tattasya prayojanaṃ bhavatyatiprasaṅgāditi sāmarthyalabhyatvena nāsau prayojanābhidhānātpṛthagabhidhānīyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:81: na hi tadastīha prajñāpāramitāyāmapūrvaṃ vastujātaṃ yanna skandhadhātvāyatananirdeśenābhidharmapiṭakādau saṅgṛhītamiti punaruktatādoṣaḥ ||
T03n1146u_001:89: yadyādyo vikalpastadā vastvevākāravyājena saṅgṛhītamiti vastusaṅgrahabhāvī doṣaḥ samāpatati |
T03n1146u_001:94: bhyudayanaiḥśreyasadharmāvāhakaḥ samasto mārgo vividhaiḥ prātihāryaiḥ sakalajanānuśāsakena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāmayena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ deśita ityabhidheyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:95: yathoktamabhidheyamāryaśatasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitādisūtrārthaṃ bodhicittāvavādādipratipattirūpamaṣṭāvasthābhedabhinnaṃ sarve saṃkṣiptarucayaḥ sattvāḥ sukhena saṃkṣepataḥ pratipadyantāmityaṣṭasāhasrikāṃ bhagavatīṃ bhagavān deśitavān |
T03n1146u_001:105: iti nyāyāt saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyāśrayeṇa dānādiśubhasañcayavān svāparārthasaṃpatsampādanāhitamiti nirvedhabhāgīyādyadhigamakrameṇa sarvaprākāraṃ sākṣātkuryādityanuguṇopāyaṃ kriyāphalasya phalaṃ prayojanam |
T03n1146u_001:112: tathāgataguhyanirdeśādhikāreṇa sarvathā bhādrakalpikasarvatathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyasaddharmakāyarakṣāyāṃ kṛtādhikāratvādvajrapāṇyabhiṣekādau pratyarpitaśāsanatvāccānyeṣāṃ viśeṣavacanābhāvādaḍakavatīnivāsī daśabhūmīśvaro mahāvajradharaḥ sarvalokānugrahāya prajñāpāramitāsūtraratnasaṅgītiṃ pratyadhīṣṭavantamāryamaitreyādimahābodhisattvagaṇamevamityādyāheti pūrvācāryāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:113: anye tvatraiva parīndanāparivarte yatheyaṃ jambudvīpe prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyatītyādinā pratyarpitaprajñāpāramitātvādāryānandaḥ saṅgītikāra iti manyante |
T03n1146u_001:115: mayetyātmavacanena bhagavataḥ sakāśātsākṣācchravaṇaṃ śrutamiti śrotavijñānenānubhavavacasā ca tathāgatādṛte'
T03n1146u_001:118: tathā hi bhagavati parinirvṛtte nānārthādhimuktiprabhāvitatvādduranubodhabuddhatvāvāhakasaugatavacanaprasarasyārthādhigamābhāve kathaṃ kaiścitsaṅgītiḥ kriyata iti vineyajanasaṃdehāpanayanakāribhistathāgatādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitaiḥ śrāvakādibhiḥ kathaṃ bhagavannanāgate kāle dharmaḥ saṅgītavya iti pṛṣṭena bhagavatā kṛrtāviparītasākṣācchravaṇenānadhigatārthenāpi dharmasaṅgītau kriyamāṇāyānna doṣa ityabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ dharmasaṅgītisūtre |
T03n1146u_001:119: "evaṃ mayā śrutamiti kṛtvā bhikṣavo mama dharmaḥ saṅgītavya tathā saṃbandhānupūrvī pratipādyetyādi" |
T03n1146u_001:121: tathā śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocadityādivacanaṃ ca bhagavadanujñayaiva saṅgītakartṛbhiḥ kṛtamiti nābuddhavacanatvaprasaṅgastathā ca buddhavacanenābuddhavacanaṃ prakṣeptavyamityayamapi doṣo dūrata eva kṛtānavakāśo'
T03n1146u_001:124: evaṃ ca kṛtvā yatkaiścidevaṃ mama deśitamiti vaktavye,
T03n1146u_001:125: kasmādevaṃ mayā śrutamityabhihitamiti codyaṃ kṛtvā bhagavaddeśanānupapatterityādiyuktyantaraṃ varṇitaṃ tannitarāṃ na rājata iti pratipāditam
T03n1146u_001:135: ti mahākāśyapavacanāvasāne buddhaguṇānusmaraṇadravīkṛtacittasantānaḥ sāśrudurdinavadano vyāpinā svareṇāryānanda "
T03n1146u_001:140: anyato vā śrutvā dharmadharāgratvādarthanirṇayaṃ prati bhagavāṃstena pṛṣṭo' to'
T03n1146u_001:143: yattūktaṃ yannvahaṃ sarvamevaṃśrutikayoddiśeyamiti tadgranthamadhikṛtyeti na doṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:144: evamupodghātaṃ kṛtvedānīṃ kadā kutaḥ kutra kaiḥ sahaivaṃ sūtraratnaṃ tvayā śrutamiti praśnānātmaprāmāṇyapratipādanāya visarjayan |
T03n1146u_001:146: ekasmin samaye śrutamekasmin kāla iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:149: nyaditi vakroktyā svagataṃ bāhuśrutyaṃ sattvārthaṃ pratikāruṇikavaidyarājanyāyenāha saṅgītikāraḥ |
T03n1146u_001:153: yatkiñcinmama śrotavyaṃ tatsarvamekasmin kṣaṇe mayā śrūyate'
T03n1146u_001:155: ata eva saṅgītikārasya paścātkrameṇa pravṛttāyāṃ deśanāyāmanyavineyajanavargānugrahārthamantarā sadā samādhānāsambhavena kathañcidavyākṛtasya viṣayāntarāvalambinaścetasaḥ sambhave'
T03n1146u_001:160: bhavatyeva sāgaranāgarājaparipṛcchānusāreṇa pariśuddhabodhisattvagaṇasya na tu sarveṣāṃ viśiṣṭabhavyatāvaikalyena tathāvidhadhāraṇaśaktyabhāvāt
T03n1146u_001:161: kathaṃ punarayamekatra deśanāyāṃ vibhāga iti cet |
T03n1146u_001:163: sā yathāvalaṃ sakṛtkrameṇa vā jāyata iti na doṣaḥ | athavā
T03n1146u_001:168: parahitapravaṇamatitvenaikasmin samaye gṛdhrakūṭe viharati smetyuttareṇa padena saṃbadhyate'
T03n1146u_001:172: ityarthoktyā nairuktavidhānena kleśādikaṃ bhagnavāniti bhagavān | athavā |
T03n1146u_001:174: jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇāṃ bhaga iti śrutiḥ ||
T03n1146u_001:175: so'syāstīti samagraiśvaryādimān bhagavān viharati smeti saṃbandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:176: rājagṛhe'nvarthasaṃjñake prasiddhasthānaviśeṣe yastathāgatairjīnajananīdeśanāṃ pratyabhisambodhisthānavadbodhisattvādimahāsannipātabhārodvahanāsamarthānyadeśatvenābhikāṅkṣito nānāratnanikaro gṛdhrakūṭaḥ puṇyakāmadevādīnāmaṣṭamyādiṣu parvasu yātrāṃ tanotīti nairuktavidhānātparvataḥ |
T03n1146u_001:179: lokātikrāntātidrūtadharmadeśanādāvarjyadeśanāprātihāryeṇāśayānuśayaparijñānātparipācyānuśāsanīprātihāryeṇa yānatrayavineyasattvānāṃ viśeṣeṇa smaraṇādikāriṇāṃ mocanādabhimatamarthaṃ kurvan caturbhirīryāpathadeśanāsamāpattipratisaṃlayanavihāraiḥ kāyavākkarmadharmasattvālambanamanaḥsvabhāvairevaṃ vihṛtavān |
T03n1146u_001:180: nanu ca bhūtānadyatanaparokṣe kāle laṭaḥ smaśabdayoge vihito na cātra
T03n1146u_001:181: kālaḥ saṅgītikārasya parokṣastatkathaṃ viharati smeti prayogaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:186: mahānubhavena bhikṣūṇāṃ traivācikena karmaṇā jñapticaturthenānāghātapañcamenaihibhikṣutvena copasampannānāṃ bhinnakleśānāṃ samūhena |
T03n1146u_001:190: iti saṅghena sārdhaṃ sahitaḥ parivṛto viharati smeti sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:194: pūrvaṃ prabhūtārthasya samāsasaṅkhyāgrahaṇāvismaraṇāt sukhāvabodhārthaṃ bahuśravaṇagrahaṇabhīrūṇāṃ śrotrāvadhānārthamathavā parimāṇajñāpanārthamupāttam
T03n1146u_001:197: kṣīṇāśravā bhavāgrādāsaṃsāraṃ śravantīti kāmabhavāvidyāśravā yathāyogaṃ tatpratipakṣānāśravaśīlādiskandhalābhena yeṣāṃ te kṣīṇāśravāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:198: nirgataḥ kleśakarmajanmasaṃkleśākhyaḥ kleśo yeṣāṃ te niḥkleśāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:199: yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saṃprāptaśīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktiskandhaparipūribhirduścaritatṛṣṇādurdṛṣṭibhavabandhanavimuktyā samyagīryāpathābhijñāvikrīḍitadivyāryavihāralābhairyathākramaṃ svayaṃ te lokasya lokacittaṃ vaśībhūtam yeṣām |
T03n1146u_001:200: svayaṃ ca sarvabandhanavigamasvātantryādye vaśino bhūtāste vaśībhūtāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:207: kṛtañcānuṣaṅgikaṃ kartavyaṃ svecchāpratibaddhavṛttidhūtaguṇādikaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yaiste kṛtakṛtyāḥ kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:213: parisamantādyathāsambhavamāryamārgeṇa kṣīṇāni bhavena saha puruṣasaṃyojanātpratighādinavasaṃyojanāni yeṣāṃ te parikṣīṇabhāvasaṃyojanāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:214: samyagaviparītamāsamantājjñānamājñā tattvāvabodhastayā suṣṭhuvimuktaṃ sarvabandhanavisaṃyuktaṃ cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te samyagājñāsuvimuktacittāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:215: sarvatra cetasi navānupūrvavihārasamāpattilakṣaṇe svātantryādvaśinaste cetaḥparamapāramiṃ svagotrapraharṣaparyantagatiṃ prāptāśceti sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptāḥ
T03n1146u_001:220: sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptatvādevaṃ pūrvapūrvasyottarottaraṃ kāraṇamataḥ sarvapuruṣārthaparisamāptatvānnāparaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vācyamityeke |
T03n1146u_001:223: tadevamebhiḥ padairdoṣātyantaprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ guṇāmabhidhāyedānīṃ pratipakṣalakṣaṇaṃ guṇaṃ vaśībhūtairityādināha |
T03n1146u_001:239: nityastadanurūpāṃ gatiṃ cātigṛhṇātīti nairuktavidhānātprabandhatayā ekaḥ pudgalaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:243: taduktameṣa āyuṣmānāryānando deśanākāle śrota-āpannatvena yathoktaguṇavaikalyādenamekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā parityajyeti |
T03n1146u_001:250: pañcadaśacārikākāraṇavaikalyātsvayaṃ na kvacid gacchanti kevalaṃ kṛtajñatādharmagauravādibhirbhagavato'
T03n1146u_001:266: tathā tadanusāreṇaiva mandabhāgyānāṃ parivārādyabhāve daurmanasyanivṛttyarthamalpecchatānurāgārthaṃ ca svayaṃ bhagavān dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpya samāhitaireva gamyamidaṃ sūtraratnamiti darśayan vajraparyaṅkenātighāṭitatvādidoṣarahitenopaviśya,
T03n1146u_001:267: ṛjunā kāyena dharmacakramudrābandhapūrvakaṃ nāsāgradṛṣṭinyāsādekāgrāmabhimukhīṃ smṛtiṃ vidhāya sarvasamādhisaṅgrahātsamādhirājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpādyotthitastato maitrīkaruṇānayanābhyāmimaṃ lokaṃ duḥkhārtamabhisamīkṣya mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena yathābhavyatayā ca sarvatragā buddhatvaparyavasānaphalā deśaneyamiti vineyavargaṃ bodhayan,
T03n1146u_001:268: yathāyogamaṅgapratyaṅgebhyaḥ sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prakṛtiprabhāyāśca ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasranirmāṇena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamāṃllokadhātūnavabhāsya sarvasattvāṃścānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau niyatān kṛtvā jihvendriyeṇemaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ vyāpya tasmātsphuritānekaraśmisamūheṣu padmagarbhatathāgatādhiṣṭhānapūrvakaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktadharmadeśanayā pūrvavatsattvārthakaraṇāttadarthijanasaṃnipātāya mātṛdeśanānimittamavyāhataṃ darśitavān |
T03n1146u_001:270: siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpādyāśuddhe sthāne saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyavibhāgākuśale ca śrotari[na]kathanīyā jīnajananīti dharmabhānakānavabodhayaṃstādṛśamṛddhyābhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān yenāṣṭādaśamahānimittapūrvakaṃ tathaiva sarvalokadhātusaṅgṛhītāṣṭākṣaṇavināśāt,
T03n1146u_001:271: sthānapariśodhanena tatra te sattvā devamanuṣyasabhāṃ gatā yāmupapadya jātismarāḥ prītipramodena svasvabuddhakṣetreṣūpasaṃkramaṇādipūrvakaṃ buddhān bhagavanto namanti sma |
T03n1146u_001:272: sarve ca sattvā vyapagatacakṣurādivaikalyadoṣā daśakuśalakarmapathasevinaścaturbrahmavihāraniratāstṛtīyadhyānasamāpannā iva sukhalābhino jīnajananīśravaṇayogyā bhūtvaivaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhavanti sma |
T03n1146u_001:274: sādhu damaḥ sādhu śamaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu cīrṇobrahmacaryāvāsaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:276: tadanu bhagavān prāptasamastajñeyādhipatyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā deśayituṃ śakyata iti kathayan vineyānāmādarotpādanāya pūrvavat sarvalokadhātūnabhibhūya prabhāvarṇaśrītejobhiryathākramaṃ sthānabhāsanatapanavirocanaṃ sarvaparvatānabhibhūya sumeruḥ parvatarāja iva kṛtavān |
T03n1146u_001:277: tathaivedṛśaireveyaṃ boddhuṃ deśayituṃ ca śakyate na mādṛśairiti yatnaṃ na kuryurvineyāstato manuṣyā eva sarvaṃ sampādayitumalamityutsāhasaṃjananārthametallokadhātusattvātmabhāvasamānamātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtamupadarśitavān |
T03n1146u_001:280: yathā deyāḥ paribhujyante tathā supariṇamitavastuparibhogāccittaprasādena puṇyābhivṛddhau pramṛṣṭakāyāditayā prajñāsambhāro vineyānāṃ sukhenotpadyata ityanugrahārthaṃ tāni ca puṇyādīni trisāhastramahāsāhasralokadhātupramāṇasarvālaṅkāraśobhanakūṭāgārarūpeṇaitallokadhātoratīvaśobhākāreṇa svamūrdhni bhagavatādhiṣṭhitāni |
T03n1146u_001:281: tathāca tānyadhiṣṭhāya kṣapitāhammānavāsanānāmekābhilakṣyadharmadeśanāyāṃ daurmanasyādinā samyakpratipattivaikalyamiti pūrvavat sarvalokadhātusthasattvānāṃ purataḥ sarvarthodgrahaṇādyarthaṃ tathā sarvasattvasamatāpravṛttāvapyuttaratra yathābhavyatayā cirakṣiprādibhedena keṣāñcidadhigamavyākaraṇādāvanunayādyādhyāropapūrvakaṃ nāsmāsu cittānyathātvaṃ kāryamiti pradarśanārthaṃ sarvākāradharmadeśanāparaṃ samamātmabhāvaṃ pradarśitavān |
T03n1146u_001:284: yaṃ bhagavāniti sarvākārajagadarthakaraṇāya mandadhījanāśaṅkāmapākurvan samānaprasthānasaṃbhāraparipūrṇabodhisattvānāṃ pratibuddhakṣetramanuttarasamyaksaṃbodhisaṃbhavātsarvabuddhaiḥ saha saṃbhāradharmakāyābhyāṃ jagataścārthacaryayā samatā sarvabuddhānānnāyurjātipramāṇata ityātmanastulyatāṃ kathayaṃstathā nānālokadhātūtpannakṛtapraṇidhānasvavineyabodhisattvānāmaviparītasamastapravacanaratnasūtradeśanayā saṃbhāraparipūraṇopāyopadeśārthaṃ tathā smitamakarodbhagavān yenānyonyaṃ sarvalokadhātusthasattvāḥ sarvathonmūlitātulyatvasaṃśayabījāḥ saparṣatsamūhānitaretaralokadhātavīyabuddhān bhagavantaḥ samupalabhya tulyatāṃ pratipannāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:285: tathā mahāvabhāsādinimittopālaṃbhapūrvakaṃ gurvāyattayā na sahasāgamanaṃ yuktamiti tadarthaṃ daśadiglokadhātavīyajinātmajāstān svasvatathāgatānupasaṃkramya padābhivaṃdanapuraḥsarā eva kalyāyamanubhāva iti praśnasya visarjanānantaraṃ praśaṃsāvākyaśravaṇena viditasvādhipatibhadrāśayāstādṛgvidhasaparivārabhagavaddarśanādyarthaṃ gamiṣyāmo vayaṃ bhagavanta ityālocya gṛhītasvādhipatidharmagauravapreṣitapūjārthanānāratnapadmavārttāsaṃdeśālpābadhātādiparipṛcchāvacanāḥ pañcakaṣāyotsādatvādasya lokadhātorapramādavihāriṇo bhaviṣyathetyanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhyāntarālavartibuddhānāṃ pūjāmabhinivartayanto'
T03n1146u_001:286: parimitaparivārāḥ samāgamyānuṣṭhitapādavandanapūrvakapūjāprasarāḥ svasvasthānībhūya kathitasvasvatathāgatavārttāvacanāḥ padmāni niryātitavanta iti dvividhaṃ dharmāvabhāsanaprātihāryam |
T03n1146u_001:288: pi taddoṣānupalepajñāpanāya saddharmapūjārthaṃ prahitānīti kṛtvā svasvadikṣu prakṣipya teṣu ca padmeṣu tathāgatādhiṣṭhānapūrvakajinajananīdeśanayānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhau sarvasattvān niyatīkartuṃ saddharmapūjāyāmupanāmya samāgataṃ yathābhavyaṃ mahābodhisattvādisaṃnipātamavagamyādimadhyāntakalyāṇatvādiyuktāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśitavāniti nidānaṃ pratipattavyam |
T03n1146u_001:290: taduktaṃ yadā bhagavān rājagṛhe mahānagare gṛdhrakūṭe parvate yathoktaparṣadā parivṛto dharmaṃ deśayan vijahāra tadā bhagavataḥ sakāśāttatraiva sthāne tayā parṣadā sārdhamevaṃ mayā sūtraratnaṃ śrutamiti sarvairapyetairlokavyavahārānuvartanāt saṅkīrtitadeśādibhiḥ saṅgītikāreṇātmaprāmāṇyapratipādanādvineyānām sādaraśravaṇacintanādikamuktam |
T03n1146u_001:299: iti pañcabhirākāraiḥ sūtraṃ vyākhyātavyamiti vyākhyāyuktau nirṇītam |
T03n1146u_001:301: ataḥ śrotṛjanasukhapratipattaye kṛtavibhāgārthasya ca śāstrasya sukaraṃ vyākhyātṛṇāṃ vyākhyānamiti samāsanirdeśena piṇḍārthastāvadabhidhīyate
T03n1146u_001:302: tatra buddhatvārthino bodhisattvasya cittotpādādisarvākāraparijñānādau phalanirdeśena sarvākārajñatā kathitā |
T03n1146u_001:303: sā na vinā śrāvakamārgādiparijñāneneti tadanu mārgajatā |
T03n1146u_001:306: dhigamya sarvākārābhisambodhaṃ viśeṣamārgeṇa prakarṣaparyantādhigamalābhānmūrdhābhisamayamāsādya vyastasamastabhedena vibhāvitānarthān praguṇīkṛtya niścayāya sākṣātkarotīti viditvānupūrvābhisamayam punarapi svabhyastīkaraṇāya vibhāvitaikakṣaṇābhisaṃbodhānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe dharmakāyā'
T03n1146u_001:318: tatra samyaksaṃbodhimadhigantukāmenādau śūnyatākaruṇāgarbhaṃ bodhicittaṃ praṇidhiprasthānasvabhāvaṃ dvividhamutpādya cittotpādatadākṣiptadharmaniṣpattaye saṃprāptaguṇaparipālanārthenābhivṛddhyarthaṃ pratipattyādiṣvavavādagrahaṇānantaraṃ śrutādiprakarṣaprāptamokṣabhāgīyaśraddhādilakṣaṇakuśalamūlādūrdhvaṃ catuḥsatyaprativedhānukūlaṃ caturvidhanirvedabhāgīyaṃ laukikabhāvanāmayanniścitya pratipattimato yathoktanirvedabhāgīyamanyadapi darśanamārgādikamiti pratipattirādhāreṇa dharmadhātusvabhāvinaiva bodhisattvena sarvadharmālaṃbannapūrvakaṃ sarvasattvāgratācittamahatvaṃ pramāṇamahatvamadhigamamahatvaṃ cādhikṛtya pratipattiḥ pravartata ityabhilakṣyasthānīyastrividhaḥ samuddeśo dhyeyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:319: tadanu tatprāptaye trisarvajñatāviṣaye sāmānyena śukladharmādhiṣṭhānā sarvākārābhisambodhādau caturvidhe'
T03n1146u_001:321: dhiṣṭhānā ca kriyāpratipattirityevaṃ yathāvatprayogadarśanabhāvanāviśeṣamārgasvabhāvānāṃ sannāhādipratipattīnāṃ madhye vīryarūpatayā prathamataḥ sannāhapratipattyā sannahya prasthānapratipattyā samastamahāyānadharmābhirohaṇapūrvakaṃ saṃbhārapratipattyā sambhṛtasaṃbhāreṇa niryāṇapratipattiradhigantavyetyevaṃ buddhatvāvāhakadharmādhigamānukrameṇa prakāśanāttathāgatānāmiti prathamaparivartasaṅgṛhītā sarvākārajñatā |
T03n1146u_001:328: tadanu sarvākārajñatādhigamo na vinā sarvamārgādhigamanamiti mārgajñatāṃ darśayituṃ svaprakṛtiprabhābhirdavādīnāṃ vaipākikaprabhāyā malinīkaraṇena lokapālatvādyabhimānanirākāraṇādvakroktyā nihatamānasaṃtāna eva pudgalo'
T03n1146u_001:331: dhikāre sarve mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyā iti śrāvakapratyekabuddhamārgapratipādanapūrvakamaihalaukikādiguṇairupeto mahānuśaṃso bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārgo bhagavatābhihitaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:332: tato'nantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktavyatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtestasya kāritramādau nirdiśya sāśravānāśravarūpeṇa dvividho bhāvanāmārga ityadhimuktipariṇāmanānumodanābhedena trividhasāśravabhāvanāmārgamadhye kāñcanapiṇḍamiva dhātubhyaḥ puṇyamabhisaṃskarotītyādāvadhimuktimanaskāramuktā tadbhāvakabodhisattvotsāhanāyaivamadhimukterbuddhādibhiḥ stutyādayaḥ kriyanta ityuttarottarābhinandanarūpāḥ stutastobhitaśaṃsitāḥ kathitāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:333: tadanu samyaksaṃbodhestatpuṇyamupakaraṇīkaroti suvarṇakāra ivābharaṇamiti pariṇāmanāmanaskārapūrvakaṃ svaparapuṇyakriyāsamatāpratilābhārthamanumodanāmanaskāramabhidhāya prayogaviśuddhibhedena dvividho'
T03n1146u_001:334: nāśravo bhāvanāmārga iti prathamamabhinirhāralakṣaṇaṃ pratipādya dvitīyo'
T03n1146u_001:337: ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavannavabodha iyamasya prajñāpāramitā |
T03n1146u_001:347: tataḥ sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyagiti sarvajñatāṃ darśayituṃ prajñayā saṃsārādīnavadarśanena kṛpayā ca sattvārthakaraṇapāratantreṇa bodhisattvānāṃ bhavaśamānavasthānādvyatirekanirdeśena caivaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmiti nirdeśapūrvakaṃ tatsamarthanārthamevānvayavyatirekatayā nimittānimittagrahaṇājjīnajananyā nirdiṣṭadūretarabhāvenopalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣau nirdiśya tayorvibhāvanāyāṃ punaranvayamukhenaiva bodhisattvānāṃ prayogakathanādanantaraṃ tatsamatāpratipādanapūrvako dhyeyo darśanamārgo'
T03n1146u_001:349: āyuṣmān subhūtirāhetyārabhya yāvannavamaparivarte nāpi kasyaciddharmasya pravartanaṃ vā nivartanaṃ vaivamiyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitetye tatparyantenoktā śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā |
T03n1146u_001:351: prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:355: tadanu parijñātatrisarvajñatāvaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānaprakārasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisaṃbodhaṃ darśayitumākāraviśiṣṭaprayogairbhāvayitavyā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ guṇadoṣādānatyāgena lakṣaṇajñānapūrvakamutpannamokṣabhāgīyakuśalamūlenetyākārādīnnirdiśya vivardhitamokṣabhāgīyasyotsāhino nirvedhabhāgīyādyadhigamadvāreṇa prāptaśaikṣāvaivartikabodhisattvagaṇadharmasya buddhatvanimittasaṃsāranirvāṇasamatābhāvanāpūrvakaṃ niṣpāditasvabuddhakṣetraviśuddhāvupāyakauśalena yathābhavyatayā'
T03n1146u_001:356: nābhogādbuddhakṛtyaṃ pravartata iti nirvedhabhāgīyādayo deśitā iti navamaparivarte |
T03n1146u_001:359: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokenetye tatparyantenokto buddhādīnāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sarvākārābhisaṃbodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:367: dhigama iti mūrdhābhisamayaṃ darśayituṃ yathāsaṃkhyamuṣmādicaturvidhanirvedhabhāgīyasvabhāvaliṅgavivṛddhirnirūḍhicittasaṃsthitipratipādanapūrvakaṃ pravṛttinivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānau dravyaprajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānau ca yathākramaṃ dvau dvau grāhyagrāhakavikalpāviti praheyatayā caturvidhavipakṣaṃ tatprahāṇāvasthāviśeṣaṃ copadeyatayā caturvidhaṃ pratipakṣaṃ pratyekaṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgaṃ nirdiśya buddhatvaprāpteravyavadhānenānantaryasamādhirubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākaraṇīyavipratipattyā saha deśita iti viṃśatitamaparivarte sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato'
T03n1146u_001:372: pratyekaṃ darśanākhye ca bhāvanākhye ca vartmani |
T03n1146u_001:375: tadanu prāptamūrdhābhisamayo vyastasamastatvenādhigatānarthānanupūrvīkṛtya sthirīkaraṇāya vibhāvayatīti sarvadharmasaṅgrāhakadānāditrayodaśaprakāratayaikonatriṃśattamaparivarte siṃhanādanadanatayā prajñāpāramitā nadanatānugantavyetyekenaiva padena sakāraṇenokto'
T03n1146u_001:378: tadanantaraṃ vibhāvitānupūrvābhisamayasya svabhyastīkaraṇāya teṣāmevādhigatānāṃ dharmāṇāmavipākānaśravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇādicaturvidhabhedādekenaiva kṣaṇenābhimukhīkaraṇamiti tatraiva parivarte sarvadharmākopyatayā prajñāpāramitā'
T03n1146u_001:382: tadanu vibhāvitaikakṣaṇābhisaṃbodhasya dvitīye kṣaṇe dharmakāyābhisaṃbodha iti trividhamanantarābhisaṃbodhaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ nirdiśya pariśiṣṭakāyatrayaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtyā pratibhāsamānaṃ paramārthato dharmatārūpaṃ yathādhimokṣaprabhāvitaṃ buddhabodhisattvaśrāvakādigocaraṃ vyavasthāpitamiti kathanāya
T03n1146u_001:385: pi pṛthag lokottareṇa mārgeṇa prāpyate na tu kriyata ityakṛtrimārthena māyopamavijñānamayasarvadharmapratipattyādhigataḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāya iti tatkathanapūrvakamavaśyamevābhyupagantavyā yogisaṃvṛttyā viśiṣṭārthapratibhāsajananadvāreṇāśrayaparāvṛttyā parāvṛttā dharmadeśanādyarthakriyākāriṇo'
T03n1146u_001:387: sarvākārastathāgatānāmeva gocaro jñānasaṃbhārajaḥ savyāpāro dharmakāya ityabhidhānānantaraṃ nānāsūtraratnaśravaṇābhilāṣibhirdaśabhūmipraviṣṭairmahābodhisattvaiḥ saha paramānavadyamahāyānadharmasaṃbhogaprītisukhopabhogādaprameyapuṇyasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanavirājitagātraṃ sāṃbhogikakāyaṃ pratipādya yathābhavyatayāśeṣajagadarthakriyākārī sarvathā' '
T03n1146u_001:389: bhāvāgrādanuparataprabandhaḥ śākyamunitathāgatādirūpo nirmāṇakāyaḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārāṃśaja eva śrāvakādyupalambhayogyo deśita ityekonatriṃśattamaparivarte
T03n1146u_001:390: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenetyārabhya yāvadanuttarāṇāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ paripūririti parivartaparyavasānenokto buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmakāyābhisaṃbodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:395: tadanantaraṃ sadāpraruditabodhisattvavatpratipattiḥ kāryeti vineyajanabodhanāya tatpūrvayogakathāmukhena kalyāṇamitrārāgaṇapūrvakaprajñāpāramitāyogānuśaṃsāṃ darśayitumupasaṃhāradvāreṇa madhyamapratipattyā yathoktābhisamayakramapratipādanaparameva parivartatrayaṃ deśitam |
T03n1146u_001:409: dhiṣṭhānena tadyathā samantabhadracaryānirdeśasūtrāderityāryasubhūtyadhimuktānāmanugrahaparīndanābhyāṃ samyakparigrahādikrameṇa mahāyāne vinayanātsvavaṃśānupacchedārthamacintyo vā tathāgatānāmupāyakauśalaprabhāvo yasmāt sarvathāśaktenāpi deśyata iti prabhāvasaṃdarśanavineyānāmanugrahārthaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāṣaṇaṃ prati vāgadhiṣṭhānadvāreṇārya-subhūtimanyamanaskamabhimukhīkaraṇārthaṃ bhagavānāmantrayate smāmantritavān |
T03n1146u_001:413: pi he subhūte viśiṣṭadharmārthaniruktipratibhānaṃ pratisaṃvitsarvathā te tavābhimukhī bhavatu |
T03n1146u_001:414: bodhau sarvadharmāsaktatāyāṃ svārthasaṃpadi sattvamabhiprāyo yeṣāṃ te bodhisattvāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:417: mahatyāṃ parārthasaṃpadi sattvaṃ yeṣāṃ te mahāsattvāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:418: mahattvaṃ cānyathāpi tīrthikasādhujane ca syāditi bodhisattvagrahaṇam |
T03n1146u_001:421: dhimukticaryāṃ vivardhayan saṃbhṛtapuṇyasaṃbhāro bodhisattvaḥ śubhe deśe paryaṅkamābhujya buddhabodhisattvālambanapūrvakaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvadharmanairātmya dyotakaṃ mūlacittena nāmataḥ samālakṣya tasyaiva padaprabhedaṃ parivartādibhedādanucaracittena nirūpayet |
T03n1146u_001:424: dhyāropāpavādābhāvānmīmāṃsā pratyakṣānumānapramāṇopapannatvātpratyavekṣaṇatayetyevaṃ prajñāpāramitārthaścaturbhirākārairvyañjanāni tu vyastasamastāni yathākramaṃ nirarthasadarthatayetyevamākārābhyāṃ vicāraṇācittena vicārayet |
T03n1146u_001:425: tadanu yathāvicāritaṃ tannimittamavadhāraṇācittenāvadhṛtya yathāvicāritamevārthaṃ nāmālaṃbake mūlacitte saṅkalanacittena prakṣipya yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati tacchandasahagatenāśāsticittena bhāvanāṃ kuryādityevamādiśrutacittabhāvanāmayajñānodayakrameṇa sarvākārajñānādhigamātpāraṃ prakarṣaparyantametīti vigṛhya kvipi sarvāpahāralope'
T03n1146u_001:426: nityamāgamaśāsanamityaluki tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulamityaluki ca karmavibhakteḥ kṛte pāramistadbhāvaḥ pāramitā |
T03n1146u_001:427: prajñāyā dharmapravicayalakṣaṇāyāḥ pāramitā mukhyā buddho bhagavānmāyopamaṃ jñānamadvayam |
T03n1146u_001:428: tatprāptyanukūlatvena tu padavākyasamūho grantho darśanādilakṣaṇo mārgaśca gauṇī prajñāpāramitā |
T03n1146u_001:435: tathāhyatraiva vakṣyati śrāvakabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmeneyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyetyādi sarvākāraparamapuruṣārthopayuktādhigamakamasya pratipādyamānatvāttatra ca bodhicittaṃ kulaputrabījabhūtaṃ tadeva phalabhūtaṃ sāraṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāmityāryagaṇḍavyūhādinirdeśādyathā yena parārthālambanasamyaksaṃbodhikāmatālakṣaṇadvāviṃśatiprabhedabhinnabodhicittādhigamaprakāreṇa bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstrividhāmapi prajñāpāramitānniryāyurniścitya prāpnuyuriti svālambanasvarūpaprabhedaścittotpādastatprabheda eva ca sūtrārtha iti darśayituṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā mantraṇādvāreṇa samāsataḥ prajñāpāramitā deśitā |
T03n1146u_001:436: tadayaṃ saṃkṣipto vākyārtho yathā sarvaprakārabodhicittādhigamaprakāreṇa bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstrividhāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ śrutādijñānodayakrameṇa samyak prāpnuyustathā teṣāṃ sambandhinīṃ prajñāpāramitāmevārabhya vyāsato bhāṣaṇāya caturvidhā pratisaṃvitte,
T03n1146u_001:443: iti nyāyādgotrādisāmarthyena bodhisattvasaṃvarasamādānādinā śūnyatākarūṇāgarbhabodhicittamutpādya samyaksaṃbuddho bhūtvā yathābhavyatayā parārthaṃ prati triyānadharmadeśanādibhiryatnaṃ kuryāmiti praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā pratipattyā sampādayediti |
T03n1146u_001:447: nayorjñeyo yathāsaṃkhyena paṇḍitairiti praṇidhiprasthānasvabhāvena dvividho bodhicittotpādaḥ | nanu
T03n1146u_001:452: samyaksaṃbodhikāmatā ca tatprārthanā kuśalo dharmachandaścaitasika iti kathaṃ sa cittotpādo bhavet |
T03n1146u_001:454: kintu duḥkhārṇavanimagnaṃ jagadatrāṇamabhisamīkṣya taduddharaṇābhiprāyaḥ kuśaladharmachandakṣaṇāyāṃ prārthanāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃbuddhatvāya cittamutpādayatīti kāraṇenātra kāryaṃ nirdiṣṭamevaṃ chandaprārthanasya bodhisattvasya sarve kuśaladharmā vṛddhiṃ yāntīti jñāpanāya copacāraḥ samāśrita ityadoṣaḥ
T03n1146u_001:459: atha keyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhiḥ kaśca parārtho yatkāmatātmako yadarthaścittotpāda iti cet |
T03n1146u_001:461: "sarvākāraṃ śāriputra sarvadharmānabhisaṃboddhukāmena bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogaḥ karaṇīya"iti |
T03n1146u_001:463: "iha śāriputra bodhisattvenāsthānayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitā paripūrayitavyā deyadāyakapratigrāhakānupalabdhimupādāye"tyādi
T03n1146u_001:465: "daśasu dikṣu pratyekaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāstān sarvānanupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyamiti" |
T03n1146u_001:467: "matsariṇaḥ sattvāndāne duḥśīlān śīle vyāpādabahulān kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyami"tyādi |
T03n1146u_001:470: samāsavyāsataḥ sā ca yathāsūtraṃ sa cocyate ||19 || iti |
T03n1146u_001:472: tatra prathamaścittotpādaśchandasahagato bodhisattvānāṃ pṛthivīsamaḥ sarvākārasarvadharmābhisaṃbodhasya saṃbhāraprasavapratiṣṭhābhūtatvāt |
T03n1146u_001:473: dvitīya āśayasahagataḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇopamaḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsaṅgṛhītasya hitasukhāśayasyāyatitadātyayorvikārabhajanādāsamyaksaṃbodhiśaya āśaya iti kṛtvā |
T03n1146u_001:480: caturthaḥ prayogasahagato jvalanopamastrisarvajñatāprayogasyendhanāntaraviśeṣeṇevāgneruttarottaraviśeṣagamanātprakṛṣṭo yogaḥ prayoga iti kṛtvā
T03n1146u_001:486: ṣaṣṭhaḥ śīlapāramitāsahagato ratnākaropamaḥ sarvaguṇaratnānāmāśrayabhāvena tataḥ prasavanāt |
T03n1146u_001:495: ete ca daśa yathākramaṃ pramuditādidaśabhūmisaṅgṛhītā darśanabhāvanāmārgagocarāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:501: ekonaviṃśatitamo dhāraṇīpratibhānasahagataḥ prasravaṇopamaḥ sarvathodakadhāraṇākṣayodbhedasādharmyeṇa śrutāśrutadharmadhāraṇā daparyāntadeśanodbhedatvāt
T03n1146u_001:503: viṃśatitamo dharmo dānasahagata ānandaśabdopamo mokṣakāmānāṃ vineyānāṃ priyaśrāvaṇāt |
T03n1146u_001:505: ekaviṃśatitama ekāyanamārgasahagato nadīsrotaḥ sadṛśo jñānajñeyayoḥ samatādhigamenorukaruṇāprajñopāyatayā'
T03n1146u_001:511: iyāneva prabhedo na nyūno nādhiko nāpyanyathānupūrvyā pratipādanīya iti pratipāditaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_001:512: evaṃkrameṇa dvāviṃśatibhedabhinnabodhicittādhigamadvāreṇa yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstrividhāmapītyādinā pūrvavatsambandha iti |
T03n1146u_001:526: iti vacanāddhetuphalālambanātmaka eva cittotpāda utpādyaḥ kathitaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:529: nyathā hetumātraprabhedānna tasya sarvathā prabheda ityaparipūrṇa eva prabhedaḥ syādityeke |
T03n1146u_001:530: anye tu mahārājopamādaya evāṣṭau cittotpādā bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśeṣamārgasaṅgṛhītā iti varṇayanti |
T03n1146u_001:532: atra tūdvaṭitajñasaṃkṣiptarucisattvānugraheṇa pravṛttatvāddeśanāyā iti kṛtvā noktaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:534: vaśyameva pratipattavyā yataḥ pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikārthopasaṃhāreṇa pravṛttamidaṃ sūtraratnamiti prāgeva pratipāditam |
T03n1146u_001:546: tadviṣaye tu na parakṛtena tasyātmīyenāpi tu svakena svakṛtena |
T03n1146u_001:555: cintyatvādupāyaviśeṣasya kadācidanenāpūrvajñānamadhigataṃ vyavasthitasyotkarṣo vā kṛtastathāgatādhiṣṭhānaṃ vā prāptamanyathāhamivāryasubhūtiraśaktaḥ na cāraṇāvihāriṇāmagratvena viśeṣasadbhāvādbhāṣata ityapi śakyate vaktum |
T03n1146u_001:564: cetanāṃ vā niśritya prajñāṃ vā paryeṣako manojalpaḥ sā ca cittasyodārikateti vitarkam |
T03n1146u_001:578: tatkasmānna svaśakyaiva sarvaṃ bhāṣaṇādi kriyata ityāśaṅkya tatkasmāddhetoriti svayameva praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:583: bhidheye nirvedhabhāgīyādhigamadvāreṇa dharmadeśanāyāṃ satyāṃ śikṣamāṇā darśanamārgādhigamena tāmadhigamadharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti |
T03n1146u_001:587: tasmāttathāgatadharmadeśanāyā evopacāranirdiṣṭapuruṣakārasvabhāvāyā eṣa sadṛśaḥ syando niṣyandastadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ yatsūtrādi te śrāvakā upadiśantastāmāgamadharmatāmadhigamadharmatayā na virodhayanti |
T03n1146u_001:588: upadiśanta iti copalakṣaṇādbhāṣamāṇā deśayanta ityapi grāhyaṃ tathāprakṛtatvāt |
T03n1146u_001:589: anenaitadāha nityasamādhānopāyakauśalavaikalyādadhigatārthaviṣayamapi dharmaṃ svādhigamāviruddhaṃ bhāṣitumasamarthāḥ prāgevānadhigatārthaviṣayamato buddhānubhāva eva draṣṭavyaḥ | tathā
T03n1146u_001:592: iti nyāyānnāpyabhyūhyo deśayituṃ śakyata iti prasaṅgāgataṃ nirvartyedānīmutpāditaprathamādibodhicitto yathākālaṃ bodhisattvo'
T03n1146u_001:603: bodhisattvo bodhisattva ityasminnarthe prajñābalena bodhyālambanādbodhiścāsau mahākṛpāśayena sattvālambanāt sattvaśceti bodhisattva ityuktaḥ
T03n1146u_001:615: iha śāriputra bodhisattvo bodhisattvaṃ tannāma ca na samanupaśyatītyādi" |
T03n1146u_001:616: bodhisattvadharmaṃ veti yasya dharmasya bodhisattva ityadhivacanam |
T03n1146u_001:623: ataevobhābhyāmasamanupaśyan katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipattyādi daśaprakārāyāṃ prathamaṃ samprāptaguṇaparipālanārthenāparihāṇimupādāya śikṣaṇenāvavadiṣyāmi |
T03n1146u_001:634: nirodhe śūnyatāyāmutpādanirodhasaṃkleśavyavadānahānivṛddhyādirahitāyānna rūpaṃ yāvanna vidyotpādo nāvidyānirodho na buddho na bodhiriti |
T03n1146u_001:636: dhyātmaśūnyatādīnāṃ bahirddhāśūnyatādibhiḥ pūrvāntāparāntayośca parasparaṃ na yuktāyuktatvena pratipattirityupadeśaḥ satyāvavādaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:639: saṅghe buddharatnāntargatatvenārhadvarjyeṣu phalasthapratipannakabhedena saptasu mahāpuruṣeṣu pratyekabuddhena sahāṣṭasu mṛdvindriyādibhedena viṃśatisaṃkhyāvacchinneṣvāryāvaivartikabodhisattvaśaikṣeṣvanutpādatayā pravṛttirityupadeśo ratnatrayāvavādaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:640: ārabdhavīryatayā yathoktārthānuṣṭhānaṃ prati kāyādisukhallikatvena kasyacidabhiniveśaḥ syādityasaktau kāyādīnāmasvabhāvatayā deśanāvavādaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:641: ciratarakālābhyāsenāpi samīhitārthāniṣpattāvutrasanajātīyasya parikhedaḥ syādityapariśrāntau rūpāderyāvatsamyaksambodheramananatayā deśanāvavādaḥ
T03n1146u_001:642: daśadigavasthitabuddhādibhyaḥ pratyarthaṃ mārgopadeśe gṛhyamāṇe cittāvalīnatā syāditi |
T03n1146u_001:647: catuḥsatyasaṅgṛhītaṣoḍaśakṣaṇasvabhāvaṃ darśanamārgaṃ dharmānvayajñānakṣāntijñānātmakaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvabodhena māyākāra iva sarvatrānabhiniviṣṭamūrtistatprahātavyavastupratipakṣatvena yogau vibhāvatīti deśanā darśanamārgāvavādaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:648: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtayorekarūpatvena parasparamaśakyavyatirekaprajñaptivadyathoktadarśanamārgasammukhīkṛtavastvavyatirekālambanāddarśanabhāvanayorapṛthagbhāva iti na lākṣaṇikaṃ bhāvanāmārgavyavasthānamatha ca sa tatprahātavyavastupratipakṣatvena vibhāvyate pratītyasamutpādadharmatayeti deśanābhāvanāmārgāvavāda ityevandaśavidho'
T03n1146u_001:650: tathāhi pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ pratyavavādaṃ spaṣṭa eva grantho nirdiṣṭo jñāpakatvena ca vistarabhayānna likhyate |
T03n1146u_001:653: apitu khalu punarityādi sa cediti nipāto yadyarthe |
T03n1146u_001:655: avavādaviṣaye daśaprakāre bhāṣyamāṇe cittannāvalīyate na saṅkocāyate yato na viṣīdati na muhyati,
T03n1146u_001:656: ataeva śrāddhatvena dharmabhajanādādau notrasyatyasthānatrāsena deśyamāne na saṃlīyate nālasyāyate |
T03n1146u_001:657: yato na viṣādamāpadyate na kātarabhāvaṃ yāti |
T03n1146u_001:658: ataeva prājñatvena tattvavedināṃ madhye na saṃtrasyati santatitrāsena |
T03n1146u_001:661: yato na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati na pṛṣṭhaṃ cittaṃ bhagnaṃ bhavati ataeva śraddhāprajñābhyāṃ yogātparyavasāne na saṃtrāsamāpadyate |
T03n1146u_001:663: athavā bhāṣaṇādikāle yathākramaṃ granthārthobhayāvadhāraṇānnāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati |
T03n1146u_001:666: ata evādimadhyaparyavasāne notrasyati na santrasyati na santrāsamāpadyata iti yojyam |
T03n1146u_001:668: yo bodhisattvaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthavibhāgakauśalyādyathoktāvavāde cittāvalīnatvādirahitaḥ sa eṣa evetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:669: eṣa eveti lakṣaṇamanuktvā kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyavamṛṣyata iti ceducyate,
T03n1146u_001:670: yasyārthasya bhāṣaṇādau cittāvalīnatvādi na karoti so'rthaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:674: sa bodhisattvo yadyanantaroktāvavādena yathoktaviṣaye sthitimān bhavati tadāsya bodhisattvasyaiṣaiva prārthitārthaprāptikartavyatopadeśo'
T03n1146u_001:694: tato yaḥ kāmavītarāgaḥ sa ṣoḍaśe darśanamārgacittakṣaṇe śrotaāpannaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:696: tataḥ kāmāvacarapañcaprakārakleśaprahāṇena dvitīyaphalapratipannako mṛdutīkṣṇendriya evaikaḥ śraddhādṛṣṭiprāptaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:708: bhāvāgraparamastu rūpavītarāgo dṛṣṭadharme śamaḥ kāyasākṣīti dvividhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:710: tataḥ śrāvakapiṭakamevāvalambya svamārgasaṃmukhīkaraṇādabuddhotpāde pratyekabuddha iti viṃśatiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:712: avaivartikacakrasūtre tu bodhisattvaśraddhānusāriṇamārabhya yāvadbodhisattvapratyekabuddha iti pudgalavyavasthānaṃ spaṣṭatarārthaṃ bhagavatoktamiti tatraivāvalokanīyamatrāsmābhirvistareṇa nopanyastaṃ kiṃ piṣṭaṃ piṣyeti |
T03n1146u_001:724: iti kṛtvā'dhimukticaryābhūmipariśodhanārthaṃ śrutādiprakarṣaprāptamokṣabhāgīyaśraddhādilakṣaṇakuśalamūlādūrdhvañcatuḥ satyaprativedhānukulāni caturnirvedhabhāgīyāni laukikabhāvanāmayāni vaktavyāni |
T03n1146u_001:727: dravyasatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānaśceti dvividho grāhakavikalpa iti vakṣyamāṇamūrddhābhisamayasaṅgṛhītadarśanabhāvanāmārgaprahātavyaiścaturbhirvikalpairyathāsaṅkhyaṃ saṃkleśabhājjyetāni nirvedhabhāgīyānīti vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_001:728: tathā yathoktavikalpasaṃyogañca bhajatāṃ satāṃ pratyekameṣāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena viśiṣṭatā ca vaktavyeti pañcavidho viśeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:729: śrāvakādīnāmuṣmādicaturvidhakuśalamūlaṃ rūpaṇādilakṣaṇavastvātmakacatuḥsatyālambanamātmadarśanapratipakṣatvenānityādibhirākāraiḥ svayānādhigamahetubhūtaṃ samparigraharahitaṃ svabodhiparipanthabhūtaścaturvidho vikalpo na bhavatīti kṛtvā tena saṃsṛṣṭamapyasaṃsṛṣṭamutpadyata iti vyavasthāpyate |
T03n1146u_001:741: "ihāyuṣmañchāriputra bodhisattvo rūpamanityamiti rūpaṃ duḥkhamiti rūpaṃ śūnyamiti rūpamanātme"tyādi |
T03n1146u_001:743: tatra punaḥ pratyekaṃ satyamadhikṛtya vistaranirdeśa iti na sandehaḥ kāryaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:748: evamiti vakṣyamāṇakrameṇa tenāpītyādi na kevalaṃ jñeyasyātyantaparokṣatvādālambanaṃ na manyeta yenāpyākāreṇābhiniveśāderniṣedhātmakena bodhyāvāhakajñānarūpeṇālambyeta tenāpi na manyetābhiniveśaṃ na kuryādityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:755: nabhiniveśa evaṃ satyabhāvatvāt pratipakṣo na yujyate |
T03n1146u_001:756: atha yannābhiniveśastadā cakṣurādiṣvapi prasaṅga iti cet |
T03n1146u_001:764: yadi tau tattvato na sta iti jñātau bhavataḥ |
T03n1146u_001:765: tathā cānantaraṃ vakṣyati sa cedāyuṣmañcchāriputra tatrācittatāyāmityādi nanu pramāṇopapanne'
T03n1146u_001:788: nāstītyabhiprāyavān subhūtistenaiva parihāraṃ pratipādayitukāmaḥ pratipraśnakriyayā śāriputramāha,
T03n1146u_001:801: ityabhiprāyavānāha nahyetadityanantaroktamubhayaṃ idānīṃ tadvacanameva parihāre yojyannāha |
T03n1146u_001:807: yadyacittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate nopalabhyate vā tatkathaṃ tavaiṣa paryanuyogo'
T03n1146u_001:810: tatrāpi hyacittamiti cittābhāvamātramevābhipretamataḥ sadasadrūpeṇāstitvasamāropo naiva ghaṭata iti |
T03n1146u_001:826: yasya samādheḥ prabhāvātpareṣāṃ santāne svaparavyāvādhanārthena raṇayantīti raṇāḥ kleśā na jāyante so'
T03n1146u_001:829: nanu ca buddhādhiṣṭhānāt sopāyakauśalāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ nirdiśataḥ ko'
T03n1146u_001:831: pi śāriputrasya subhūtiṃ prati sādhukāraḥ sādhuḥ syāt |
T03n1146u_001:844: śrāvakabhūmāvapītyādi viśiṣṭāvasthāprāptameva jñānaṃ bhūmistatra śikṣitukāmena pratipattiṃ kartukāmena iyameveti nirvedhabhāgīyapradipādanaparā mukhyataḥ |
T03n1146u_001:845: śrotravijñānena tadākṛṣṭena ca manovijñānena granthārthayoḥ paricchedācchrotavyā |
T03n1146u_001:861: tena samanvāgatena yuktena sarvabodhisattvadharmasamudāgamāyeti sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmeva dharmāḥ śrāvakādyasādhāraṇā mārgajñatālakṣaṇāsteṣāṃ samudāgamāya pratilābhāya yogaḥ samādhiḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:874: iha punarbodhisattvadharmā eva vistareṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ śrāvakadharmāḥ prasaṅgāditi |
T03n1146u_001:876: nāstyutaraṃ pradhānaṃ yasyāḥ seyamanuttarā samyagaviparītā sarvākārābhisambodhiḥ samyaksambodhirbuddhabhūmiriti yāvat |
T03n1146u_001:889: pūrvaṃ yasyārthasya bodhisattva iti nāma tasyānupalambho nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmītyādinoktaḥ | sāmpratam |
T03n1146u_001:892: iti kṛtvā yadetadbodhisattva iti nāmasvarūpamavavadanīyaṃ tasyānupalambho deśita iti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:907: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktā śabdo'sti nāparo |
T03n1146u_001:915: na ca nirviṣayaḥ sādhuprayogo vidyate nañaḥ ||
T03n1146u_001:917: iti nyāyānnāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ prabandhavisadṛśatvena tathaiva nāviṣṭhitam |
T03n1146u_001:953: tasmānna sandehaḥ kārya ityālambanākāravannirvikalpakajñānāgneḥ pūrvarūpatvāduṣmagatamivoṣmāgataṃ trividham |
T03n1146u_001:962: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mukhyato mūrdhasvabhāvāyāñcaratā bhāvayateti vyākhyātamathavā prayogapṛṣṭhacittena caratā maulacittena bhāvayateti yojyam
T03n1146u_001:971: vikalpitaṃ rūpamasadbhūtaparikalpena jñānameva tathā pratibhāsata iti vikalpitatvāt |
T03n1146u_001:977: sattvena vastūpalambhayogānna sthātavyaṃ cetasaḥ pratiṣṭhānaṃ na kāryamiti yāvat |
T03n1146u_001:983: ālambanagrahaṇaprakāra evākāraḥ saṃvinniṣṭhā ca viṣayasthitirityākārānurūpamevālambanaṃ grāhyam |
T03n1146u_001:986: evañca na carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ mukhyato mṛdumūrdhasvabhāvāyāmevaṃ vedanādiṣvapi yojyam |
T03n1146u_001:987: etaduktaṃ dharmatāmukhenākāraścaivaṃ vidho grāhyo yaduta paramārthena rūpādisarvadharmaśūnyatayoḥ parasparamekaṃ rūpamiti |
T03n1146u_001:988: tatra śūnyatāyāmanityatvādīnāmabhāvena rūpādau na nityānityādibhirākāraiḥ sthānaṃ vidheyamiti |
T03n1146u_001:990: "rūpameva śūnyatā śūnyataiva rūpamevaṃ yāvadyā ca bhagavannanityatāyāḥ śūnyatā na sā'
T03n1146u_001:997: tatkathaṃ vikalpe tattvābhiniveśena caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
T03n1146u_001:999: na parigṛhṇāti nāpi yogamāpadyate nāpi paripūrayata iti padatrayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ prayogamaulapṛṣṭhāvasthāsu draṣṭavyam |
T03n1146u_001:1002: aparigṛhītamagrahaṇārhamabhisaṃskāraṃ parigṛhṇan svīkurvāṇo na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyāmiti yojyam |
T03n1146u_001:1026: ataeva kvacidapuraskṛta iti pāṭho na grāhyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1044: yadi nimittato grahītavyā bhavettadā svaśāsane nimittagraheṇa dīrghakālaṃ muktimapaśyannirviṇaḥ sannaiveha śāsane śreṇikasaṃjñakaḥ parivrājakastapasvī śraddhāmanimittayogenābhisaṃpratyayaṃ pratilabheta |
T03n1146u_001:1048: atrānimitte tathāgatatvāvāhakatvena sarvajñajñāne tannimittamadhimucyādhimokṣamanaskāraṃ kṛtvā mṛdvindriyatvena śraddhayā mārgānusaraṇācchraddhānusārī prādeśikena pudgalanairātmyajñānenāvatīrṇaḥ so'

T03n1146u_001:1716: pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra iti pūrṇasyaiva maitrāyaṇīputra iti saṃjñāntaramathavā maitrāyaṇyāḥ svamātuḥ putro maitrāyaṇīputraḥ |

T03n1146u_001:1740: sampannadhyāno lokottarāṃ prajñāṃ pratilabhata ityevaṃ dānādīnāmadhigamānusāreṇa nirdeśo'
T03n1146u_001:1743: dānādau ṣaḍvidhe teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ saṅgraheṇa yā |
T03n1146u_001:1747: yānaśabdasya karmakaraṇasādhanatvādādau prasthānapratipattyā mahāyāne hetuphalātmake dharme samprasthitaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1755: tato dharmatāpravaṇasya yathāśayaṃ parārtha iti maitryādicaturapramāṇaprasthānam |
T03n1146u_001:1757: tato niḥsvabhāvayogavataḥ kathaṃ pravṛttiriti karmakartṛkriyānupalambhena māyāpuruṣasyeva sarvatra trimaṇḍalaviśuddhiprasthānam |
T03n1146u_001:1758: tata evaṃ pariśuddhacāriṇaḥ svasādhye yatna iti sarvasattvāgratācittamahattvāditrividhoddeśaprasthānam |
T03n1146u_001:1760: tataḥ prāptābhijñasya buddhatvotsāha iti sarvākārajñatā prasthānaṃ bhavati evamadhigamānukrameṇa navadhaiva samyagvyavasthitilakṣaṇasamastamahāyānadharmākramaṇasvabhāvā prasthānapratipattiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1761: pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāñca yathoktapratipattipratipādako grantho granthaprācuryānneha jñāpakatvena likhyate |

T03n1146u_001:1780: yataḥ sannāhapratipattyā karuṇādisambhāreṇa ca yukto mahāsannāhasannaddha iti |
T03n1146u_001:1794: kṛpayā vihīnasyānupāyavataḥ pareṣāṃ kvacidapratiṣṭhāpanena nirvapaṇāsambhavādidamarthādākṣiptaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_001:1795: karuṇayā pīḍyamānasya dānādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhirupāyabhūtābhiranugṛhya dānapāramitayā tadātvasukhopasaṃhāreṇa śīlapāramitāyā'
T03n1146u_001:1799: yaduta karuṇāsambhāro dānasambhāraḥ śīlasambhāraḥ kṣāntisambhāro vīryasambhāro dhyānasambhāraḥ prajñāsambhāra iti |
T03n1146u_001:1815: nyāyenāsaṃghaṭanādasatyā atastāṃ tarkavisyandāsandūṣitāṃ sārvalaukikīmābhāsamātragamanatāṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopādāya gṛhītvā tathādharmāṇāṃ rūpādīnāmeṣā dharmatā |
T03n1146u_001:1819: etacca dvayamanyonyaviparyāsanirākāraṇāyābhihitaṃ na tattvato yathoktaṃ prāgityanena śamathasambhāro nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1829: tat kiṃ manyase kiṃ budhyasa iti sāmānyena praśnaṃ kṛtvā |
T03n1146u_001:1858: evaṃ manyate yena prakāreṇa māyādharmasya vyāpitvena bhagavato bhāṣitasya dharmataiṣetyāderarthamājānāmi |
T03n1146u_001:1868: abhūtaprādurbhāvaṃ tadviśeṣagamanaṃ phalaprāptisaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ cādhikṛtya yathākramaṃ vā trīṇi padāni |
T03n1146u_001:1882: dharmyabhāve dharmatānupapatte rūpādiśūnyatā na baddhā na muktā |
T03n1146u_001:1883: yathādarśanaṃ tu rūpāditattathatayorbandhamokṣau bhavata iti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1891: atha viśeṣeṇa sa tarhi vaktavya ityāha |
T03n1146u_001:1901: nirbhāsate hi yadrūpaṃ naiva tat pratiṣidhyate |
T03n1146u_001:1903: iti nyāyādyathādarśanaṃ bandhamokṣasya vyavasthāpanāt kutaḥ pratyakṣādibādheti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:1910: nanu śamathavidarśanayorviruddhatvāt kathamekatra sambhava iti cet |
T03n1146u_001:1911: naivaṃ,tathāhi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_001:1916: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūlatvādaviruddha iti yuganaddhamārgasambhārānvitasyopāyakauśalādikamityupāyakauśalādisambhārapratipādanāya praśnaṃ kartumupoddhātayannāha |
T03n1146u_001:1918: evaṃ prāguktakrameṇa mahāsannāhasannaddhaḥ sanmahāyānasaṃprasthito bhavatīti yaducyate |
T03n1146u_001:1920: tayoranyatarāvyatirekaṃ vipakṣātikramamavasthānaniścayaṃ pratipakṣaprayogapraśrabdhimadhigantāraṃ cādhikṛtya yadyathā yato yena yatra yo niryāsyatīti katamadityādivyapadeśena ṣaṭpraśnā"
T03n1146u_001:1949: sarvadharmaśūnyatayā śūnyatāyā ādhyātmādiśūnyatālambanajñānasvabhāvāyā api śūnyatvena śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatājñānamatra sarvadharmaśūnyatā tena ca śūnyatā śūnyā |
T03n1146u_001:1955: paramasya nirvāṇasya nirvāṇārtharūpaśūnyatvena paramārthaśūnyatā tasya visaṃyogamātratvādiyamagrārthena dvitīyāyām || 6 ||
T03n1146u_001:1966: antobhāgastatrocchedaśāśvatāntayormadhye na tadasti kiñcidyena tayorbhāgavyavacchedanimittatvena svabhāvo vyavasthāpyeta |
T03n1146u_001:1988: nāsti sāṃyogikasya dharmasya svabhāvaḥ pratītyasamutpannatvāditi saṃyogasya tena śūnyatvādabhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā sāmagrīmātraṃ bhāva iti kṛtvā
T03n1146u_001:1990: bhāva syopādānaskandhalakṣaṇasya tena śūnyatvādbhāvaśūnyatārāśyartho hi skandhārtho rāśiścāpadārthatvānnopādānalakṣaṇasya bhāvasya nimittaṃ bhavitumarhatīti kṛtvā || 17 ||
T03n1146u_001:1995: svabhāvasya śūnyatākhyasyāryāṇāṃ jñānena darśanena vākṛtakatvāt svabhāvaśūnyatā |
T03n1146u_001:1998: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti pareṇa kartrā śūnyatvāt parabhāvaśūnyatā |
T03n1146u_001:1999: śūnyatādhiṣṭhāno hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ kevalaṃ vighātāyeti kṛtvā || 20 ||
T03n1146u_001:2001: etacca śūnyatātrayaṃ yathākramaṃ savāsanakleśāvaraṇāprahāṇāśrayatvena savāsanajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇāśrayatvena svayambhūtvārthena ca buddhabhūmau veditavyam |
T03n1146u_001:2002: anayā tu diśā prakaraṇānāmānupūrvīvikalānāṃ prakaraṇārtho vācyaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2004: na tveṣāmabhisamayānupūrvī kācidastīti teṣāṃ prakaraṇārtha eva vācyo na mukhyaḥ śāstrārtha ityanena śūnyatāprakaraṇānāṃ gatagantavyānupūrvīvaikalyāduddeśabhraṃśasambhava"
T03n1146u_001:2012: jñānañcedaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ vivādapadamārūḍhaṃ mana iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2019: sarvadharmasvabhāvaśūnyatāpi ceyamālambyamānā tathaiva nāstīti sarvadharmāstitvamāpadyata iti cedadoṣa eṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2020: yasmānna devadattaprakhyasyābhāvasyāpavādāntasya hantari yajñadattaprakhye svabhāve samāropānte tacchūnyatayā hate punaḥ prādurbhāva iti |
T03n1146u_001:2024: śūnyatālambanapakṣe tu niḥsvabhāvagocaraṃ jñānaṃ śūnyatāyāśca saṃskṛtatvaṃ prasajyate |
T03n1146u_001:2026: ādarśādijñānabhedena tu punarbahuvaktavyajñānasambhāravyavasthānāmeṣā dik prabhedaśca prasaṅgādabhihito na tvidānīmeva samastajñānasambhārādhigamaḥ pariśiṣṭābhisamayakramanirdeśāt |
T03n1146u_001:2028: jñānābhyāsavataḥ prajñāpariśuddhyā samyaksamādhyādibhiḥ sattvārthakaraṇāt puṇyamiti puṇyasambhāraḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2030: mārgānvitasyākāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmādyanutpannatvādityādinā tena tenākṣaravicitrīkāreṇānalpakalpadharmadeśanāhetoḥ smṛteraparyupayogāt smṛtirhi granthārthadhāraṇena dhārayatīti kṛtvā dhāraṇīsambhāra iti |
T03n1146u_001:2031: etaccopāyakauśalasambhārādipañcakaṃ pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāmapi mahāyānaśabdena vistarato nirdiṣṭamiti na sandehaḥ kāryaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2032: prāptadhāraṇīkasyottarottarādhigamapratiṣṭhāyogena tajjaguṇādhārayogena cādhigamāvasthāviśeṣā bhūmaya iti bhūmisambhāraṃ pratipādayitum |
T03n1146u_001:2033: yadapi subhūte evaṃ vadasi kathaṃ vā tatsamprasthito veditavya ityādi codyavacanaṃ sambandhārthamuccāryottarārthamāha |
T03n1146u_001:2035: daśabhūmisaṅgṛhītābhirdaśabhiratiriktatarābhirdānādipāramitābhiḥ krameṇa samyak samprasthita iti phalanirdeśādbhūmisambhāraḥ kathitaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2040: pi niścayotpādanāpekṣayā sarvatragārthena prativedhāt sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsākṣātkāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānamutpadyate |
T03n1146u_001:2042: atra ca rāgapratidhamānāvidyāvicikitsāḥ satkāyāntagrāhamithyādṛṣṭiparāmarśaśīlavrataparāmarśāśca kāmadhātau catuḥsatyabhedena catvāriṃśadbhavantyevaṃrūpārūpyadhātau ta eva catuḥsatyadarśanaprahatavyāṣṭaprakārapratighavarjitā dvāsaptatiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2044: satyānāmekābhisamayādataḥ pramuditāyā bhūmeḥ prathamaḥ kṣaṇo darśanamārgaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2045: tato'nye dvitīyādayaḥ kṣaṇā yāvadvajjopāmākhya ānantaryamārgo yasmādanantaraṃ samantaprabhā buddhabhūmiravāpyate |
T03n1146u_001:2048: tatra ca ṣoḍaśakleśā yathāsambhavaṃ krameṇa prahīyante |
T03n1146u_001:2051: rūpārūpyāvacarāsta eva daśa dveṣavarjitā iti darśanabhāvanāmārge parikarmadharmabhedena pramuditādidaśabhūmivyavasthānam |
T03n1146u_001:2052: tatra ca yadbhūmerye parikarmabhūtā dharmā yāvanna paripūryante tāvattadbhūmiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2085: śīlaṃ kṛtajñatā kṣāntiḥ prāmodyaṃ mahatī kṛpā |
T03n1146u_001:2092: pūrvavat kṛtā na ca budhyamānasvabhāvaparikarmaṇā tṛtīyā lokottarajñānāvabhāsakaraṇāt prabhākarī bhūmiravabudhyate |
T03n1146u_001:2094: atṛptatā śrute dānaṃ dharmasya ca nirāmiṣam |
T03n1146u_001:2121: sarvarāgādikleśābhimukhīkaraṇaṃ cetyevaṃlakṣaṇān daśadharmān bodhinibandhakatvena vivarjayannarthādākṣiptaviparyayadharmeṇa daśaprakāraparikarmaṇā pūrvavat pañcamī suṣṭhu duḥkhena jīyata iti sudurjayā bhūmirākramyate |
T03n1146u_001:2127: dānādiṣaṭpāramitāparipūraṇena śrāvakapratyekabuddhābhilāṣasya svabhāvānupalambhottrāsacittasya ca yācakajanaprārthanāsaṅkocacittasya svarasapravṛttasarvārthatyāgadaurmanasyasya dāridyādarthijanapratikṣepacittasya varjanenetyevaṃ dvādaśabhiḥ parikarmabhiḥ pūrvavat ṣaṣṭhī sarvabuddhadharmābhimukhī bhūmirājñāyate |
T03n1146u_001:2133: kṛśo'pi nārthināṃ kṣeptā ṣaṣṭhīṃ bhūmiṃ samaśnute ||59 || iti
T03n1146u_001:2152: upalambhābhiniviṣṭasattvadhātūttāraṇāya yathānurūpaṃ sarvatra svātmabhāvadarśanācchūnyatāvirodhodbhāvanāgrahotsṛṣṭiścetyevaṃ viṃśatiprakāreṇa parikarmadharmeṇa pūrvavat kṛtaviśeṣalakṣaṇaparikarmaṇā'
T03n1146u_001:2153: dhigatena yathoktaviṃśatiprakāradharmakalaṅkāpagamāt saptamau samyaganābhogamārgopasargāt suṣṭhu dūraṅgatatvāddūraṅgamā bhūmiḥ samīyate |
T03n1146u_001:2208: bodhisattvabhūmiśca yathoktā bodhisattvānāṃ navavidhetyevaṃ navabhūmīratikramya daśamyāṃ punaḥ bhūmau bodhisattvo buddha eva vaktavyo na ca samyaksaṃbuddha iti |
T03n1146u_001:2209: pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ vacanādyatra buddhabhūmau yena karmavaśitāśrayatvādinā jñānenāvatiṣṭhate,
T03n1146u_001:2210: sā tena prāpyā daśamī dharmāmbupravarṣaṇāddharmameghā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2213: yena jñānena sā jñeyā daśamī bodhisattvabhūḥ ||71 || iti
T03n1146u_001:2214: vistareṇa tu nirdiṣṭo bhūmisambhāraḥ pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ grāhyo granthavistaraprācuryānmayeha na vistārita ityalaṃ prasaṅgena |
T03n1146u_001:2215: darśanabhāvanāmārgātmaka eva bhūmisambhāra iti tadanantaraṃ tasya vipakṣaprahāṇāvasthābhedena pratipakṣasambhāratvaṃ pratipādayituṃ tṛtīyādipraśnaparihāradvāreṇāha
T03n1146u_001:2221: dravyapudgalaprajñaptipuruṣādhiṣṭhānadvividhagrāhakavikalpasya ca prahāṇādvipakṣabhedena tatpratipakṣāvasthādhigamādaparaṃ caturvidhapratipakṣasambhāraṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paramārthasatyāśrayaṇoktaṃ kriyāpratiṣedhātpratipādayannāha |
T03n1146u_001:2225: tatra sthānaṃ vastūpalambhaḥ karaṇādibhiḥ pratiṣṭhānaṃ cetasastatpratiṣedhādasthānam |
T03n1146u_001:2229: atha yanna sthānaṃ tathā cakṣurādiṣvapyatiprasaṅga iti |
T03n1146u_001:2230: yathānabhiniveśo vyākhyātastathedānīmapi nayo draṣṭavya iti na pratanyate |
T03n1146u_001:2236: yo bodhisattvo yena ca mārgeṇa niryāyāt tauvetau tattvenopasaṃharannāha |
T03n1146u_001:2244: samudāgamabhāvena mahābodhirebhiḥ karuṇādibhiriti karuṇādayaḥ sambhārā iti saptadaśaprakārā sambhārapratiprattiḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2257: tasyaiva bandhatvāditarathā hi mahāyānasya pratipakṣabhāvanāvaiyarthyaṃ syāt |
T03n1146u_001:2258: ato'bhūtaparikalpamātratvādvitathaprakhyātirūpaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tatpratipakṣatvenāsatyārthatayā svarūpaparijñānādabhibhavādyasmānniścayena gantavyaṃ sthānaṃ sarvasattvāgratādimahattvaṃ yāsyatīti tasmānmahāyānamucyata iti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2263: sattvārthamantareṇa puṇyopacayābhāvānna samatāvagamanaṃ samyagiti tadanu sattvārthaniryāṇamāha |
T03n1146u_001:2265: mahāyāne sattvānāmavakāśa iti vacanāttena mahāyānena teṣāmartho niryātavya ityāveditamanyathā'
T03n1146u_001:2288: yasmāt prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ tryadhvaśūnyaṃ tadyānaṃ tasmānmahāyānatvena pūrvāntatvādyabhāva iti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2293: atyantaniryāṇamapi yānatrayaprativiśiṣṭāvasthāprāptiṃ vinā na sampadyata ityato'
T03n1146u_001:2299: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ prayojanena pratibhātu ta ityādinā prārambha evādhīṣṭo nityasamanvāhāramantareṇa jñānadarśanāsambhavādanyathāpi syādityāryasubhūtirāha
T03n1146u_001:2313: nopaitīti bodhisattvaṃ kañcit prāpyaṃ rūpādisvabhāvamiti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2315: nanu rūpādipratibhāso bodhisattvaḥ kathamavidyamāna iti tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
T03n1146u_001:2318: iti nyāyāddharmadhātuvattatsvabhāvībhūtānāṃ yasmādrūpādīnāmaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā tasmādbodhisattvaṃ nopaitīti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2337: bodhisattva eva prāpyaprāpakalakṣaṇo dharmo rūpādisvabhāvastamanupalabhamānaḥ san |
T03n1146u_001:2345: katamaṃ prāpakaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamena prāpyāpāyamukhena katamasmin sambandhe sarvākārajñatālakṣaṇe kiṃśabdasya kṣepābhidhāyitvāt |
T03n1146u_001:2364: yasmādanabhinirvṛttaṃ tasmādgrāhyagrāhakabhāvavigataṃ tattvena tadavicāraikamanoharaṃ saṃvṛtyā rūpam |
T03n1146u_001:2366: evamityādi nyāyenaiṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmasvabhāvatā yā saivānabhinirvṛttiryā cānabhinirvṛttiḥ svarūpadhāraṇavaikalyānna te dharmāḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2378: yo vā'nyaḥ kaścit sāmānyadharmo bodhyarthaṃ caret sa naivopalabhyata iti vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2389: yasmādyasmin kāle rūpādīnimāndharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tannimittaṃ vyupaparīkṣate naiḥsvabhāvyākāreṇa tasmāttasmin kāle na rūpamupaiti na pratipadyate
T03n1146u_001:2391: yato notpādaṃ na nirodhaṃ vā samanupaśyati |
T03n1146u_001:2395: taḥ kathaṃ na rūpamupaitīti tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
T03n1146u_001:2397: yasmādyāvanutpādāvyayau na tau rūpaṃ saṃvṛtyā rūpasyaiva pratibhāsanāt |
T03n1146u_001:2398: tatra bhāva eva kṣaṇastithidharmā nāśo vyayastatpratiṣedhādavyayaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2405: advayasya nyāyenānutpādādirūpasyaiṣā rūpamityudbhāvanā saṃvṛtyā gaṇanā saṃjñā kṛtā saṅketitā |
T03n1146u_001:2407: dhigamena vinā na prāptiniryāṇamiti tadanu sarvākārajñatāniryāṇaṃ darśayitumāha evaṃ bhagavannityādi |
T03n1146u_001:2412: bhisamayakāle na rūpamupaitītyādiprasaṅgāntareṇa punarāvartitamiti na punaruktatādoṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2423: yāni duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prayojanena pratyanubhavitumutsahate |
T03n1146u_001:2432: saṃvṛtyāpi duṣkaracaryā kathaṃ caryata ityapi na mantavyamityāha |
T03n1146u_001:2435: nanu śirodānādiduṣkaracaryāṃ bodhisattvā eva kurvantīti kathaṃ na duṣkarasaṃjñeti |
T03n1146u_001:2438: yasmādduṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā na śakyaḥ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartuṃ samyakcaryā'
T03n1146u_001:2439: niṣpatterato yo duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ dānādicaryāsu karoti sa sattvārthākaraṇena bodhisattvo na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2442: dānādiṣu mātsaryādyabhāvena sukarasaṃjñāṃ sukhasaṃjñāṃ tathā sattvānāmantike sāmānyena mātrādisaṃjñāviśeṣeṇa vā strīpuruṣeṣu vayasā vṛddhanyūnapramāṇeṣu yathāsambhavaṃ mātrādisaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā yadi bodhisattvaścaryāṃ carati tadārthaḥ śakyate kartumiti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2465: evaṃ saṃvṛtisatyāśrayeṇa caryāyā yā na duṣkarasaṃjñeti pratipādya paramārthasatyāśrayeṇa pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146u_001:2473: evamityādi dharmeṣu tu sarveṇa svalakṣaṇādirūpeṇa sarvaṃ vākyādikaṃ sarvathā kliṣṭatvādiprakāreṇa sarvaṃ sarvaprakāram |
T03n1146u_001:2512: nyāyenānutpannasya dharmasya prāpyaprāpakasya na prāptiṃ grahaṇaṃ prayogāvasthāyāmicchāmi |
T03n1146u_001:2516: naivānutpannena prāpakeṇa dharmeṇānutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyatālakṣaṇā prāpyate |
T03n1146u_001:2529: nutpanna ityabhidhīyate tvayā tathāpi doṣa eva |
T03n1146u_001:2537: ṣṭamyādibhūmāvanābhogavāhijñānalābhāt kathamayatnena prāptiryena muktāḥ syuḥ sarvadehina"iti |
T03n1146u_001:2573: yatra yatra paripraśnīkriyate tatra tatra parihāradānena niḥsarati |
T03n1146u_001:2590: tadapi sarvākārajñatāniryāṇaṃ viśeṣamārgādinā vinā na bhavatītyato'
T03n1146u_001:2593: subhāṣitatvārthatve sādhu sādhu subhūte kintu katamaiṣā sarvadharmāniśritapāramitā yayā bodhyadhigamaḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2628: mārganiryāṇāvasthāyāṃ tadaivaṃ sati prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitāḥ sarvasattvā iti prāptaṃ teṣāṃ manaskārasadbhāvāt |
T03n1146u_001:2635: evaṃ manyate sannapi prajñāpāramitāvihārastadviruddhaviparyāsapravṛttamanaskārasadbhāvāt sarvasattvānāṃ na vyavasthāpyate |
T03n1146u_001:2636: yadā punastvayā mārganiryāṇāvasthāyāmubhayoḥ sahāvasthānena virodho nābhyupagatastadā kādācitkavirodhānupapatteḥ |
T03n1146u_001:2642: bhipretastatra ca śabdapravṛttimātreṇa yadyupālambhaḥ kriyate tadāha |
T03n1146u_001:2644: yato manaskāralakṣaṇa evārtho bhūtapadābhidhānena yathārutābhidhānenāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa parigṛhītastasmāt tvāmapyevaṃjātīyakeṣūttaratravākyeṣu paripraśnayiṣyāmi |
T03n1146u_001:2646: kathaṃ punaramanaskāra eva manaskāro na tu yathāruta iti |
T03n1146u_001:2661: evaṃrūpeṇānantaroktasvabhāvenānena manasikāreṇāviparyāsapravṛttatvādicchāmi viharantaṃ bodhisattvamanena ca prajñāpāramitātmakena vihāreṇa mārganiryāṇalakṣaṇenetyevaṃ niryātavyavastuṣu prativiśiṣṭānyadharmābhāvena sarvadharmānupalambhatayā niryāṇādevamebhiraṣṭābhirniryāṇairniryāṇapratipattirveditavyā |
T03n1146u_001:2667: sarvākārajñātaivānuṣṭhīyamānatvena caryā cittotpādādirūpeṇa hetuphalātmakena niḥśeṣākāratayā samastavastuparijñānāttathāgatānāṃ sambandhinī punaḥpunaḥ parivartate'
T03n1146u_002:1: sarvākārajñatādhigamo na vinā mārgajñatāparijñāneneti mārgajñatāṃ vaktumāha |
T03n1146u_002:7: kṛtakāyādisāmagrīko vihitasamyakpraṇāmo vā svāsane niṣaṇaḥ samupaviṣṭaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:9: sahe lokadhātāvā samantāt patiḥ sahāpatirnāyako devaputro brahmāpi caturthadhyānaprabhavaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:11: ti nyāyādyathākramaṃ prathamādidhyānatrayasya vināśena tasyaiva cirasthāyitayā patitvābhimānādityeke |
T03n1146u_002:13: pi sattvā ihopapadyeranniti praṇidhānānantaraṃ puṇyādikṣayādapareṣāṃ kākatālīyanyāyena tatra samutpāde'
T03n1146u_002:47: evamabhyarthitaḥ subhūtirvigatābhimāna evotpādita bodhicitto mārgajñatādhigame bhavya iti viṣayapratiniyamadvāreṇāha |
T03n1146u_002:52: triyānavyavasthānamābhiprāyikaṃ na lākṣaṇikamiti nyāyādanuttarasamyaksambodhiparyavasāna eva sarvo jana ityato vītarāgetarayogināpi buddhatvaprāptaye mārgajñatā bhāvanīyeti vyāptimādarśayituṃ śrāvakayānādipratipannānāmanuttarasamyaksambodhyabhājanatvenāniyatagotrāṇāṃ prathamato mahābodhāvākarṣaṇārthamanyeṣāñca pravṛttānāṃ sandhāraṇārthamityābhiprāyikaṃ vacanamāha |
T03n1146u_002:56: dhigatāḥ samyaktvaniyāmaṃ svaśrāvakādidarśanādimārgaṃ na te bhavyā yogyā buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāyetyanuttarasamyaksambodhinimittaṃ cittamutpādayitum
T03n1146u_002:57: yatra bālo'pi janaḥ saktastatra kathaṃ viditāryamārgāḥ śrāvakā na śaktā iti |
T03n1146u_002:62: bhavyā eva te punaḥ punarabhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsaraṇāya janmagrahaṇāya |
T03n1146u_002:63: tataścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayitumabhavyā iti sambandhaḥ | etaduktam |
T03n1146u_002:67: punarjanmagrahaṇe sati dānādinā sattvārthakriyāyāmabhyāsādbodhicittaṃ suviśuddhaṃ tathāgatapadaprāpakamupajāyate |
T03n1146u_002:68: ato mahāśrāvakāḥ samucchinnakleśatayā punarjanmākhyamūlakāraṇānivṛttyā tādṛgvidhaṃ cittaratnaṃ kāryātmakaṃ notpādayituṃ śaktā nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt
T03n1146u_002:85: tathāpi na punaḥ kuśalamūlasya bodhicitaprabhavabuddhatvasyāntarāyamasambhavitvena vicchedaṃ mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ karomi |
T03n1146u_002:88: yasmādviśiṣṭebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitrādibhyo viśiṣṭatamā eva bodhicittādayo dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:89: dagdhapunarbhavakleśānāmapi ca śrāvakapratyekajinānāṃ kathaṃ tāsu tāsu gatiṣu janma na virudhyata iti na vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_002:91: sa samyagātmasnehavato duḥkhasukhatyāgāptivāñchāpūrvakastadyathā kāmināṃ strīguṇaparigrahastathā ceśvarādyanadhiṣṭhitasya jantorabhiratipūrvako
T03n1146u_002:92: yaṃ garbhasthānaparigraha ityevaṃ svabhāvahetunā kleśānāṃ traidhātukotpattiṃ prati sāmarthyaṃ pratipādyate |
T03n1146u_002:94: pi pradīpanirvāṇaprakhyanirvāṇasaṃjñino vyativṛtatraidhātukajanmānaścyuticittānantaraṃ pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣṭhanāśrave dhātau samāhitā eva padmapuṭeṣu jāyante |
T03n1146u_002:95: tataste'mitābhādisambuddhabhāskarakararaikliṣṭatamohānaye prabodhitā bodhicittamutpādya muktyavasthāyāṃ narakādicārikāmiva gatiṃ gacchantaḥ krameṇa bodhisambhāraṃ sambhṛtya lokaguravo bhavanti ityāgamānniścitamiti |
T03n1146u_002:96: punarbhavakleśakāraṇanivṛttyā traidhātukotpattikāryaṃ nivartate natvanāśravadhātūtpattiriti kathaṃ virodhastasmāt sarvasmin yāne sarvathaikamahāyānasamavasaraṇadeśanaiva nyāyyā lakṣyate |
T03n1146u_002:100: tathā "ekaṃ hi yānaṃ dvitīyaṃ na vidyate"ityādi |
T03n1146u_002:108: na teṣāmasti nirvāṇaṃ kintu janma bhavatraye |
T03n1146u_002:116: agocaro'pyevamartho vispaṣṭavāgbhiḥ pratyakṣeṇeva prakāśyata iti vismaye sādhu sādhviti dvirabhidhānam |
T03n1146u_002:117: yadi vā svavivakṣitasya vyaktaṃ dyotanāt praharṣe punaḥ sādhuriti vacanaṃ śobhanamevaitadyadvadasīti |
T03n1146u_002:122: yetvavakrāntā ityādi vākyaṃ nītārthamapi tu khalvityādivacanaṃ neyārthamato vyāptyartho buddhagotrakānadhikṛtyeti |
T03n1146u_002:127: pūrvasminnekayānadeśanāpakṣe ye śrāvakādibodhyadhigamapūrvikāṃ mahābodhimadhigacchanti te tāvatkālaṃ vyapadeśena śrāvakādigotrakā vyapadiṣṭāḥ
T03n1146u_002:128: prathamatastu pramuditābhūmyadhigamānukrameṇānuttarabodhibhājo mahāyānagotrakā iti gotrabhedo na vidyata ityalaṃ prasaṅgena |
T03n1146u_002:140: yathetyasmadartha iti sambandho yadi vā yathā'
T03n1146u_002:146: carannityāsaṃsāraṃ sattvārthakaraṇapravṛttatvenotpāditabodhicittasya sarvathā mārgajñatayā kleśāprahāṇamityasyāḥ svabhāvena kleśavaśitāmāsādya dīrghakālaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ sannityanena svabhāvaḥ kathitaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:156: yathoktasvabhāvasya bhūtakoṭerasākṣātkaraṇena prajñopāyakauśalena ca dānādibhiraparigṛhītāsamādāpitāparimocitasattvaparigrahaṇasamādāpanaparimocanādikarma kurvatā sambhṛtasambhāreṇeti kāritramāveditamanyathā'
T03n1146u_002:166: ko'tra pratibandho yathā bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ śrāvakairanuparigṛhīto bhavadbhirapi śrāvakairanye bodhisattvāstathānuparigrahītavyā iti |
T03n1146u_002:169: ayamāśayo yathā pūrvaśrāvakaiḥ svabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmasmadarthe brahmacaryacaraṇaṃ jātamiti pūrvakṛtopakārāvabodhakāraṇena teṣāṃ pratyupakāracikīrṣayā tadantike'
T03n1146u_002:170: smadarthaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caran bhagavān bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ priyatamaḥ śākyamuniranuparigṛhītaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:171: asmābhirapi śrāvakaiḥ śākyādhirājasya bodhisattvāvasthāyāmasmadarthe brahmacaryacaraṇaṃ jātamiti pūrvakṛtopakārāvabodhakāraṇena bhagavataḥ pratyupakārābhiprāyādyuṣmadantike'
T03n1146u_002:174: evaṃ hi vayaṃ bhagavataḥ kṛtajñā iti |
T03n1146u_002:187: viṣayo niyato vyāptiḥ svabhāvastasya karma ca ||1 iti |
T03n1146u_002:191: yasmānmārgajñatādhikāre svamārgaparyantagatimāsādya yānāntaravineyasattvārthaṃ pratyasākṣātkaraṇena sahetukamārgopadeśaparicayakauśalyāt sarvamārgāḥ paripūrayitavyā bodhisattvena tasmāt kāraṇācchrāvakamārgaṃ bhāṣiṣye'
T03n1146u_002:192: haṃ kauśika śṛṇviti sambandhaḥ yathā deve varṣatyapyavāṅmukhe ghaṭe na kiñcidapyudakaṃ praviśati tadvattvamavāṅmukho bhūtvā'
T03n1146u_002:195: yathottānāśucighaṭe yadudakaṃ praviśati tat sarvamaśucībhavatyakāryopagataṃ tadvattvaṃ viparītapratipattyā śrutamaśucīkurvan mā śṛṇvityāha |
T03n1146u_002:197: yathottānaśucichidraghaṭaṃ praviśatyudakaṃ na tu tiṣṭhati tadvattvamasthirapratipattyā mā śṛṇu kintu tathā śṛṇu yathā paṭutarānubhavadvāreṇa cetasi sthirībhavatītyāha |
T03n1146u_002:209: yathā yena prakāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakamārgasvabhāvāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyam |
T03n1146u_002:212: duḥkhādicaturāryasatyasambandhināmākārāṇāmanupalambhe sāmānyoktāvapi viśeṣapratītiḥ pūrvācāryasampradāyādyanusāreṇa bhavatīti nātra sandehaḥ
T03n1146u_002:236: ryaśrāvako nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya ca pratipanno bhavatītyāgamārthaḥ kathitaḥ syāt |
T03n1146u_002:245: tathāca satyamunā krameṇa mahāyāne kecidākārāḥ paryāyataḥ kecicca svarūpato nirdiṣṭā iti nāśrāvakamārgatvaprasaṅgaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:246: tataścaiṣāṃ caturāryasatyasaṅgatānāṃ svabhāvānupalambhabhāvanayā mārgajñatādhikāre śrāvakāṇāṃ mārgo bodhisattvena parijñeya iti |
T03n1146u_002:247: asya cārthasaṃkṣepasya pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ spaṣṭamupalabhyamānatvānna vipratipattiḥ kāryā |
T03n1146u_002:253: yasmānnirvedhabhāgīyādhigamapurvakaṃ catuḥsatyaparijñānaṃ tasmādbodhisattvenoṣmādhigamārthaṃ rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyam |
T03n1146u_002:254: evaṃ vedanādayo yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā yā ca vedanādīnāmadvayametadadvaidhīkāramityabhedato bhāvanīyam |
T03n1146u_002:258: iha subhūte bodhisattvaḥ śūnyatayā sarvadharmānabhedataḥ pratyavekṣata"ityādi ||
T03n1146u_002:265: eṣāmeva pañcaskandhānāṃ na cakṣupītyādinā na smṛtyupasthāneṣvityādinā na śrotaāpattiphala ityādinā ca yathākramaṃ sāśravobhayānāśravavattvena prabhedaṃ darśayatīti hārakārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:267: yāvanna manovijñāna ityatra yāvadgrahaṇena ghrāṇādivijñānātideśaṃ karoti |
T03n1146u_002:268: na buddhatve sthātavyamityanuttarasamyaksambuddhatve yadyādhārātmake rūpādau na sthātavyamevaṃ tarhi vyāvṛttiphalatvāt sarvavākyānāṃ rūpādikamiti tādātmyenāvasthānaṃ prāptamiti kasyacidāśaṅkāniṣedhārthamāha |
T03n1146u_002:273: nupalambhabhāvanayā rūpāderasattvādādhārabhāvanānupapattistasmādeva ca kāraṇāt svarūpavirahe tādātmyenānyathā copagamo na yuktarūpaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:274: sannihitavineyajanaviparyāsanirācikīrṣayā tu kathañcidādhārabhāvena nirdeśānna vyāvṛttiphalamāstheyamato mūrdhādhigamārthaṃ sarvathānupalambhabhāvanā rūpādīnāṃ vidheyeti |
T03n1146u_002:308: imam manuṣyalokamāgamya saṃprāpya duḥkhasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyāntaṃ vināśaṃ kariṣyati |
T03n1146u_002:313: na vidyanta upadhayaḥ skandhāḥ sarvarāgādiprahāṇāvaśeṣībhūtatvena śeṣā yasminnirvāṇe tattathoktam |
T03n1146u_002:319: yasya ca pudgalasya yāvanmātrakleśaprakāraprahāṇena pratipannakatvādivyavasthā tatprāgevoktamiti na punarupanyasyate |
T03n1146u_002:323: ātmānamekaṃ pratinimittabhūtaṃ svabodhiṃ buddhavān svayamiti pratyekabuddhaḥ naivaṃ śrāvake'
T03n1146u_002:339: yadvātra lokadhātāvarthakriyāmadhikṛtya taduktamanyatra tu nirmāṇameghaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvārthakāraṇādaprameyādivacanamaviruddham |
T03n1146u_002:341: tra vilakṣaṇaiva deśaneti na yānāntareṇa saha virodho vācyaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:344: keṣāṃciddānādibhirabhyudayadharmaṃ niṣpādya parinirvāpyeti śrāvakādinirvāṇe kāṃścinniḥśreyasadharme pratiṣṭhāpya |
T03n1146u_002:345: śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksambuddhatvaniyatāniti yasya kuśalanirvedhabhāgīyāderadhigamānniyamenābhyudayaniḥśreyasadharmo prāpyate tatra hetau sthāpanādanyānniyatānniyatagotrasthāniti yāvat |
T03n1146u_002:352: tathā hi ye samagrasthitihetavaste nityamuparatasthitidharmāṇo na bhavanti |
T03n1146u_002:361: na yatnena vinā hāniryatnastu nādoṣadarśanādvivṛddhatadrasāsvādalampaṭasya tasyāmeva buddheḥ pakṣapātāditi |
T03n1146u_002:367: "yasya kasyacidānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā ākāṅkṣan sa kalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā,
T03n1146u_002:368: tathāgatasyānanda catvāra ṛddhipādā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā ākāṅkṣan sa tathāgatakalpaṃ vā tiṣṭhet kalpāvaśeṣaṃ veti" |
T03n1146u_002:371: ayaṃ hi hetuphalayoḥ dharmo yat prakṛṣṭāddhetoḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ phalamaprakṛṣṭāccāprakṛṣṭamiti |
T03n1146u_002:378: tadutpādayannevānyasyāpi yadi nimittatāṃ pratipadyate tadā na doṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:385: kiṃ buddharūpavineyā eva sattvā vidyante kiṃ vā rūpāntaravineyā apīti |
T03n1146u_002:387: āśrayante hi dayāvidheyacetasaśceṣṭāntaramapi janahitasampādanāya yathā bhagavataiva cakravartirūpamāsthitam |
T03n1146u_002:396: tadidamajñāpakaṃ nahīdaṃ paṭhyate kvacit sarveṣveva lokadhātuṣu buddharūpasandarśanavineyāḥ sattvā na santīti |
T03n1146u_002:409: pi satyadhanapālanāya pratijñātārthanirvahaṇamavaśyaṃ tayā sarvaśaktiparikṣayeṇāpi sampādayanto dṛśyante |
T03n1146u_002:411: pratihatajñānaśaktayo na sampādayantīti kaḥ punaḥ sacetanaḥ śraddadhyāt |
T03n1146u_002:424: ata eva dayāmayasya tadāśayasyāparyantamevāvasthānamanyathā na pratijñānurūpamanuṣṭhānaṃ bhavet |
T03n1146u_002:426: tathā hīyaṃ mahākaruṇā sarvasattvaduḥkhaparitrāṇecchākārā tadasyāḥ subhāvitāyāḥ kuto'
T03n1146u_002:429: na vicchedaḥ kintu ye tatkālabhāvino buddhavineyāḥ subhadrāntāste sarve vinītāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:441: svalpataraḥ sa kāla ityapi na samyak |
T03n1146u_002:442: yenābhipretaphalāhitacetaso na kālasya dairdhyamadairdhyaṃ vā gaṇayanti |
T03n1146u_002:445: pi na yatnaḥ prāpnoti bahūnāṃ lokābhyuddharaṇāśayānāṃ vyāpāradarśanādetaireva vyāpṛtāḥ kimatra mayā kartavyamityāśayāt |
T03n1146u_002:451: tiṣṭhantyeva parādhīnā yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā ||
T03n1146u_002:455: tathāhi trāṇārthaḥ śaraṇārtho varṇyate yaśca buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchati |
T03n1146u_002:465: tadupadiṣṭasya pravacanaratnasya trātumadyāpi sāmarthyamastīti tasyāpi sāmarthyamucyata iti |
T03n1146u_002:466: yadyevaṃ na mukhyaṃ tarhi taccharaṇaṃ syāt |
T03n1146u_002:467: na hi tatkāryasya sāmarthyaṃ tasya bhavati |
T03n1146u_002:469: tasya cādhunā sāmarthyamekāntena na pracyutamiṣyata iti |
T03n1146u_002:471: ko vāyamāgamadharāṇāmasthānanirbandho yadamī niṣkāraṇavairiṇo yuktyā gamāntaropetamapyābhiprāyikamāgamārthamullaṅkhya bhagavannirvṛtipratipādanāya sotsāhāḥ santiṣṭhante |
T03n1146u_002:472: bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇābhāve kathaṃ dhātavo dṛśyanta iti cet |
T03n1146u_002:482: avikale kāraṇe sati kāryāsambhavāyogo bādhaka iti viparyaye bādhakapramāṇānnānaikāntikaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:485: pi yaugapadyenāpi bahubuddharūpavineyasattvārtheṣu bhagavantastathāgatāstulyakāraṇavṛttitvācchilāvastabdhamaṇḍūkoddharaṇena pṛthagjanabhūmisthitā iva dayālavaḥ pravartante |
T03n1146u_002:496: ata evaṃ tadrūpasannipāta vineyajanāsambhavānnaikasmin samavadhānamata eva ca naikalokadhātau yugapadbahutathāgatotpattiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:509: tadānena bodhisattvena kathaṃ kena punaḥ prakāreṇa sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyam |
T03n1146u_002:515: yattathāgatasthānaṃ tat kiṃ tvaṃ manyase budhyase |
T03n1146u_002:523: pi bhagavān kathaṃ na kvacitsthita iti |
T03n1146u_002:528: tasmānna kvacidupalambhayogena sthita iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:538: saṃvṛtyā sthānamasthānaṃ vā prajñaptaṃ bhagavata iti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:553: tathā śikṣiṣya iti maulāvasthāyāmevamanena śikṣitavyamiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:555: viśeṣādhigamalābhena suṣṭhu sthito māyāpuruṣasyevānabhiniveśayogena pṛṣṭhāvasthāyāmevamanena śikṣitavyamityatrāpi sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:563: yasmāttathāgatena bodhimabhisambudhya tattvato na keciddharmāḥ samupalabdhāstasmānmāyāsvabhāvā evāmī bhāvāḥ pratibhāntīti |
T03n1146u_002:571: pi śrāvakebhyaḥ kathaṃ prativiśiṣṭāste yena teṣāṃ mārgabheda ityāśaṅkya vaiśiṣṭyapratipādanārthaṃ tāvadāha |
T03n1146u_002:573: yāni tānīti nipātasamudāyatvena yāni kānicit pūrvopaśrutānītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:585: pratyekabuddhāḥ punaḥ svayaṃ pūrvaśrutādyabhisaṃskāreṇa paropadeśaṃ pratyanapekṣāḥ svabodhimadhigacchantyatasteṣāṃ buddhādyupadeśanairarthakamityekaṃ vaiśiṣṭyam |
T03n1146u_002:586: yatastasmātkāraṇāt pratyekabuddhānadhikṛtya yadbhāṣaṇādi na tat sārthakaṃ vijñāyata iti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:593: nyathā na pratyekabuddhānārabhyāryasubhūtinā kiñciduktamiti teṣāṃ kathamayaṃ vikalpaḥ syāt |
T03n1146u_002:596: na vijñāyata iti yaduktaṃ tat sādhūktamiti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:598: vismaye ca vivāde ca kope dainye'vadhāraṇe |
T03n1146u_002:602: tathā hītyādi yasmādaśrotṛsaṃskārakaṃ vākyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāditi nyāyena svayambodhātsvayaṃbhuvāṃ bodhāya na kiñcidatra bhāṣaṇādi śrūyate |
T03n1146u_002:603: tasmāttadarthāya yadbhāṣaṇādi tanna vijñāpaya iti sādhūktam |
T03n1146u_002:604: sālāpadharmadeśanayā parān kuśale śrāvakāḥ pravartayantīti śabdoccāraṇadharmadeśanayā śrotṛbhiḥ kriyate vaktṛjñānasāmarthyāvabodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:605: pratyekabuddhāḥ punarjñeyāvaraṇaikadeśagrāhyavikalpaprahāṇādaśabdoccāradharmadeśanayā svādhigatajñānādisāmarthyena parān daśakuśalādau pravartayantyatasteṣāṃ jñānasya parānavabodhatayā gāmbhīryaṃ dvitīyaṃ vaiśiṣṭyamiti kṛtvā vacanātmakamapi kāryaliṅgabhāṣaṇādi na kiñcidatra tajjñānasvarūpapratipādanāya sūcyate |
T03n1146u_002:608: pratyekabuddhānāṃ svayambodhāt paropadeśanairarthakamityevaṃ rūpaṃ vitarkaṃ parihāradvāreṇa parihariṣyatyevāyamāryasubhūtirityasmākaṃ ceto jātaṃ yāvat tamaparihṛtyānyadeva jñānagāmbhīryaṃ kathayatītyāhurdevaputrāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:618: "eta eva daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svayamabhisambodhatayā gambhīrā idaṃ pratyayānubodhena ca pratyekabuddhajñānaṃ nivartayantī"ti |
T03n1146u_002:626: kathaṃ dharmadeśanā ca nāmāpravyāhārā ca yena vacanakāryaliṅgābhāvena jñānagāmbhīryaṃ sidhyatītyapi na vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_002:627: yato nāvitarkya nāvicārya vācaṃ bhāṣata ityālāpavikṣepau |
T03n1146u_002:629: vikṣepaśca santānakṣobhaṃ gāḍhamādadhātīti matvā yathā buddhena bhagavatā prāgbodhisattvabhūtenaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pravartitam |
T03n1146u_002:632: tathā buddhatvasāmyāt pratyekabuddhairatasteṣāmapi svabodhyadhigamāvasthāyāṃ pūrvaṃ praṇidhānādisāmarthena yasminnarthe yena prakāreṇa yasya śravaṇecchā tasya vijñāne tenaiva prakāreṇāśabdo'
T03n1146u_002:639: śuśrūṣā yasya yasyārthe yatra yatra yathā yathā |
T03n1146u_002:641: pi tasya tasya tathā tathā ||7 || iti
T03n1146u_002:648: evaṃ tarhi nitarāṃ dūrāddūratarādikaṃ praviśāmīti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:651: imāṃ mārgajñatāṃ dharmanidhyānakṣamaṇaviṣayāmaprāpya sa pudgalo na sambhavatyanyathādhigamābhāvādityanena ca mārgajñatāṃ sarvamārgaviṣayiṇīmāha
T03n1146u_002:655: sau viśiṣṭo mārgastatsvabhāvā mārgajñatā kintarhi śrāvakādimārgasvabhāvāpīti |
T03n1146u_002:669: vastudharmo hyeṣa yat svalakṣaṇe vastuni sati tadgrāhakaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānasvalakṣaṇamutpadyate |
T03n1146u_002:671: grāhakavikalpasya punaranādikālīnanirudhyamānarūpādigrāhakavikalpajñānasamākṣiptasvasantānavāsanāprabodhajanmatvānnāyaṃ niyamo grāhyavikalpe satyeva samudaya iti |
T03n1146u_002:672: tasmānmāyāsvabhāvanirmitapadārthasamānā eva te vitathaprakhyātirūpagrāhakavikalpena saṅgatatvāt pratyekabuddhāgrāhakatvenaiveṣṭavyā iti |
T03n1146u_002:677: samāhitāsamāhitāvasthāyāṃ te pratyekabuddhā yathākramaṃ naiva śroṣyantiḥ na sākṣātkariṣyanti grāhakavikalpākāreṇeti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:681: māyānirmitasadṛśā iti kenacidākāreṇeti sādṛśyavacanāt sattvānāṃ māyāsvabhāvatā nirākṛteti prasaṅgāgatavikalpārthamāha |
T03n1146u_002:684: kinna te māyāvitatharūpāstataśca tāttvikasattvāstikaparidīpitaṃ na samyaknirdeśa iti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:687: yathā gajāde rūpeṇa māyā mṛcchakalādibhyo vivekenānupalambhamānatvānnānyā |
T03n1146u_002:696: yathā māyā tathā cāmī sattvādayo bhāvā iti svabhāvahetunā kasyacitprasiddhenārthena prasiddho'
T03n1146u_002:699: pi sattvā māyātmakā evāto na kiñcittāttvikasattvāstitvaṃ paridīpitamiti |
T03n1146u_002:704: na vidyate dvaidhīkāro nānātvaṃ yasya tattathoktam |
T03n1146u_002:706: tadayaṃ vākyārtho yasmādalīkarūpatayā māyopamāste sattvāstasmānmāyā ca sattvāścādvayametadadvaidhīkāram |
T03n1146u_002:712: vyāptāvevaṃ pratipāditāyāṃ kathaṃ māyopamo bhagavān sarvākāraguṇasampado heturityāha |
T03n1146u_002:718: yatra hi nāma nirvāṇamapi prativiśiṣṭaṃ dharmakāyamadvayajñānasvabhāvaṃ māyāsvapnasamānaṃ vadāmi |
T03n1146u_002:719: tatra kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmaṃ rūpakāyaṃ na vadāmi |
T03n1146u_002:722: yasmādyathoktasvabhāva eva bhagavānabhimukhīkriyamāṇaḥ sarvaguṇasampado hetuḥ pramāṇabādhitasvarūpatvenānyathā viparyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:725: anyathā tīrthikānāmiva prādeśikaśūnyatāsadbhāvena bhāvābhyupagamato muktyanupapattirityabhiprāyavān pariharannāha |
T03n1146u_002:730: nirvāṇādanyaḥ kaścit prativiśiṣṭo dharmo na sambhavati |
T03n1146u_002:732: yadi nirvāṇādapi kaścidanyo viśiṣṭataro dharmaḥ sambhavet tadā tamapi dharmaṃ māyādisadṛśaṃ vadeyamiti |
T03n1146u_002:736: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kleśotpattirna taṃ vinā |
T03n1146u_002:742: pi pratyekabuddhānāṃ viśiṣṭo mārga iti kathanāya praśnayannāha |
T03n1146u_002:744: grāhyagrāhakavikalpayoryathākramaṃ prahāṇāprahāṇamityevaṃrūpeṇāsyāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgātmakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kathyamānāyāḥ kīdṛgvidhagotrakāḥ pudgalāḥ pratyeṣakā grāhakā bhaviṣyanti |
T03n1146u_002:747: avinivartanīyā iti nirvedhabhāgīyādhigamenāvaivartikāḥ pratyekabodhau ta eva svabodhyabhilāṣādbodhisattvāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:752: arhanto vā kṣīṇāśravā iti prahīṇasvadarśanamārgāvaraṇatvena pūjārhāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:753: anena ca padatrayeṇa pratyekabodhau yathākramaṃ samudānītagotrakā dharmatāpratilabdhagotrakāsta eva niyatagotrakāḥ pudgalā ityākhyātam |
T03n1146u_002:758: pi pratyekabuddhāḥ kathaṃ na kecit pratyeṣikā iti |
T03n1146u_002:761: atreti pratyekabuddhamārgādhigamakāle paropadeśanairarthakyāt svayaṃbodhena pratyekabuddhānāmiti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:767: tasmādyenaiva kāraṇena nairarthakyena sūcanādi na kriyate |
T03n1146u_002:768: tenaiva kāraṇena kaścit pratyeṣako na bhaviṣyati |
T03n1146u_002:770: yathā'vidyamānasvabhāvamapi nirmitapuṣpaṃ pratiniyatadeśādirūpeṇāvicāraikaramaṇīyatayā pratibhāsate tadvadvastubhūtādhāramantareṇāpi pratiniyatādhigamadharmaprāptiriti sūcanāyā' '
T03n1146u_002:806: yasmānna manonirjātāni tattvataḥ kānicitpuṣpāṇi grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyālīkatvāditi śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:808: anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇīti vacanena puṣpāṇāṃ svarūpamapratiṣiddhaṃ janmaniṣedhāttarhi nityatvamabhyupagataṃ taccāyuktamityāha |
T03n1146u_002:815: tatra grāhyavikalpaprahāṇena pratyekabuddhādhigamaṃ śrāvakebhyo viśinaṣṭi grāhakavikalpaprahāṇābhāvena ca pratyekabuddhebhyo'
T03n1146u_002:817: ādhāreṇa cādhigamasyāsādhāraṇyamiti viśiṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgo yathoktaśrāvakacatuḥsatyākārānupalambhabhāvanayā yathāvastu pratītyasamutpādānugatayā bodhisattvena parījñeyaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:905: evaṃ samudaye nirodhe mārge pratipattavyamityete ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇā darśanamārgaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:910: tathāhi prayogamārge duḥkhasatyādhipateryasya dharmasya pūrvavicāraṇāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā pratyātmaṃ duḥkhasatyānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ yena duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaṃ kleśaṃ prajahāti |
T03n1146u_002:912: yena jñānena kṣāntyanantaraṃ vimuktiṃ sākṣātkaroti taducyate duḥkhadharmajñānam |
T03n1146u_002:913: duḥkhadharmajñānasyānantaraṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntau duḥkhadharmajñāne cānvaya eṣa āryadharmāṇāmiti pratyātmaṃ yatpratyakṣānubhāvijñānamanāśravaṃ taducyate duḥkhānvayajñānakṣāntiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:916: evamavaśiṣṭeṣvapi satyeṣu yathāyogaṃ kṣāntayo jñānāni ca veditavyānīti ṣoḍaśakṣaṇika eva darśanamārgo yuktaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:922: pyapūrvadarśanavaikalyādanvayajñānakṣaṇo na darśanamārga iti dvādaśakṣaṇika eva syāt |
T03n1146u_002:933: ata eva nirodhaḥ sakṣātkṛtastasya cānyathānupapattyā mārgo bhāvitaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:939: muktistvanupalambhadṛṣṭestatparikarmabhūtatvena tadartheva pariśiṣṭākārabhāvaneti yathoditavidhinā niḥsvabhāvā nirātmānaḥ śūnyā iti vā sarvadharmān bhāvayato bhāvanābalaniṣpattau |
T03n1146u_002:941: ko'nyo na dṛṣṭo bhāgaḥ syādyaḥ pramāṇaiḥ parīkṣyate ||
T03n1146u_002:944: nanvekasminneva kṣaṇe sarvākārasya pratividdhatvādākārāntareṇa darśanamārge bhāvanāntarānupapatteḥ pratipannakatvādivyavasthā kathamiti śreyo niryāṇamārgānusāriṇāṃ matiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:954: tatraiva tasya tatpratibaddhāvaraṇaprahāṇāt prāmāṇyaṃ nānyatra kṣaṇikatvādivat |
T03n1146u_002:955: evamāryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityapi na vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_002:974: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T03n1146u_002:988: tadubhayavyatiriktaparadharmābhāvāt kathaṃ rūpādāvanyatra ca prajñāpāramitā na gaveṣitavyeti |
T03n1146u_002:993: ato rūpādyaviśuddhamādhārātmakaṃ viśiṣṭakāraṇaṃ suviśuddhasya tathāgatasya na bhavatīti |
T03n1146u_002:995: tadvyatiriktānyadharmasya tāttvikatve tathaiva viparyāsa iti nāpyanyatra |
T03n1146u_002:999: atastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyata iti |
T03n1146u_002:1005: iti nyāyādrūpādikāraṇamahattvādyanupapattau tadālambananirjātāyāḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā mahattvādikamiti |
T03n1146u_002:1021: pūrvavadākāśāparimāṇatayā teṣāmaparimāṇatā rūpāderniḥsvabhāvatvena śāśvatocchedādyantābhāvādanantatetyevaṃ sarvadharmālambane yathākramaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānam |
T03n1146u_002:1036: evaṃ prathamārambaṇānantatayā hetvākāraṃ pratiṣidhya samudayākārapratiṣedhārthaṃ dvitīyārambaṇānantatāṃ kathayannāha |
T03n1146u_002:1042: nanu yadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyi yatkāryaṃ tattasya heturiti pūrvānto dṛśyate |
T03n1146u_002:1073: yadyucitarūpeṇāpi prakāradvayena sattvānantatā na bhavati kena punastarhi prakāreṇetyāha |
T03n1146u_002:1095: yatretyādi yatra saṃvṛtimātreṇa kācittāttvikī sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā tatra kā sattvānantatā'
T03n1146u_002:1123: ato yatra svalakṣaṇe saṅketaḥ kṛto na tena vyavahārastatkālānanupāyitvāditi śabdavācyakalpanākalaṅkānaṅkitarūpatvādādiviśuddhatvam |
