T03n1146u_002:1124: yena ca vyavahāro na tatra saṅketaḥ kṛtastasya prāgdṛṣṭatvāditi |
T03n1146u_002:1127: evaṃ hi tattvato vācyatvaṃ nirākṛtaṃ na tu vasturūpam |
T03n1146u_002:1129: yogādinā sattvānantatā paridīpiteti śakrābhiprāya eva vyākhyāta ityapare nānumanyanta |
T03n1146u_002:1139: ṛṣayo viśvāmitraprabhṛtayaḥ kiyanmātreṇa yathoktadeśanayā grāhyagrāhakanairātmyaṃ pratividhyopetya dānamudānamadhigamaharṣavacanamudānayanti smodīritavantaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1160: "prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasya vastuto dharmadhātusvabhāvatayā rūpādīnāṃ tathāgatatvāvadhāraṇamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane samudaye dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti
T03n1146u_002:1180: tathāgato'rhan samyaksambuddha ityebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ śāstṛtvasampadaṃ darśayati |
T03n1146u_002:1183: tatra yathaiva te dharmā vyavasthitāstathaiva gadanāttathā dharmadaiśikatvādvaktṛtvasampaduktā |
T03n1146u_002:1191: tadevamaviparītadharmadaiśikatvena sarvakleśaprahāṇena sarvākāradharmāvabodhena ca śāstṛtvasampadasādhāraṇā paripūrṇā ca bhagavataḥ kathitā
T03n1146u_002:1195: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāstu yadyapi bhūtaśāstāraḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇānna tu sarvākāraśāstāraḥ sarvākārasarvadharmānavabodhāt |
T03n1146u_002:1196: bhagavān punaryathoktanyāyena bhūtaśāstā sarvākāraśāstā ceti pratipāditam |
T03n1146u_002:1207: prajñāyāḥ pūrvaparikarmabhūtatvena puraścaraṇaṃ caraṇamiti kṛtvā vidyāyāstu pūrvagrahaṇaṃ tatpariśuddhyā śīlasamādhyoḥ pariśuddhitaḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1208: tathā hi prajñayā cakṣuṣeva paśyaṃstābhyāñca śīlasamādhibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāmiva gacchan gantavyamanuprāpnotīti vidyācaraṇaśabdena tistraḥ śikṣā nirdiśyante |
T03n1146u_002:1211: tathā hi lokottareṇa mārgeṇa śobhanaṃ jñāna prahāṇasampadaṃ gataḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1216: tathā hyātmaviparyāsena bāhyavītarāgā na śobhanaṃ gatāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1218: aśaikṣāḥ punaḥ sarvajñeyeṣu jñānavibandhānna niḥśeṣaṃ gatāḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1222: tathā hi bhagavāṃstriḥkṛtvo rātrestriḥkṛtvo divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate ko vardhata ityādibhirākārairdvitīyaṃ bhavyavinayanaṃ karma darśayati |
T03n1146u_002:1224: bhavyābhavyāllokān vyavalokya bhagavān ye puruṣā eva damyā damanārhā damayituṃ vā śakyā bhavyāstān vinayati |
T03n1146u_002:1229: durdamānāmapi keṣāñcit puruṣadamyānāṃ tīvrarāgadveṣamohamānānāmāryasundarānandāṅgulīmāloruvilvākāśyapamahārājakapphiṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ vināyaka iti pradarśanārtham |
T03n1146u_002:1230: tacca bhavyavinayanaṃ karma yatra sthitaṃ taddarśayati |
T03n1146u_002:1233: tathāpi yatra tvāryasatyadarśanaṃ śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptiśca prajñāyate tatra mukhyato yathārthānuśāsanaṃ bhagavataḥ śāstṛkarmasthitiḥ |
T03n1146u_002:1250: punarapi te devaputrāstathāgatānubhāvena samudaye tṛtīyakṣaṇākāraṃ pratipāditavanta ityāha |
T03n1146u_002:1252: tattvenānutpādarūpāpi saṃvṛtyā prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatāyāḥ samutpādiketi sarvabālajanātikrāntatvādāścaryam |
T03n1146u_003:1: samudaye caturthakṣaṇākāraṃ pratipādayituṃ pratyātmavedyatvena kāṃścitkāmāvacarādīn devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ kṛtvā kāṃścidāmantritavānityāha |
T03n1146u_003:31: "aṣṭame hi darśanamārgakṣaṇe prayojanaṃ bodhisattvasya pramāṇairitarathā hi navame kṣaṇe sattvadhātunirapekṣo nirodhe yatedi"ti |
T03n1146u_003:39: sa eva suparibhāvitatvāt sarvaśūnyatānāmadhigatārthatvena parītopadeśena śakta iti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_003:57: tatra tatrāraṇyādāvupasaṃkrāmato gacchataḥ tadeva caturbhirīryāpathaiḥ kathayannāha |
T03n1146u_003:69: rūpādernijarūpā prakṛtyeva śūnyatetyevaṃ sarvadharmālambane nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntirutpadyata"iti |
T03n1146u_003:74: anena ca satyadvayasamāśrayeṇa sarvākārasattvārthapratipādanena samarthakāraṇanirdeśena prajñāpāramitodgrahaṇādīnāṃ buddhatvameva phalamāveditamiti grāhyam |
T03n1146u_003:76: "dharmadhātupariṇāmitakuśalamūlānāṃ phalaṃ tathāgatatvasya prāpaṇamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambe nirodhe dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
T03n1146u_003:85: mānuṣī vipadyatra prāṇināṃ vyāpāraḥ pratīyate vidyamāno'
T03n1146u_003:87: yato na karmaṇā vinā kiñcidapyasti phalaṃ yathā niṣpanne'
T03n1146u_003:97: imānanantaroktāniyato rakṣāvaraṇaguptisaṃkhyāvacchinnān dṛṣṭadhārmikān pratyutpannajanmasaṅgṛhītān guṇānanuśaṃsān pratilabhate prayogāvasthāyām
T03n1146u_003:101: kiṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dānādyāḥ pañcapāramitāḥ saṃgṛhītā bhavantīti vaktavye ṣaṭpāramitāvacanam |
T03n1146u_003:102: mukhyayā prajñāpāramitayā gauṇasvabhāvayā api prajñāpāramitāyāḥ saṃgrahādityabhiprāyeṇoktam |
T03n1146u_003:112: athavā yasmādādita eva bhaktihetutayā tāvatkalyāṇaṃ tasmāt sādhu śṛṇu |
T03n1146u_003:113: yataśca madhye puṣṭihetutvāt kalyāṇaṃ tata suṣṭhu śṛṇu |
T03n1146u_003:114: yena ca paryavasāne muktihetutayā kalyāṇaṃ tena yoniśo manasikuru |
T03n1146u_003:118: sūtrādidharmaṃ viruddhaṃ grahītavyaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ manasā tato vacasā viruddhaṃ vaditavyaṃ vivaditavyam |
T03n1146u_003:120: yadi vā vyañjanārthobhayavighāṭaghaṭanādvigrahītavyamityādipadatrayaṃ maṃsyanta ityasyānantaraṃ jinajananībhāvanābhirataṃ bodhisattvamārabhyetyadhyāhāryam
T03n1146u_003:125: ata eva teṣāmabhiprāyā manorathā na paripūriṃ niṣpattiṃ gamiṣyanti |
T03n1146u_003:147: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarvopadravapraśamanatejobalatvaṃ pratipādya dṛṣṭāntenāpi samarthayannāha |
T03n1146u_003:168: nanu yatra prāṇakagandhena na nivartet tatra kathamoṣadhyā gandhena pratyudāvarteteti |
T03n1146u_003:172: sāṃvṛte'pi kāryakāraṇabhāve tasyā evauṣadhyāḥ sa tādṛśo bhaiṣajyaguṇo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati nānyasyetyevaṃ balavatī hi sā auṣadhī
T03n1146u_003:179: yāni tānīti nipātasamudāyo yāni kānicidityarthe vartate |
T03n1146u_003:186: na vivardhiṣyanta iti yathākramaṃ śrutacintābhāvanākāle veditavyam |
T03n1146u_003:208: āpadvā tridhā svapratyayajāparā sattvasaṃkhyātapratyayajā parasattvasaṃkhyātapratyayajā ca |
T03n1146u_003:211: "prajñāpāramitodgrahaṇādipravṛttasya tathāgatādibhyaḥ sarvathā sarvarakṣāvaraṇaguptayo bhavantītyevaṃ prajñāpāramitayā sarvadharmālambane mārge dharmajñānamutpadyata"iti |
T03n1146u_003:214: ādeyavacaśceti kṛpayā svayaṃ prāṇātipātādiviratipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā'
T03n1146u_003:220: "ātmanā ca prāṇātipātātprativirato bhaviṣyatītyārabhya yāvat - pareṣāṃ varṇavādī tatsamanujño bhaviṣyati"
T03n1146u_003:224: na ca krodhābhibhūto na ca mānābhibhūta iti |
T03n1146u_003:228: nanu pratipakṣaṃ vinā doṣāpagamābhāve kathaṃ tasyaivaṃ guṇodaya iti |
T03n1146u_003:232: sa ca tena bhāvita iti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_003:239: sattveṣu duḥkheṣu duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣvāghāto vyāpādaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:243: "prajñāpāramitāparigrahabalādeva buddhatvābhilāṣiṇā svayaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā tatraiva pareṣāṃ sthāpanaṃ kāryamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane mārge'
T03n1146u_003:260: "dānādīnāmakṣayaṃ kartumicchatā samyaksambādhau pariṇāmanaṃ smṛtyādibalena kāryamityevaṃ sarvadharmālambane mārge'
T03n1146u_003:262: yathoktairevākārairanyāpadeśanirdiṣṭaiḥ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇā samutpadyanta iti nātra vipratipattiḥ |
T03n1146u_003:278: yadyevaṃ tatrāpi pramuditādibhūmyabhidhāne bodhisattvānāṃ darśanādimārgasya pratipādanātkimarthaṃ punarupādānamiti cet |
T03n1146u_003:280: niḥśeṣahetuphalādhigamāpekṣayā tathāgatānāṃ sarvākārajñatetyabhidhānājjinaputrāṇāṃ tadukto mārgo na bhavatītyāśaṅkāvāraṇārtham |
T03n1146u_003:281: tata eva hetumātramapakṛṣya pṛthagjinātmajānāṃ darśanādimārgātmikā mārgajñatā vyavasthāpyate |
T03n1146u_003:285: kecidarthāntarābhisandhinā yathoktena granthaprabandhenākārārthamanuktvā darśanamārgaṣoḍaśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇameva kevalamanukṛtamiti varṇayantyevamuktānuktanirvedhabhāgīyādyarthapratipādanapareṣu grantheṣu draṣṭavyamiti |
T03n1146u_003:288: bhāvābhiniveśamūlo hi rāgādikleśagaṇastadvirudhaśca nairātmyābhyāsa ityatastaṃ vinā kathaṃ duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntyādiriti cet |
T03n1146u_003:289: naivaṃ,yasmādyathoditavidhinā nairātmyasaṃsūcanaparāḥ sarva evāmī ṣoḍaśākārāḥ sannihitavineyajanahitādhāracikīrṣayā tvevaṃ yathābhihitanānāprakārarūpeṇa nirdiṣṭāḥ santo'
T03n1146u_003:291: darśanamārgānantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktavyatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtterbhāvanāmārgasya kāritraṃ tāvatkathayannāha
T03n1146u_003:306: avatarata ityādi padatrayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ madhyādhimātrādidvitīyatrikavipakṣasya madhyamṛdvādiprakārapratipakṣādhigamayogato vācyam |
T03n1146u_003:315: tenaiva cārthābhidhāne pūrvāśrutānāmevāvagītatā syāditi taddoṣaparihāreṇa pūrvakālaṃ vikṣiptānāṃ paścādāgatānāñca tadarthaśravaṇārtham |
T03n1146u_003:322: pareṣāñca tadvījādhānārthamiti paryāyadeśanānāmaṣṭau prayojanānyevaṃ sarvatra vācyam |
T03n1146u_003:341: saṃkṣiptamātre samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ tadvistarārthe sarvatra kathaṃ samāhitaṃ syādityetadarthaṃ nirdeśadeśanā |
T03n1146u_003:342: tathā vistaramātre samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yogināṃ tatsaṃkṣiptārthe sarvatra kathaṃ samāhitaṃ syādityetadarthamuddeśadeśanetyāgamaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:346: nanu taddeśakṣepaṇāsāmarthyavatā puruṣeṇa kṣiptaṃ śastrādikamantarā virodhopanipātābhāve kathaṃ na śarīre nipatediti |
T03n1146u_003:350: māturabhyāsamānāyā evaṃ mahāvidyādisvabhāvāyāḥ sāmarthyenānantarā gurutvadharmavirodhopanipātānna taddehamanuprāpnoti śarādikamiti |
T03n1146u_003:380: tathā yogijñānaṃ prajñāpāramitāyogābhyāsabalena yathaiva tadabhūdbhavati bhaviṣyati cātītaṃ vartamānamanāgataṃ vastupareṇa parikalpitaṃ,
T03n1146u_003:381: tathaivopadarśitavividhākāraprakāraprabhedaprapañcaṃ bahiriva parisphuradrūpaṃ sphuṭapratibhāsaṃ liṅgāgamānapekṣamavisaṃvāditayotpannaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate |
T03n1146u_003:382: ataścaivaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvatra sākṣāddarśitvābhyupagamādyanna prāptaṃ na vijñātaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ ,
T03n1146u_003:386: śraddhātiśayayogena puṇyamahatvādyatra sthāne tathāgatādīnāmadhigamo jātastatpūjyamiti bodhikāritrānantaraṃ prajñāpāramitādhāradeśapūjyatākāritraṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vaktumāha |
T03n1146u_003:405: nanu viheṭhādyutpattipratighāte sthānasya vyāpārābhāvātkathaṃ tatra viheṭhādi kartuṃ na śakṣyata iti tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
T03n1146u_003:407: ayaṃ vākyārtho ye sarvasattvānāmarthāya mṛdumadhyādhimātravyāpādapratipakṣeṇa maitrīprabhedamabhayamavairamanutrāsaṃ svayaṃ satkṛtya nirantaraṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayanti |
T03n1146u_003:409: teṣāṃ traikālikabuddhānāṃ tatrotpādena tatsthānaṃ viśiṣṭameva jātamato'
T03n1146u_003:410: cintyatvāddhetupratyayasāmagyā bhūbhāgamāhātmyātkāraṇaviguṇotpattyā viheṭhādikāryaṃ na śakyate tatra kartuṃ pratītyasamutpādadharmatābalāditi
T03n1146u_003:418: piteva pitṛbhūta ityupamā vācakabhūtaśabdasyopādānādanyacaityasamānatvena caityabhūtaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśa ityeke |
T03n1146u_003:419: yatra hi nāma pudgalanairātmyadyotikayā ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā ityādigāthayādhiṣṭhito bhūbhāgaḥ stūpo matastatra samastavastunaiḥsvābhāvyaprakāśikāyā māturudgrahaṇādinopetaḥ stūpo nitarāmevetyataḥ |
T03n1146u_003:420: sākṣyeva sākṣibhūta iti tatsvabhāvatve caityameva caityabhuta iti candragomī |
T03n1146u_003:444: sāpi svārthā svaparārthā parārthā ceti mūlabhedena trividhā satī mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedena pratyekaṃ bhedāt trikatribhirnavadhā bhavati |
T03n1146u_003:445: tadyathā mṛdvī madhyādhimātrā ca svārthādhimuktirevaṃ svaparārthādhimuktiḥ parārthādhimuktiśca |
T03n1146u_003:446: evameṣāpi navaprakārā mṛdumṛdvādiprakārabhedena pratyekaṃ bhidyamānā navabhistribhiradhimuktiḥ saptaviṃśatiprakārā bhavati |
T03n1146u_003:482: tadvacanenaiva mātuḥ pūjāyāmadhikaṃ puṇyamiti pratipādayituṃ śakraṃ pratipraśnayannāha |
T03n1146u_003:499: ātmabhāva eva śarīraṃ tasya vā śarīraṃ śilāputrakasyeva śarīramiti nyāyāt |
T03n1146u_003:500: tadeva pratilabhyata iti pratilambhastena tathāgata iti na saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
T03n1146u_003:526: tastaddyotikāyā mātuḥ pūjayā sarvajñajñānasya dharmakāyasya pūjanādvahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T03n1146u_003:528: likhitvā pūjayato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ nirdiśya likhyamānāyāmapi tathaiva pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146u_003:545: na ca punaḥ śraddhāsyantīti karmaphalādau sampratipattivigamāt |
T03n1146u_003:551: dṛṣṭatattvasya śraddhā triṣu ratneṣvāryakāntañca śīlaṃ caturthamavetya prasāda ityanyaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:582: nanu samānābhiprāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ pravṛttau kathameko dvau vā'
T03n1146u_003:602: yasmāt pūrvaṃ bhagavān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣito'
T03n1146u_003:603: nupalambhayogena caryāniṣpādanārthaṃ tathā mayā sarvabuddhaguṇāvāptihetutvena prajñāpāramitā pratisartavyā |
T03n1146u_003:619: tatrāyamartho dhātugarbhastūpapūjātastasyāḥ sakāśānnidānaṃ buddhatvaprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavediti |
T03n1146u_003:623: tathāpyatra sāmānyena kuśalaṃ puṇyaṃ jñeyaṃ rūpadhātāvapyasyārthasya sambhavāt |
T03n1146u_003:641: dhimuktyā samprayuktā yā prajñā sāpi yathādhikatayātra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parimīmāṃsāṃ parīkṣāmāpadyeta kuryāt |
T03n1146u_003:648: bodhisattvānāñca jananīpustakasadbhāvenānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ śravaṇādilakṣaṇaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyena |
T03n1146u_003:649: yata iti śeṣa iti tasmāt sthāpayediti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:650: na kevalaṃ sthāpayedapi tu yathoktenaivāśayena saṃskārādikaṃ kuryādityāha |
T03n1146u_003:660: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika koṭiśa ityādi |
T03n1146u_003:665: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśikāyaṃ jambūdvīpa ityādi |
T03n1146u_003:697: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpaka ityādinā |
T03n1146u_003:702: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ sāhasre cūḍika ityādi |
T03n1146u_003:706: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasra ityādi |
T03n1146u_003:710: akṣiptatāhaṃmānavāsanatvena prathamataḥ svārthādhimukternavaprakārān nirdiśyedānīṃ svaparārthādhimukteḥ prathamaṃ mṛdumṛduprakārārthamāha |
T03n1146u_003:716: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyāḥ dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ |
T03n1146u_003:735: nanu tathāgatasya sarvaprativiśiṣṭatve kathaṃ mātuḥ pūjāyāmadhikaṃ puṇyamiti |
T03n1146u_003:741: yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi yena prakāreṇa śrotṛjanāntarasya cittaṃ sāśaṅkamutpadyate tasya pūrvoktenāpi krameṇa niṣedhanaṃ kriyata eva |
T03n1146u_003:743: nyatroktamuttaraṃ codyañcaikasyāparasya tadeva codyamuttarañca na bhavatīti |
T03n1146u_003:755: yasya guṇasya hi bhāvāddravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalāvitivacanāt |
T03n1146u_003:765: mahānubhāvatvena kṣamādisampannaḥ śakra iti tasyāmantraṇaṃ mārṣeti devaputrāṇāṃ sādhūktatvena tadeva bhagavānāha |
T03n1146u_003:767: nanu sāṃdṛṣṭikaprayojanamantareṇa kimarthaṃ prajñāpāramitā gṛhyata iti kasyacidvitarka iti |
T03n1146u_003:788: pañcakaṣāyocchedakāle kliṣṭe ca lokadhātau śākyādhirājasya tattvādhigamahetutvāt saṃsārottāraṇārthena niruttarā |
T03n1146u_003:791: pi prajñopāyakauśalyena daśakuśalādikaṃ loke prabhāvayantīti kṛtvā samābhāvādasamā |
T03n1146u_003:793: yathoktameva vyākhyānaṃ yuktarūpamanyathā mahāvidyāditvaṃ yadbhagavatyāstat kasya hetorityāśaṅkyāha |
T03n1146u_003:796: tataśca yairmahāsurādiparājayamahārthasiddhiphalapradatvānmahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitetyādigranthaḥ prathamato vyākhyātastaiḥ prakaraṇārtho na lakṣita iti lakṣyate |
T03n1146u_003:797: mahāvidyāditvamanyatrānyathā vyākhyātamato yathoktavyākhyānaṃ granthānugatamapi na saṅgatamiti na mantavyam |
T03n1146u_003:808: tatra prathamadhyānaṃ vitarko vicāraḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti pañcāṅgam |
T03n1146u_003:809: dvitīyamadhyātmasamprasādaḥ prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti caturaṅgam |
T03n1146u_003:810: tṛtīyamupekṣā smṛtiḥ samprajanyaṃ sukhaṃ cittaikāgratā ceti pañcāṅgam |
T03n1146u_003:811: caturthadhyānamupekṣāpariśuddhiḥ smṛtipariśuddhiraduḥkhāsukhā vedanā cittaikāgratā ceti caturaṅgam |
T03n1146u_003:814: prajñopāyaparigrahabalātsāśravāṇyeva bodheraṅgāni kāraṇāni samprayuktāni tulyaṃ pravṛttānītyapare varṇayanti |
T03n1146u_003:832: samāsena caturaśīte rāgādicaritānāmekaikacaritapratipakṣo yāvatā granthena parisamāpyate tāvān grantharāśirdharmaskandha iti caturaśīti dharmaskandhasahasrāṇi
T03n1146u_003:853: oṣadhya eva vā kāścinniśi tārā ivāvabhāsamānāstathocyante |
T03n1146u_003:873: athavā śūnyatorūkaruṇe tajje ca karmaṇi naipuṇyam |
T03n1146u_003:880: iti vacanānna te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyantītyādivacanaṃ na punaruktamāśaṅkanīyam |
T03n1146u_003:881: tathāhi pūrvaṃ darśanamārgādhikāreṇoktamadhunā tu bhāvanāmārgādhikāreṇeti viśeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:887: ko hi nāma dhātūpasarganipātānāṃ niyatamarthaṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ kṣama iti vacanāt |
T03n1146u_003:896: rājādayaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātādyupastambhena taṃjinajananyabhiyuktaṃ muditaṃ kartavyaṃ maṃsyante |
T03n1146u_003:914: "anyatra maitryādyabhiyuktasya hi bodhisattvasya sarve devamanuṣyāḥ suprasannā bhavantī"tyādi |
T03n1146u_003:920: sarīsṛpāḥ sarpāstatpradhānaṃ kāntāraṃ durgasthānaṃ tanmadhyaṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ |
T03n1146u_003:931: bhagavadanujñāyaiva teṣāṃ viheṭhanācittāni jñātvā nivartanārthaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śakraḥ pravartitavāniti jñeyam |
T03n1146u_003:937: yenaiva dvāreṇa kāṣṭhādisaṃskṛtena mārgeṇa ca viśiṣṭabhūpradeśenāgatāstenaiva gatā ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:946: eṣāṃ pratinivṛttyarthaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pravartayetyanujñātamabhyanujñānaṃ śakrasya kṛtam |
T03n1146u_003:953: nyatamasyaikasyāpi saddharmaśravaṇasaṃvartanīyaṃ śubhakarma na samanupaśyāmyato nānugrahaṃ karomi |
T03n1146u_003:984: dhikāro niyogaḥ śravaṇādisvabhāvo yeṣāṃ te tathā |
T03n1146u_003:992: tathāgatāḥ parivārapradānena taduktaśravaṇena ca pūjādibhiśca paryupāsitā yaiste tathoktāḥ |
T03n1146u_003:995: nanu tathāgataparyupāsanādinā mātuḥ śravaṇāderagṛhītasambaddhatvātkathaṃ tena tasyānumānamiti |
T03n1146u_003:999: ata eva tato gaveṣitavyā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryāsambhavāt |
T03n1146u_003:1004: tasmānmātuḥ śravaṇādikaṃ niyamena vāsanāparipuṣṭibījadhānatayā tathāgatapadaprāpakaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_003:1005: taccedamīdṛśaṃ śravaṇādikaṃ kvacitkādācitkatayā viśiṣṭakāraṇāya ca janmakaṃ svakāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭameva tathāgataparyupāsanādikamanumāpayati |
T03n1146u_003:1027: ṣaḍeva pāramitā buddhatve kāraṇaṃ tat kathamekasyāḥ prādhānyanirdeśa iti |
T03n1146u_003:1030: yasmāt trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādīnāṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmenādau pravṛttatvāt pūrvaṅgamāḥ tasmāttadvarṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyañca parikīrtayāmīti
T03n1146u_003:1036: tathābhūtapradānasya phalopabhogena kṣayānna prakarṣagamanamiti praśnādeva gṛhītārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1041: vyatirekamukhenaivaṃ prajñāparigrahabalāddānādīnāṃ pāramitārūpatāṃ nirdiśya prajñāyāḥ pāramitāsvabhāvaṃ pratipādayitumāha |
T03n1146u_003:1052: yathoktanyāyena dānādīnāmantargamāt prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ ṣaṭpāramitākīrtanānnaikasyā eva jinajananyā nirdeśa ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1063: prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇā iti samastāyā māturamī sarve guṇā na bhavanti |
T03n1146u_003:1067: bhagavato'ntikādasyā yaḥ pradeśo mayodgṛhītaḥ sa cānantaramevānyatīrthādinirākṛtau pravartitastasyāmī guṇā ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1070: kintu tāvanmātrapradeśātmikāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ yaḥ kevalamudgrahīṣyatyeva yāvat kevalaṃ svādhyāsyatyeva na tasyaiva kevalamamī guṇā bhaviṣyantyapi tu yo'
T03n1146u_003:1071: pi likhitvā pūjāpūrvakaṃ pustakamātraṃ dhārayettasyāpyanantaraguṇān vadāmītyāha |
T03n1146u_003:1076: likhitvā viśiṣṭodgrahaṇādikāriṇaḥ kaḥ sandeho yadahaṃ rakṣādikaṃ kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1077: tathaiva sādhu sādhu kauśiketi sādhukāraṃ dattvā pañcamaṃ madhyamadhyaṃ vaktumāha |
T03n1146u_003:1086: mā kaścin māṃ vihaṭhenābhiprāyaḥ paryanuyuñjīta codyaṃ kurvītetyevamavalīnacittatā na bhaviṣyati |
T03n1146u_003:1087: nanu sambhavatprajñādiprakarṣatve puṃsāṃ cetoguṇāparijñāne kathamevaṃ na bhavatīti |
T03n1146u_003:1133: tatrāprahīṇakāmarāgānuśayāḥ kāmadhātujāḥ kāmāvacarāḥ prahīṇakāmarāgānuśayā rūparāgābhiniviṣṭā rūpadhātujā rūpāvacarāḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1152: mahāntaṃ raśmyālokaṃ tatra gṛhādāvavagacchati paśyatīti yāvat |
T03n1146u_003:1164: prītireva saumanasyaṃ tajjātaṃ yeṣāmiti te tathoktāḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1178: pūrvaṃ sāmānyena sarvatra śucicaukṣasamudācāratāṃ nirdiśya viśeṣeṇa tātparyārthamāha |
T03n1146u_003:1193: kāye yadbalaṃ vāci yattejo matau yā'
T03n1146u_003:1196: yā tu kāyaśrutiḥ sā mukhye kāye kāyāśrite ca vacasi matau ca guṇakalpanayā veditavyā |
T03n1146u_003:1203: nanu yogācārasya dhyānāhāratvānna kavaḍīkāhāre balavatī gṛddhirasya tu likhitvā mātaraṃ pūjāpūrvakaṃ sthāpayataḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1213: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṅgamaṃ sthāpayetpūjayennodgṛhīyādityādi |
T03n1146u_003:1221: asya prajñāpāramitādhikāre kaḥ prasaṅga iti na vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_003:1224: apanītāvaguṇṭhanikādinā nīcāsanasthena vikṣepadoṣaṃ parihṛtya mokṣakāmāśayena saddharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ |
T03n1146u_003:1226: asyārthasya prathamata eva svārthādhimuktihārakaprārambhe kathitatvāt kimarthamupādānamiti na mantavyam |
T03n1146u_003:1227: yatastatra svārthaparasya sthāpanamuktamatra tu parārthaparasyeti viśeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:1: sa cet kauśikāyaṃ te jambūdvīpa ityādi |
T03n1146u_004:7: kasmādviśiṣṭaṃ rūpakāyaṃ tathāgataṃ parityajya prajñāpāramitāparigraha iti |
T03n1146u_004:14: yasmādetadbhūtārthikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ śarīraṃ dharmakāyastasya mukhyato dyotanātprajñāpāramitā tathoktā |
T03n1146u_004:16: bhūtārthikatvameva dharmakāyasya kuto yasya dyotanātprajñāpāramitāyāṃ citrīkāra iti |
T03n1146u_004:19: yasmāduktaṃ pradeśāntare bhagavatā dharmakāyā māyopamādvayajñānasvabhāvāḥ prajñāpāramitātmakā buddhā bhagavanta ityanena dṛṣṭānto nirdiṣṭaḥ
T03n1146u_004:23: tiprasaṅgadoṣaṃ vidadhyādataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpeṇa niścitatvātkathaṃ māyopamādvayajñānātmakā buddhā bhagavanta iti |
T03n1146u_004:32: syādetatsvasaṃvedanādeva pūrvake jñāne gṛhyamāṇe kāryaṃ pratyānantaryaṃ kāraṇātmakaṃ gṛhītaṃ tathottarasminnapi jñāne gṛhyamāṇe kāryātmakaṃ gṛhītamevānantaryaṃ kāryakāraṇātmakasyānantaryasya tadabhinnasvabhāvatvāditi |
T03n1146u_004:37: tasmādidamasmādanantarambhavatiti paricchedābhāve kāryakāraṇabhāvo niścito na yukto'
T03n1146u_004:42: mā khalu punarimaṃ lakṣaṇavyañjanojjvalaṃ śobhanaṃ kāyaṃ satkāyaṃ he bhikṣavaḥ paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvaṃ manyadhvamiti sādhyadharmaḥ kathitaḥ
T03n1146u_004:43: dharmakāyapariniṣpattito māyopamādvayasākṣātkriyāniṣpattyā niṣpannaṃ māṃ drakṣyathetyanena heturuktaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:44: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito dharmakāyapariniṣpattyā niṣpanno yaduta prajñāpāramitātatsvabhāva ityanena pakṣadharmopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ
T03n1146u_004:46: "yo māyopamādvayajñānabhāvanāpariniṣpattyā niṣpannaḥ sa dharmakāyastadyathā pūrvabuddhā bhagavantaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:49: arthasyātyantaparokṣatvena sākārajñānādibhiśca grahītumaśakyatvādadvayaṃ jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ svapnādipratyayavadarthākāroparaktaṃ bhāvanīyamiti sthitam |
T03n1146u_004:51: ato'sya manaso bhāvanābalāt sphuṭapratibhāsitvaṃ yattadeva tathāgatatvamiti nāsiddho hetuḥ |
T03n1146u_004:52: sapakṣe bhāvānna viruddha ityabhyupagatapūrvabuddhadharmakāyaṃ pratyeṣa dṛṣṭānto'
T03n1146u_004:54: aviparyastaśceṣyate tathāgata iti viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇam |
T03n1146u_004:57: yaṃ rūpakāyastathāgato bhavyasattvaiḥ samīkṣyate nāsau tāttviko dharmakāyaḥ śāstā kintu paramavimalānantaguṇarāśidharmakāyādhipatyādeva teṣāṃ svajñānaṃ tathābhūtarūpakāyākāreṇa pratibhāsate |
T03n1146u_004:59: yaṃ bhagavāniti śāstṛbuddhyā vikalpayanto darśanavandanādibhirabhyudayaniḥśreyasabhājo bhavanti krameṇa |
T03n1146u_004:61: pi hi vikalpasya pāramparyeṇa hitahetutvaṃ dṛṣṭamevānityatvādivikalpabadvastusambandhānna tu kṣipram |
T03n1146u_004:62: yasmādyāvadbhāvābhiniveśena jñeye vijñānaṃ samupajāyate tāvadatasmiṃstadgrahādbhrāntameva tadvijñānaṃ tattvadarśanāddūrībhavati |
T03n1146u_004:63: tasmādyathā māyākāro bhāvavatpratibhāsamāneṣvapi hastyādiṣu svanirmiteṣu bhāvarūpatayā satyā eta iti nābhiniviśate |
T03n1146u_004:65: nabhyastamahāyānasvarūpapeṇāpyādikarmikeṇa satā kṣipraṃ tāthāgatīmavasthāmavāptumicchatā tathāgatādhipatyabhāvini svajñānapratibimbake rūpakāyatathāgate jagadgurāvabhiniveśayogena pratipattisārā śraddhā vidheyeti |
T03n1146u_004:71: nanu bhede sati kathaṃ mātuḥ pūjayā tathāgatapūjeti |
T03n1146u_004:75: yasmādīdṛśāḥ sarvalokābhyudgatamūrtayo buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāto niṣpadyante |
T03n1146u_004:78: yadāśrayeṇa yatpūjyaṃ bhavati tatpūjāyāṃ tadeva pūjitaṃ bhavati ityetadeva dṛṣṭāntapūrvakaṃ spaṣṭayannāha |
T03n1146u_004:80: sudharmā nāma devasabhā sumerusthitasudarśananagarasya bahireva dakṣiṇapaścime sthitā |
T03n1146u_004:89: maheśākhyā cāsau mahānubhāvasaṃjñakatvena hetupratyayabhūtā ca yathākramamupādānasahakārikāraṇabhedāditi tathoktā |
T03n1146u_004:95: ato na tānyapūrvasarvajñatotpattiṃ hetupratyayabhūtāni kintu niṣpatterūttarakālaṃ sthitihetutvenāśrayabhūtānīti |
T03n1146u_004:101: api tu khalu punarityādikāraṇavacanaṃ gatārthamapi prasaṅgāntareṇoktatvānna punaruktam |
T03n1146u_004:110: suviśuddhāt kāraṇāt samutpannaṃ phalaṃ suviśuddhamevopajāyata iti kṛtvā |
T03n1146u_004:111: yasmāt prajñāpāramitayā mahānubhāvatvotpādanena paribhāvitāstathāgatāḥ sarvathā vāsitāstasmāttadutpattyā pūjāṃ labhanta iti |
T03n1146u_004:140: samastaṃ vastreṇa pariveṣṭayitvā tadekadeśena vā baḍgheti jñeyam |
T03n1146u_004:154: yasmādvikalpasya svākāraṃ bāhyarūpeṇādhyāropya pravartanādatasmiṃstadgraheṇa svayamavidyāsvabhāvasya sadbhāve'
T03n1146u_004:156: tasmānnityasamāhitānāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitājñānaprabhāvato yathādhimuktibhavyānāmasaṃkīrṇadeśanānirbhāsāḥ svajñānapratyayāḥ samupajāyanta ityevaṃvidhapratyayānusāreṇa teṣāṃ deśanā bhagavatāṃ vyavasthāpitā |
T03n1146u_004:157: ataḥ śuddhalaukikajñānasammukhībhāvo muninaivaṃ prakāśita ityādivineyajanahitādhyavasāyena kvacitsaṅgītikartṛbhiruktaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:160: tathedānīntanānāmapi dharmabhāṇakānāṃ deśanā bhagavataḥ parasparāvalāyātatvena prajñāpāramitājñānādhipatyanirjātatvāt pūjyetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:185: "yasmānmātuḥ prabhāvena bhagavān prayogāvasthāyāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cittānuṣṭhānāni prajānāti pṛṣṭhāvasthāyāṃ saṃpaśyati,
T03n1146u_004:202: yathā ca pūrvaṅgamā bhavati tathā prāgāveditam |
T03n1146u_004:212: apāramitāvyavacchedātpāramitārūpeṇa viśeṣo na ceti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:218: atadrūpaparāvṛttyā na ca chāyāviśeṣastathaivaikaśabdavācyatvānna ca nānākaraṇam |
T03n1146u_004:227: etāvatyeva svaparobhayārthabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakāratvenādhimuktiḥ saptaviṃśatiprakāraiveti na vipratipattiḥ kāryā |
T03n1146u_004:233: yathoktena ca granthaprabhānena kramāduttarottarādhikānuśaṃsāpratipādanapareṇānyāpadeśena sarva evāyamadhimuktimanaskāraḥ paridīpitaḥ |
T03n1146u_004:241: bhyupagamyamāne yāvānanuśaṃsaḥ sambhavati tāvataḥ sakṛdevābhidhānādgranthaprabhānasya nirarthakatā syāditi pūrvācāryāḥ |
T03n1146u_005:0: yathādhimokṣadṛṣṭadharmalakṣaṇāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratipravṛttasyādhimokṣamanaskārasya prathamadvitrinavāvasthānāṃ bhāvakabodhisattvasya yathākramamutsāhanāya pratyekaṃ navabhiḥ prakārairuttarottarābhinandanaṃ stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca buddhādibhiḥ kriyata ityadhimokṣamanaskārānantaraṃ prathamaṃ stutimātrāṃ nirdiśannāha |
T03n1146u_005:17: kṛpāpūrvakaṃ dānāśayasyādhikyena tayormadhye satkārādipuraḥsaraṃ tathāgataśarīra yo dadyāt so'
T03n1146u_005:22: punaraparaṃ kauśiko yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatretyādinā |
T03n1146u_005:23: paṭutaraśraddhendriyādiyogena pātrībhūtatvādbhājanībhūtā yatra magadhādau deśe sthitāḥ |
T03n1146u_005:26: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpa ityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:32: mumityutpāditabodhicittaṃ samāsato granthārthaśikṣaṇādgrāhayedimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmiti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_005:39: tatra ca samprajanyena samyagupalakṣaṇatayā layauddhatyadoṣāpanayanādyathākramaṃ vineṣyatyanuneṣyati |
T03n1146u_005:50: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpe sarvasattvāḥ |
T03n1146u_005:53: dvisāhasre madhyama iti hārakacatuṣṭayena yathāsaṃkhyaṃ caturthī pañcamī ṣaṣṭhī saptamī ca stutimātrā nirdiṣṭā |
T03n1146u_005:54: kintu sarvatra samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayeditiparyantanirdiṣṭapadānantaraṃ pūrvoktahārakāttat kiṃ manyasa ityādi yāvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavedityanuvartanīyam
T03n1146u_005:56: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasra ityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:57: ataḥ khalu punariti daśakuśalasamādāpituḥ pratiṣṭhāpayituśca sakāśādityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_005:63: cāturmahādvīpake sāhasre dvisāhasre trisāhasre ca lokadhātau sarvasattvān dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattyabhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayediti hārakacatuṣṭayena yathākramaṃ dvitīyā tṛtīyā caturthī pañcamī stobhamātrā nirdiṣṭā |
T03n1146u_005:64: sarvatra ca hārakacatuṣṭaye pratiṣṭhāpayediti padānantaraṃ pūrvoktahārakāttat kiṃ manyasa ityārabhya yāvadbhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmityetatparyantamanuvartanīyam
T03n1146u_005:68: punaraparaṃ kauśika ya ityādinā aṣṭamīṃ stobhamātrāmāha |
T03n1146u_005:71: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T03n1146u_005:73: iti vacanāt pratīyamānapadārtha eva hi prajñāpāramitā kasmādupadiśyata ityabhiprāyavānāha |
T03n1146u_005:86: kiṃ hetukā kiṃ svarūpā ca sā yena taddhetusvabhāvaparityāgāt parihrīyata ityāha |
T03n1146u_005:104: dharmatātmakasya ca rūpasya kalpitarūparahitatā vināśo rūpānityatā prajñāpāramitā ityupadekṣyanti |
T03n1146u_005:109: yathoktena ca nirdeśena dharmadharmiṇoranirākaraṇe viparyastabhāvābhiniveśānna muktirityabhiprāyavānāha |
T03n1146u_005:110: na khalu punaḥ kauśika rūpavināśo rūpānityatā draṣṭavyetyādi |
T03n1146u_005:112: bhāvābhāvādiviparyāsābhiniveśamūlasya savāsanakleśajñeyāvaraṇasya samyak prahāṇahetutvena tathāgatatvapadaprāpaṇāt pratipattavyeti matiḥ |
T03n1146u_005:116: śraddhādipūrvakaṃ prajñāpāramitāpustakadānaṃ tatsandarśanādikañca sāśravaṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvakārthakāriṇaḥ sakāśāduttarārthakāriṇo bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti
T03n1146u_005:120: yasmādvipulavimalānantaguṇarāśitathāgatatvādisarvāryadharmāṇāṃ jinajananyā hetutvena sutarāmeva śrotaāpattiphalamataḥ prajñāpāramitātaḥ sambhavati
T03n1146u_005:122: vikalakāraṇasvabhāvatvāt śrotaāpattiphalasyānyasya ca prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvasya buddhatvāderdānādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T03n1146u_005:124: punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:128: punaraparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvānanāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:132: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvānarhatve pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:136: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pratyekabuddhatve pratiṣṭhāpayedityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:140: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvantā jambūdvīpe sattvāsteṣāmapi sarveṣāmityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:144: prayogamārgeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan darśanamārgeṇa bṛddhiṃ bhāvanāmārgeṇa virūḍhiṃ bodhisattvaviśeṣamārgeṇa vipulatāṃ gatastathāgatabhūmau paripūrayiṣyati |
T03n1146u_005:148: nanu bodhicittotpādanapūrvakaṃ pustakadāturadhikārthakāriṇaḥ sakāśāt kevalapustakamātradātuḥ kathaṃ puṇyamahattvamiti |
T03n1146u_005:154: "yasmādavaivartiko bodhisattvo niyatamabhisambudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhāntakāritvena viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyakṣetramatastasyaiva pustakadāturbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ na tu bodhicittotpādanapūrvakamaniyatagotrapudgalāya pustakadāturi"ti |
T03n1146u_005:158: nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayedityanantaraṃ yaścānyaḥ kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitetyādigranthaḥ pūrvokta evānuvartanīyaḥ
T03n1146u_005:160: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātāvityādinā tathaivātra hārakānte grantho'
T03n1146u_005:163: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasracūḍikāyāṃ lokadhātāvityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:168: punaraparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jambūdvīpe sattvāste sarva ityādinā |
T03n1146u_005:171: nuśāsataśca bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ kiṃ tarhyanabhisambudhyāpīti pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146u_005:185: yasmāccundasya karmakāraputrasya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya parinirvāṇākāla samaye bhagavataivoktamāgame |
T03n1146u_005:189: yañca piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya tathāgatottarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhaḥ yañca piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ
T03n1146u_005:193: nanu bhāvanābhyāsādāsannībhāve sati kathamavavādānuśāsanībhyāmāsannībhāvo nirdiśyata iti |
T03n1146u_005:217: tatra te stutyādaya uttarottarapuṇyamahattvasya pratipādanāttatsvabhāvatvena nirdiṣṭā yathābhūtārthādhigamamātralakṣaṇā nārthavādādirūpā yathoktaprabhedā eva pratipattavyāḥ |
T03n1146u_005:219: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati |
T03n1146u_005:221: evañca kṛtvā tatra tatra sūtrāntare nidāneṣu yaduktaṃ sarvabodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvabuddhastutastobhitapraśastaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavān viharatīti tadupapannaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_006:2: sa ca vyāvṛttiviṣayabhedādanekavidha ityādau viśeṣapariṇāmanāmanaskāraṃ nirdiśannāha |
T03n1146u_006:4: tatra maitreyo nāma samādhistallābhātkasyacit samādhermaitreyatvaṃ phalaṃ tadadhigamāt |
T03n1146u_006:5: pūrvapraṇihitamaitrīphalābhisamayādīdṛśā vā guṇāstena maitrīvimokṣamukhaprabhāvitatvādarjitā yenāsau maitreyo jāta iti maitreyaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:9: anumodanāpūrvikā pariṇāmanā tathāgatānuttarasamyaksambodhyanupalambhālambanena manaskāreṇa pariṇāmanādviśeṣapariṇāmanāmanaskārastayā ca sahagatamiti samāsaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:10: tathāhi parakīyaṃ dānamayādipuṇyakriyāvastu vakṣyamāṇānumodanāmanaskāreṇānumodya bodhau pariṇāmayitavyamityayamapi prakāraḥ sambhavati |
T03n1146u_006:11: tathā cānantarameva vakṣyatyevamanumodyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeteti |
T03n1146u_006:16: śreṣṭhāgratāpi dvividhā varatayā copāyakauśalena pravaratayā ca prajñāpāramitayetyāha |
T03n1146u_006:19: ubhābhyāṃ nānyat praṇītamiti kathanāyoktaṃ praṇītamākhyāyata iti |
T03n1146u_006:33: pūrvapaścimadakṣiṇottarāsu dikṣu yathākramamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇācintyāsu sthitā lokadhātavo yathāsaṃkhyamaprameyāprameyeṣvityādinā nirdiṣṭāḥ
T03n1146u_006:45: athavā sarvākārajñatā mārgajñatā sarvajñatā sarvākārābhisambodho mūrdhābhisambodha iti pañcabhirabhisamayaiḥ prahātavyavastuprahāṇādyathākramaṃ chinnavartmanāmityādi pañca padāni |
T03n1146u_006:46: taireva pañcabhirabhisamayaiḥ prāptavyadharmādhigamayogādyathāsaṃkhyaṃ svapahṛtabhārāṇāmityādi pañca padāni vācyāni |
T03n1146u_006:48: anāśravaṃ śīlaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandhaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:60: abhijñāpāramiteti bauddhī sarvābhijñā ṣaṣṭhī vā grāhyā |
T03n1146u_006:62: kathaṃ prakṛṣṭāpi satī jñānapāramitā na nirvikalpeti ceducyate |
T03n1146u_006:63: yasmājjñānapāramitā nirvikalpajñānapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ jñānaṃ yena jñānenādhigamaṃ paricchidya svayañca dharmasambhogaṃ pratyanubhavati parāṃśca paripācayati
T03n1146u_006:64: taccaitannirvikalpajñāne dvayamapi nāstītyato na nirvikalpā jñānapāramitā |
T03n1146u_006:101: dharmasya svādhigamasya dyotikayā prajñāpāramitādeśanayā cakravatpunaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇārthena pravartanaṃ vineyasantāne vistārīkaraṇam |
T03n1146u_006:123: tathā triśaraṇagataṃ pañcaśikṣāpadaparigṛhītamupāsakaṃ ma ācāryo dhārayatviti vinaye dvidhā pāṭhāt |
T03n1146u_006:129: atītatathāgatasambandhena nirdiṣṭatvādaikadhyamekaprakāratvamabhisaṃkṣipya cetasyadhyāropyāprameyatvādirūpeṇa piṇḍayitvā gaṇayitvā bodhisattvādi-yāvattiryagyonisambandhena tulayitvā pramāṇīkṛtya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇayā'
T03n1146u_006:132: karturāśayādatiśayaśraddhātiharṣaṃ svayaṃ tat sarvasampādanāśayātiśayaṃ kuryāditi yāvat |
T03n1146u_006:155: vidyamānānyevādhyāropya yathodbhāvanāsaṃvṛtyā viṣayīkriyante kiṃ tattvatastathaiva samupalabhyanta ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:162: iti matiḥ | vikalpaviṣayasyādhyāropitatvenālīkatvāt pratyayādhīnavṛttitvācca svapnamāyāmarīcivannaivopalabhyante tattvata ityāha |
T03n1146u_006:172: na bhavediti kathaṃ tasyeti pūrveṇa sambaddhādapitu bhavedityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:174: tasmādanyathā saṃjñādīnāṃ viparyāsatvapratipādanena prakṛtārthāvirodhānna kiñciduktaṃ syāt |
T03n1146u_006:186: "yasmādavidyamānaṃ nityatvādikamanityatvādidharmayukte vastunyadhyāropya tadeva punaḥ punarālāmbyotpadyamāno rāgādiviparyastasaṃjñādihetukatvena saṃjñāviparyāsādirūpaḥ samutpadyate |
T03n1146u_006:200: yadi yathāvastvādikamasaṃvidyamānaṃ tathābodhicittādikaṃ tadā katamairvastvādibhiḥ katamaṃ cittādikaṃ kva bodhau pariṇāmayati |
T03n1146u_006:201: yāvatā naiva kenacit kiñcit kvacit pariṇāmayatyataḥ sarvathā pariṇāmānupapattau pariṇāmaviparyāsa iti |
T03n1146u_006:203: pyanityādivikalpavat pāramparyeṇa bhūtārthaprāpakaḥ saṃvṛtyā vastvādervidyamānatvena pariṇāmanāmanaskāra iṣyata evāto na kiñcidadhikaṃ tvayoktamityabhiprāyeṇāha
T03n1146u_006:205: athavā tasmin vastvārambaṇādau pāramārthikābhiniveśavigamena saṃvṛtyā māyāpuruṣasyeva pariṇāmanānna viparyastapariṇāma iti abhiprāyavānāha |
T03n1146u_006:218: yo vā kalyāṇamitropastabdha iti pṛthagjanasyāpi kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhitatvenobhayasatyasvarūpavijñānāditi bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:226: taccittamityanumodakaṃ pariṇāmanākāle kṣīṇamupacayavināśānniruddhaṃ prabandhavināśena vigataṃ prakṛtivināśādvipariṇataṃ vikāravināśena |
T03n1146u_006:230: evañcātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastusarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyamiti vacanena paurvāparyapratipādanānnaikasmin kṣaṇe dvāvanumodanāpariṇāmanāmanaskārau bhavata iti pratipāditam |
T03n1146u_006:231: tasmāt samānakartṛtvektvāpratyayavidhānādekameva cittaṃ pūrvamanumodya paścāt pariṇāmayatītyuktam |
T03n1146u_006:232: taccāyuktaṃ yato nityasya kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāvirodhāt kṣaṇikatvenānumodakaṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmanākṣaṇenāstyatastena kathaṃ pariṇāmayatīti
T03n1146u_006:237: yatastasmāt katamadvā taccittamanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yaccittaṃ vyatiriktaṃ karmabhūtamanumodakaṃ cittaṃ kartṛbhūtaṃ pariṇāmayati
T03n1146u_006:238: na ca tenaiva cittena tasyaiva pariṇāmanā yuktā svātmani kāritravirodhāditi matiḥ |
T03n1146u_006:239: atha matamanumodanācittānantaraṃ viśiṣṭacittakṣaṇotpādādanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yaccittaṃ prāptaṃ tatpaścāt pariṇāmanācittena pariṇāmayitavyamityayaṃ tasya vākyasyārtha"iti |
T03n1146u_006:246: bhāva ityevaṃ yadā dvayoḥ pariṇāmanīyapariṇāmakayoḥ prathamadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvinościttayoḥ samavadhānasambhavo nāsti tatkathaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇabhāvinā pariṇāmanācittena prathamakṣaṇabhāvicittamanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu pariṇāmayituṃ śakyamiti |
T03n1146u_006:247: pūrvacittānutpādatā tarhi vidyamānā pariṇāmyata iti cet |
T03n1146u_006:254: saṃvṛtyābhyupagatabhāvānāmarthakriyākāritvena kṣaṇikatve sati viśiṣṭotpattikriyāsamāveśaṃ muktvā na vai kaścit kriyāntarasamāveśaḥ sambhavati
T03n1146u_006:258: kṣaṇena vyavahārāyogādbālajanānurodhena santānāpekṣaṇāt sāmayikatvena ca śabdavṛterevañcātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānumodyānumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyamityanena vākyenoktamāryamaitreyeṇa karmakartṛkriyādirūpatayā |
T03n1146u_006:259: tatra ca vastubhāgaṃ parityajya śabdamātramevaṃ gṛhītvā bālajanottrāsakaro vikalpo na kārya iti |
T03n1146u_006:261: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeteti prāk svavacanādāryasubhūtināpi saṃvṛtipakṣe yathokta evābhiprāyo'
T03n1146u_006:269: parigṛhṇatā suparigṛhītaṃ pariṇāmayatā supariṇāmitaṃ kathaṃ bhavatīti yojyam |
T03n1146u_006:275: pariṇāmayāmīti vācā pariṇāmanādvikalpena pariṇāmaḥ kṛtastasmāt sarvasyaiva vikalpasya prakṛtyā svabhāvapratibhāse'
T03n1146u_006:287: idaṃ tadvartamānaṃ pariṇāmakañcittamityabhiniveśena tattvato yathā taccittaṃ na sañjānīte na pratipadyate |
T03n1146u_006:288: tathā yadi pariṇāmayati tadaiva samyaganupalambhahetupravṛttatvānna sañjñāviparyāsa ityādi yojyam |
T03n1146u_006:290: "yadi tasya vikalpasyāviṣayasya viṣayavattāṃ gṛhṇīyāttadā bhrānto bhavet |
T03n1146u_006:296: ceto nirviṣayaṃ vetti tena bhrānto na jāyate ||
T03n1146u_006:297: iti nyāyena pariṇāmyamānacittādāvapi māyāpuruṣasyeva vartanānna viparyāsa ityāha |
T03n1146u_006:314: nanu pariṇāmayāmīti śabdollekhena pariṇāmanādvikalpaḥ samākṣiptastasya ca prakṛtyā svapratibhāse'
T03n1146u_006:320: yadyāropitasya tāttvikasya ca rūpasya vibhāgaṃ na jānīyāttadā dṛśyavikalpyāvarthāvekīkṛtya svapratibhāse'
T03n1146u_006:323: līkarūpeṇa niścinvan saṃvṛtyā svalakṣaṇañca vastu nirvikalpakajñānagocaraṃ pṛthageva māyopamātmakaṃ māyopamātmanā'
T03n1146u_006:324: vitatharūpeṇa paśyan yadā pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate na ca pariṇāmyamānaṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmakañcittaṃ jānātītyapi pratipadyate |
T03n1146u_006:329: nanvavabodhamantareṇa pravṛttyasambhavāt kathaṃ jānāno na pariṇāmayatīti |
T03n1146u_006:342: yadi śāntā ityādyevaṃrūpeṇa bhāvato na sañjānīte tadā samyak pravṛttatvādevamiyaṃ tasya prajñāpāramiteti yojyam |
T03n1146u_006:352: buddhipūrvakatvād vyāpārāṇāṃ kathaṃ pratipadyamāno na pariṇāmayatīti |
T03n1146u_006:355: niṣedhyābhāve niṣedhānupapattau tatra śūnyatvādau tattvābhiniveśo viparyāsa ityabhiprāyaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:370: evaṃ smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā devadattādirna manasikaroti kiñcittathāpi pūrvavanna samanvāharati |
T03n1146u_006:372: yadi nimittākāreṇā nimittākāreṇa ca na pariṇāmastadā kathaṃ tarhi kriyatāmityāha |
T03n1146u_006:377: na cāpi vinā viparyāsaprahāṇena pūrvopalabdheṣu rūpādiṣu paṭutaratadanubhavāhitamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum |
T03n1146u_006:384: tacca viparyāsabījaṃ yoginaḥ prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ samyagjñānālokenādarśanānna bhavati |
T03n1146u_006:385: evaṃ satyutkhātamūlā iva taravo nirmūlatayā durvikalpāścetasi tattvato na punarvirohantītyevaṃ tannimittaṃ tathāgatakuśalamūlapariṇāmakañca cittaṃ māyopamatayā samanvāharati |
T03n1146u_006:393: nanu bhinnatvādupāyakauśalaśikṣāyā mātuḥ śravaṇādinā kaḥ sambandha iti |
T03n1146u_006:397: dānādīnāmanupalambhena yā prajñāpāramitāyā pariṇāmanākriyā saiva yasmādupāyakauśalaśikṣā tasmānmātuḥ śravaṇādikaṃ vinā na bhavatī"ti |
T03n1146u_006:401: nanu bhinnatvātpariṇāmasya prajñāpāramitayā saha kaḥ sambandha |
T03n1146u_006:405: nutpādānniruddhā hi ta ātmabhāvā niruddhā hi te saṃskārā iti dvayamuktam |
T03n1146u_006:406: prayogamaulapṛṣṭhāvasthāyāmupalambhābhāvena ta eva yathākramaṃ śāntā viviktā virahitā upalabdhita iti yojyam |
T03n1146u_006:407: athavā tadākāreṇa nirākāreṇānyākāreṇa ca jñānena grahītumaśakyatvādyathākramaṃ vācyam |
T03n1146u_006:410: nutpādāt pariṇāmakajñānapathātītatvena yasmāt pariṇāmānupapattistasmādvikalpenādhyāropya prajñāpāramitābalena māyopamadharmatādhimokṣādaviparyastaḥ samyagupāyakauśalapariṇāmaḥ śakyate kartumiti |
T03n1146u_006:412: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgala ityādi |
T03n1146u_006:413: śūnyatādyekarūpeṇa grahaṇānnimittīkṛtya punaḥ punarmanasikaraṇādvikalpya ca yathābhūtamapagatabhāvābhāvādirūpaṃ tattvaṃ paścātsvavikalpapratibhāse'
T03n1146u_006:416: rthādhyavasāyena yathābhūtasañjñī pāramārthikasañjñī san vikalpapratibhāsitamarthamupalambhamanupalambhebuddhatve pariṇāmayediti vākyārthaḥ
T03n1146u_006:422: yasmāt pudgalaḥ śūnyatādyākāratayā parinirvāṇamanuttarāṃ bodhiṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca svavikalpapratibhāsenākāreṇa tathaiva copalabhate
T03n1146u_006:424: nanūpalambhasya manaḥprasādādikāritvāt kathaṃ tatsañjñinaḥ pariṇāmanā na mahārthakarī"ti |
T03n1146u_006:440: nanvādikarmikasya manaḥprasādādikāritvāt kathamupalambhaḥ sadoṣo yena tatsaṃjñinaḥ pariṇāmo nāstīti |
T03n1146u_006:452: yathā sarvamārgānupalambhālambanena manaskāreṇa pariṇāmyamānasya svahastaṃ prayacchanti |
T03n1146u_006:471: nanu kāmādidhātāvatītādikāle cāvasthitasya cittakṣaṇasya pariṇāmāt kathaṃ tatra na pratisthita iti |
T03n1146u_006:474: etaduktam tryadhvatraidhātukasya tattvenānutpādādaparyāpannatve kathaṃ tatra sthitaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:476: yatrāpi dharma iti buddhatve dharmadhātuvat kṣayabhāvādavinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:483: anyathāryamaitreyeṇopadiṣṭatvāt kathamanyaṃ prati sādhukāraḥ sādhuḥ syāt |
T03n1146u_006:506: gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu samyaksambodhiprasthitasarvasattvānāṃ tāvadbhiradhikairvā sopalambhaiḥ sarvaiścīvarapiṇḍapātādibhistāvataḥ kalpānupasthānakaraṇapuṇyādadhimātrabhūtāttadanupalambhālambanamanaskāreṇānumodanāpūrvakapariṇāmasyādhikapuṇyatvenādhimātropādhibhedādadhimātramahāpuṇyodayapariṇāmanāmanaskāra iti samudāyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:521: te sarve samyaksambodhisaṃprasthitāḥ sattvā yathoktāparāparalokadhātusthitasarvasattvānāmetena paryāyeṇaikaikasattvakrameṇopasthānāttacca dānamupalambhasañjñino dadyuriti yāvat |
T03n1146u_006:523: tānanyān yathoktalokadhātusthitān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya kṛtvā punastāneva sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvastāvataḥ kalpānupatiṣṭhediti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:526: yathā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānekaṃ bodhisattvameko bodhisattvaḥ samupatiṣṭhedevaṃ sa evaiko bodhisattvo'
T03n1146u_006:527: nena gaṅgānadīvālukopamakalpāvasthānakrameṇa teṣāmaparāparanirdiṣṭalokadhātusaṅgṛhītānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sukhopadhānārthaṃ dānaṃ dadyādevamanantaroktakrameṇa
T03n1146u_006:534: pi kathaṃ yāvadupaniṣadamapi na kṣamata iti |
T03n1146u_006:538: yasmātteṣāṃ suprabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ sadekatvādisaṃkhyādirahitamapyaprameyādisaṃkhyāyogādaprameyaṃ suvahvityādiparisaṃkhyātaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146u_006:545: yasminnupāyakauśale sati yasmāttāvantamaprameyādisaṃkhyāvantaṃ nāma prasiddhaṃ puṇyaskandhamabhibhavati |
T03n1146u_006:555: evameva śabdamudīrayanti ghoṣamanuśrāvayantīti padadvayaṃ sarvatra mahāpariṇāmo'
T03n1146u_006:569: anumodanāpūrvakamapi sarvamevādhimuktimanaskāreṇopārjitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhabhāvanayā sarvasattvārthamanuttarabodhau māyāpuruṣeṇeva pariṇāmayitavyamityeka eva sarvasattvānāṃ triyānaniryāṇamārgopadeśahetubhāvavyāpārayuktaḥ pariṇāmanāmanaskāraḥ |
T03n1146u_006:570: kasyacittu kvacidabhiniveśa iti tatpratipakṣārthaṃ yathoktanyāyena mandabuddhijanānugrahāya dvādaśaprakāraḥ prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T03n1146u_006:586: na kalpayati na vikalpayati na samanupaśyatīti |
T03n1146u_006:597: yasmādavyāhatadarśanālokasya śāsturyathāvibhāgaśaḥ pratyātmani pratibhāsite tathā vibhāgenaiva jagaddhitavidhitsayā tena draṣṭrā karuṇāmayena bhagavatā karmaphale prokte |
T03n1146u_006:611: unnatilakṣaṇena mānena saha vartanāt samāna ityeke |
T03n1146u_006:626: tadayaṃ samāsārthaḥ saṃvṛtyupāyena kuśalamūlānyupalabhya pramuditacittena paramārthato'
T03n1146u_007:21: samudaye dharmajñānakṣāntyādibhiścaturbhiḥ kṣaṇaiḥ pūrvavadvyāpārakaraṇādyathākramaṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣemakarī,
T03n1146u_007:36: sa ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedāttrividha iti yathākramaṃ daśabalakarī,
T03n1146u_007:40: kūṭaḥ sāmagrī tatra tiṣṭhatīti hetupratyayajanyo bhāvastathoktastatpratiṣedhādakūṭasthatāmupādāya vimuktimārgeṇa sarvaguṇasampadabhimukhībhāvāt
T03n1146u_007:41: paścādevaṃ samadhigatatatvānāṃ yathāśayaṃ triyānadharmadeśanayā paripūrṇatriparivartadvādaśākāradharmacakrapravartanītyevameṣāṃ padānāmarthanirdeśo vācya iti pūrvācāryāḥ |
T03n1146u_007:42: tatra trayaḥ parivartā dvādaśākārā yasmin dharmacakra iti vigrahaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:44: yaduta idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tat khalvabhijñāya parijñeyaṃ parijñātam |
T03n1146u_007:45: idaṃ duḥkhasamudaya āryasatyaṃ tadabhijñāya prahātavyaṃ prahīṇam |
T03n1146u_007:46: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ āryasatyaṃ tadabhijñāya sākṣātkartavyaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
T03n1146u_007:48: tat khalvabhijñāya bhāvayitavyaṃ bhāvitaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikurvataḥ pratyakṣārthatvādanāsravā prajñā cakṣurudayādi
T03n1146u_007:52: etāvataiva jagadarthasampādanāt paripūrṇaṃ triparivartadvādaśākāraṃ dharmacakramiva dharmacakraṃ yat prathamato vārāṇasyāṃ bhāṣitaṃ sūtram |
T03n1146u_007:54: tathā sakalatrailokyādhipatestathāgatasya tat sūtramagrataḥ kṛtvā sarvo deśanādharmaḥ prabhavati |
T03n1146u_007:67: yatra hi nāma sāsravapariṇāmanāmanaskārasyedṛśī śreṣṭhatā yadbalādaprameyadānādipuṇyaskandhābhibhavo jātastatra sutarāmevānāsravabhāvanāmārgasyeti kathanāya pariṇāmābhibhūtapuṇyaskandhahetukā pṛcchā kṛtā |
T03n1146u_007:101: yathopalambhādiviparyāsastathā na kaścidadhigamadharmaṃ yogisantāne samutpādayati tadā prajñāpāramiteti saṃkhyāṃ gacchatyaviparyastatvāditi matiḥ |
T03n1146u_007:112: yena prakāreṇa māyopamatayā kaścidabhiniveśaṃ viparyāsaṃ nārpayati tathā sarvajñatāmarpayatītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:113: na kiñciddharmamutpādayatīti vaiyavadānikaṃ na kiñciddharmaṃ nirodhayatīti sāṃkleśikam |
T03n1146u_007:118: prayogadarśanabhāvanāviśeṣamārgeṣu yathākramaṃ dūrīkariṣyati riktīkariṣyati tucchīkariṣyati na kariṣyatīti padacatuṣṭayaṃ yojyam |
T03n1146u_007:127: "māyopamatayā yasmādrūpādyeva jinajananītyekasvabhāvatvena nyāyāt paridīpitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pṛthagrūpādyavagamo viparyāsastasmādrūpādyavagamena māturdūrīkaṇādikami"ti |
T03n1146u_007:142: pṛthagjanavyavasthāyāṃ viparyāsabalādalpīyasī sarvajñatā muktyavasthāyāṃ mātuḥ sāmarthyena viparyāsāpagamānmahatī jātā |
T03n1146u_007:153: vakṣyamāṇopalambhaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ kiṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñcaratyapi tu mahopalambhatvānnaivetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:154: nanūpalambhasya ko doṣo yena tat sadbhāvānna caratīti |
T03n1146u_007:158: "yasmādeṣa prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sadṛśaḥ syando niṣyandastadanurūpaṃ phalaṃ sattvanirvāṇopalambho na bhavati |
T03n1146u_007:163: sattvānāmasvabhāva eva jātiḥ prakṛtiryasyā iti sā tathoktā |
T03n1146u_007:164: evaṃ manyate sattvānutpādaprakṛtikāyā mātuḥ kathaṃ sattvopalambho niṣyandaphalamiti |
T03n1146u_007:173: sattvasya balaṃ pramāṇāvyāhataṃ sāmarthyaṃ māyopamatvaṃ tasya prāptiḥ samudāgamanatā |
T03n1146u_007:194: adhimokṣasya paryupāsanādinā kaḥ sambandho yenādhimokṣabalāt paryupāsanādikaṃ pratīyata iti |
T03n1146u_007:208: hetubalādapi śravaṇaṃ saṃvṛtyā na tu tattvata ityāha |
T03n1146u_007:212: pratīyamānenāpi skandhādinā kathaṃ na śakyate śravaṇādi kartumiti |
T03n1146u_007:216: tasmāt traiyadhvikaśūnyatvena tattvataḥ skandhādibhirnirdeṣṭuṃ na śakyata iti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:226: "sarvadharmasaṃgrāhakaskandhādīnāṃ tattvato niḥsvabhāvatve tadvyatirekeṇa nirdeṣṭuṃ na śakyata"ityādi |
T03n1146u_007:233: prajñāpāramitāyogārthaṃ yenopāyakauśalaṃ vimātratayā mṛdvādibhedena bhāvitaṃ sa yogamāpatsyata iti vibhajya vaktavyametadanenopāyakauśalamuktam
T03n1146u_007:244: pakrāntā iti pratikṣepacitteneti śeṣaḥ prayogādyavasthātraye yathākramaṃ sañcitenetyādi vaktavyam |
T03n1146u_007:247: pratyakṣānumānāgamapramāṇairyathāsaṃkhyaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante |
T03n1146u_007:248: ata eva na vedayante parāniti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:264: tatpramāṇastadupariṣṭāt pratāpanastapano mahārauravo rauravaḥ saṃhātaḥ kālasūtraḥ sañjīvaścetyaṣṭau mahānirayāḥ |
T03n1146u_007:266: narakagatimupādāya yāvadvrahmaloke kaścit sattvo nāviśiṣṭo bhavati tadā śūnyabhājane sapta sūryāḥ prādurbhūya krameṇāpmaṇḍalamārabhya yāvat prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ dahanti |
T03n1146u_007:274: kāryakāraṇasvabhāvaistribhiḥ sādṛśyābhāvādyathākramaṃ na prativarṇakāpi nānurūpāṇyapi na pratirūpāṇyapīti |
T03n1146u_007:276: nanu duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāpravartanāt kathaṃ sthānādiniṣedha iti |
T03n1146u_007:284: neneti durācāreṇa vyasanamupaghāṭamāpatsyante tasmāddharmadūṣakā varjanīyā iti yāvat |
T03n1146u_007:290: yasmānmahannārakakāyapramāṇaṃ śrutvā duḥkhamahattvaṃ pratipadya mahābhayena sahasā pratipakṣasamudācārādivirodhenoṣṇarudhirāgamanādayaḥ syustasmānnākhyāyata iti samudāyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_007:316: tathaikaikasmin nikāye yā dharmatā vyavasthāpitā na sā'
T03n1146u_007:317: nyeṣu nikāyeṣu dharmatāṃ sarvaprakāramanulomayatītyevamaṣṭādaśabhedabhinnāni sūtravinayābhidharmapiṭakāni parasparaṃ granthārthavyatibhinnāni kathaṃ buddhavacanāni siddhyantītyavyāpakametat buddhavacanalakṣaṇamabhyupagacchantīti mūḍhā eva | athavā |
T03n1146u_007:327: asya tu sarvadharmapratikṣepasya caturo hetūn pratipādayitumāha |
T03n1146u_008:0: adhigamānadhigamahetuṃ prāptiparihāraviṣayamuktaivaṃ prakṛtasyātyantaviśuddhilakṣaṇabhāvanāmārgasya sāmānyena viśuddhiṃ pratipādayituṃ gāmbhīrya pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146u_008:22: nanu rūpādiprajñāpāramitāsvabhāvayoḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthabhedena vivekapratipatteḥ kathaṃ paramaduradhimoceti |
T03n1146u_008:31: iti nyāyād yā rūpāderātmātmīyādyabhiniveśavigamānmāyopamatāviśuddhiḥ saiva sarvavipakṣarahitatvena srotaāpattyādiphalasya prajñāpāramitāyā viśuddhistathā phalasya yā viśuddhiḥ sā rūpāderviśuddhiriti advayādvaidhīkārādabhinnamacchinnam |
T03n1146u_008:32: tasmāt phalaviśuddhito rūpādiviśuddhistathā rūpādiviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ kathiteti yāvat |
T03n1146u_008:43: pratyekabuddhānāṃ tu kleśāvaraṇasya jñeyāvaraṇaikadeśagrāhyavikalpasya ca prahāṇāt sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ |
T03n1146u_008:49: iti mārgajñatādhikāre viśuddhikathanaprasaṅgādātyantikī cetarā ca tathāgatānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca yathākramaṃ viśuddhiḥ kathitā |
T03n1146u_008:60: iti tadanupāyakuśalān śrāvakānadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodha ityeke |
T03n1146u_008:66: yathoktāsu navabhūmiṣu pratyekaṃ yathāsaṃkhyañcādhimātrādhimātrādinavaprakāravipakṣasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛdumṛdvādimārgo yathākramaṃ navaprakāraḥ
T03n1146u_008:67: nyathā ca viśuddhihetutvādātyantikī cetarā ca viśuddhiriti |
T03n1146u_008:82: nanu sadāvasthitaṃ rūpaṃ kimiti na pratipadyata iti |
T03n1146u_008:94: nanu cādhimātrādimātrādiḥ pratipakṣo mṛdumṛdvādivipakṣa iti bhavitavyam |
T03n1146u_008:95: tatkathamanyathā nirdeśa iti codyasya paramārthena kasyacinnopakārādikamiti parihāratastathā saṃvṛtyā sūkṣmamalāpakarṣaṇe rajakamahāyatnodāharaṇena mṛdumṛdvādikramapratipakṣotpādena ca sāmarthyākṣiptena samādhānatastasya yathānirdiṣṭabhāvanāmārgasyāntyakṣaṇasya traidhātukākārajñānajñeyayoranupalambhādyā samatā sarvadharmamāyopamatāpratipattiḥ saiva samastapratipakṣarūpatvamiti kṛtvā |
T03n1146u_008:100: bhāvanāmārgaparisamāptyanantaraṃ tadadhikāre prāgyaduktaṃ yā rūpaviśuddhiryā phalaviśuddhiryā sarvajñatāviśuddhiriti tannirdiśannāha |
T03n1146u_008:104: kevalaṃ saṃvṛtyā rūpādīnāmātmanaścārthakriyāsu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ yogyāyogyatvena tathyātathyatayā bhedo na tu paramārthata ityabhiprāyeṇa sarvatra bhagavatoktamatyantaviśuddhatvāditi |
T03n1146u_008:114: avicāraikaramyapūrvapūrvakāraṇasyātmanaḥ svabhāvasyāparyantatayā rūpādīnāmaparyantatā gamyata iti yāvat |
T03n1146u_008:120: dhigamaḥ seyaṃ prajñāpāramitā mārgajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ nirdoṣatvenāvagantavyā ||
T03n1146u_008:121: sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyagiti sarvajñatāṃ vaktuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇāpratiṣṭhānamāha |
T03n1146u_008:123: traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhādyā śrāvakādyagocaratvena viprakṛtā viprakṛṣṭarūpā buddhabodhisattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā matā
T03n1146u_008:124: sā khalu punarnāpare tīre saṃsāre prajñayā'
T03n1146u_008:126: na pare tīre nirvāṇe kṛpayā sattvārthakaraṇānnāpi saṃsāranirvāṇamubhayamantareṇa vastuno'
T03n1146u_008:132: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā |
T03n1146u_008:135: svādhigamamātrātmikā tu prajñāpāramitā kṛpāprajñāvaikalyānnirvāṇe saṃsāre cāvasthitā vastvavastūpalambhatayeti jñeyam |
T03n1146u_008:136: evamuttaratrāpi kvacidanvayamukhena kvacidvyatirekamukhena kvacidubhayathāpi nirdeśa iti pratipattavyam |
T03n1146u_008:138: yaḥ pratītya samutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T03n1146u_008:140: sa ca sarveṣāmeva samastīti kathaṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ samyak prajñāpāramitādūrībhāva ityāha |
T03n1146u_008:153: viditatatsvarūpasya bhāvābhiniveśitayā naiḥsvābhāvyāpratibhāsa iva kalyāṇamitrādyupāyakauśalavaikalyānnimittayogena pratipattau viparyāsalakṣaṇopalambhasaṅgasambhavāt tatsamatāparijñānamavijñātabhāvarūpāṇāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ nāstītyatasteṣāṃ dūrībhāvo jinajananyā "iti |
T03n1146u_008:167: pi san vastūpalambhaviparyāsapravṛttatvena bodhisattvānāṃ tyājyatvādvipakṣa iti pratipādayitumāha |
T03n1146u_008:182: tathedaṃ tat prathamaṃ bodhicittaṃ pariṇāmayāmītyabhiniveśayogena yadā ca pariṇāmayati tadānena paryāyeṇa saṅgatiriti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:186: yathoktadvādaśaprakārabhedabhinnapariṇāmanāmanaskāreṇa cittasya prakṛtiranutpādatā na śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tasyopalakṣaṇatvādekānekavasturūpatayā sañjñātumapi na śakyetyavagantavyam |
T03n1146u_008:189: "rūpādiskandhānāṃ śūnyatve traiyadhvikānāñca sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmatītādisvabhāvatve dānādibodhipakṣāṇāmanuṣṭhāne ca tāttvikopalambhasañjñāviparyāsapravṛttatvena yasmādvipakṣastasmādeṣāṃ prakṛtistathatā sañjñātumaśakye"ti |
T03n1146u_008:195: yato vipakṣastyājyastasmādbhūtānugamena deyadāyakapratigrāhakādyanupalambhayogena dānādau pareṣāṃ sandarśanādikaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:205: trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādāvātmādyanavabodhena svaparayorniyojanaṃ samyak pravṛttatvāt sarvasaktinicayasthānapratiṣedhena copādeyatvāt sarvathā pratipakṣaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:207: pi san sūkṣmasaktirūpatayā na sarvathā pratipakṣa iti |
T03n1146u_008:229: prakṛtyā jñānasya svabhāvenānutpādena śrāvakādyaviṣayatvādgambhīrā prakṛti pariśuddhatvāt |
T03n1146u_008:233: "yasmāt svabhāvenaiva sarvadharmagotrāṇāṃ jñānajñeyasvabhāvānāṃ prakṛtyaiva śūnyatvāt teṣāṃ gāmbhīryaṃ tasmāt kenacidrūpeṇopalambhaḥ sūkṣmāsaktirvipakṣa "iti |
T03n1146u_008:242: nanu svasaṃvedanarūpatvenāvagamābhāvāt sarvadharmaviviktatāyāḥ kathaṃ sā svasaṃvidrūpā prajñāpāramiteti |
T03n1146u_008:247: to jñānasya saṃvṛtyā māyopamatāvagamāttadavyatiriktatvenākṛtāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavato'
T03n1146u_008:260: yā ca prakṛtiḥ svabhāvastathatā saiva svarūpavirahādaprakṛtiryā cāprakṛtiḥ sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtirekalakṣaṇatvādekarūpatvādyadutālakṣaṇatvānniḥsvabhāvatvādityarthaḥ
T03n1146u_008:267: pramāṇavyāhatotpādarūpatvādeṣāṃ bhinnahetujanyatvanibandhanānekasvabhāvābhāve yasmādeṣāṃ na nānārūpatā paramārthatastasmādekaiva prakṛtiriti
T03n1146u_008:269: yathoktakrameṇa rūpādisarvadharmāṇāmekaiva prakṛtiriti prakṛtiryadutā jñānajñeyasamataikaparijñāne pūrvoktāḥ saṃgakoṭyaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:294: na cittena jñātavyā na cittena gamanīyeti yasmādakṛtatvenādhimokṣamanaskārānadhimokṣānna cittena jñātavyā tattvamanaskārāparijñānānna cittagamanīyā
T03n1146u_008:302: saṃvinmātreṇa sarvacetasāṃ sāmyādidamasya jñānaṃ nedamasyeti kuto vyavasthā |
T03n1146u_008:303: yato bījajñānādaṅkurajñāne tadajñānāttadajñāne ca bījaṃ kāraṇamaṅkuraḥ kāryamiti syāt |
T03n1146u_008:308: styasādhāraṇaḥ kaścidātmātiśayo hetudharmasāmarthyajanito yasmādiyaṃ vyavastheti cet |
T03n1146u_008:312: durupalakṣaṇatayā nāyamidantayā nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyata iti cet |
T03n1146u_008:313: yata eveyaṃ vyavasthedaṃ bījamayamaṅkura iti tadanupalakṣaṇe kuto'numā syāt |
T03n1146u_008:320: yastvabhrānto nāsāvasati vastuni bhavati na cānyavyabhicāre'
T03n1146u_008:327: yadi hyekadeśena jñeyākāraṃ jñānamiti tatparicchidyāttadā sarve sarvavidaḥ prasajyeran |
T03n1146u_008:328: jñeyatvādibhiḥ sarvavastusādhāraṇairākārairanvitatvāt sarvajñānānāṃ sarvātmanāpi jñeyākāratve jñānasya jñānajñeyayoraikyena vibhāgāyogādvyavahārocchedaḥ
T03n1146u_008:330: mandabuddhijanānugraheṇa sannihitavineyajanaviparyāsanirācikīrṣayā yathānirdiṣṭa eva vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ vibhāgo'
T03n1146u_008:333: evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānaye |
T03n1146u_008:340: na rūpe caratyabhiniveśayogena yadā tadā carati prajñāpāramitāyām |
T03n1146u_008:355: tasmādevaṃ prayogakathanena sasaṅgatā rūpādīnāmupalambharūpatvamasaṅgatā ca māturanupalambhasvabhāvatā kathitā |
T03n1146u_008:366: "yathābhiniveśamatattvādyathātattvañcānabhiniveśādvikalpena vipayīkartumaśakyā yasmāt sarvajñatā tasmāttatra saṅgaṃ na janayatī"ti |
T03n1146u_008:381: ata eva tadudayakleśairna saṃkliśyata iti yojyam |
T03n1146u_008:390: nanu sambhavatprajñādiprakarṣamavagamya yatnakaraṇāt ko nāmātiśayo duṣkara iti |
T03n1146u_008:413: anyeṣāmapi pārṣadānāṃ yathābhavyādhigamāvāptiṃ saṃsūcayan śūnyenānutpādādiprayogeṇa svānurūpādhigamājjātaprasādātiśayo namaskaroti |
T03n1146u_008:425: prajñāpāramitāvihāritvādeva svatastasya rakṣādayo bhaviṣyanti nānyatheti vākyārthaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:435: hetuvirahādakārakakhyātyā nirmitopamāśca bhāvā jñātā bhavantītyevaṃ pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāmuktam |
T03n1146u_008:436: atra tu saṃkṣepasya vivakṣitatvāt pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti vacanena madhyasya nirdeśādādyantatrikanirdeśa iti pratipattavyam |
T03n1146u_008:443: avikāro na kartā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā |
T03n1146u_008:448: sa ca tān na manyata ityādinā tatra samāhitena cittena tānna manyate yato na samanupaśyati |
T03n1146u_008:450: yato na sandṛśyate samāhitena manasā na jānāti |
T03n1146u_008:461: caturdhā'mananā tasya rūpādau samatā matā ||10 || iti
T03n1146u_008:462: prayogasamatāṃ pratividhya darśanamārgo dhyeya ityadhunā vaktavyaḥ |
T03n1146u_008:466: upāyakauśalabalenānyeṣāṃ vidhipratiṣedhābhāvāt sahalokadhātau bhadrakalpe bodhisattvasahasrasya niyamena buddhatvaprāpterbuddhasahasramityuktam
T03n1146u_008:470: ayameva prajñāpāramitā parivarta iti viśuddhiparivarta ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:16: naiḥsvābhāvyena rūpaṃ nityānityaviyogānna nityaṃ nānityamityākāraḥ prathamaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:26: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamevaṃ viśuddhamiti caturthaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:50: prajñāpāramitayā devaputrāṇāmanupakārāttāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya rakṣādikaraṇe teṣāṃ ko heturiti |
T03n1146u_009:58: pyanuttararatidānādapi tato dharmabhāṇakatvena hetunā buddhatvaprāpterhetubhūtaṃ nidānaṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:75: paratantraṃ na saṃśliṣyate pariniṣpannaṃ na parigṛhṇātītyarthabhedaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:79: pi dharmāṇāṃ kathanaṃ na parigraha iti |
T03n1146u_009:85: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattirityākāraḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:102: iti vistareṇa nirdiśyaivaṃ sakalārthasaṅgrahakatvena trisarvajñatāmadhye sarvākārajñatāmupasaṃharannāha |
T03n1146u_009:106: sandarśikā sannāhapratipattyā sāmānyarūpeṇa nidarśikā prasthānapratipattyā viśeṣarūpeṇa |
T03n1146u_009:107: āvāhikā sambhārapratipattyā prāpikā nirvāhikā niryāṇapratipattyā niṣkarṣikā |
T03n1146u_009:145: iyaṃ seti sarvajñatā sarvadharmadeśanetyārabhya yāvaddakṣiṇīyaḥ kṛta iti |
T03n1146u_009:149: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā |
T03n1146u_009:151: iti | kimarthaṃ punastathā sarvajñatāyāṃ pṛthagbhāvanāmārgo nāsti yathā mārgajñatāyāmabhihitaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:152: śrāvakapratyekabuddhasampadaṃ bodhisattvo jñānena darśanena cāvalokyātikrāmatīti vacanenāsākṣātkartavyatvānnirdiṣṭo bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ tu yathā paridṛṣṭa evārthaḥ punaḥ punarabhimukhīkriyamāṇo bhāvanāmārga iti sugamatvānnoktaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:154: śrāvakādīnāṃ tvanityādibhirevākārairākīryamāṇe satyacatuṣṭaye sāsravaṃ bhāvanāmayamūṣmādikaṃ spaṣṭatvānnoktamiti grāhyam |
T03n1146u_009:155: nanu mārgajñatāyāṃ śrāvakādimārgasyābhidhānāt sarvajñatā kathitaiva kasmāt punaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti cet |
T03n1146u_009:162: parijñātatrisarvajñato vaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisambodho vaktavyaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:163: tatra tāvannityādigrāhavipakṣasya pratipakṣadharmatā svabhāvānāmanityādyālambanaprakārāṇāmākāratvena vyavasthānaṃ sāmānyena lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyamato nirvastukākāradoṣo neha vijṛmbhate |
T03n1146u_009:164: te cākārāstrisarvajñatābhedāttriprakārā eva matā iti grāhyam |
T03n1146u_009:167: sarvajñatānāṃ traividhyāt trividhā eva te matāḥ ||1 || iti
T03n1146u_009:168: tatra catvāryāryasatyānyadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā trisarvajñatādhikāreṇa yasmin satye yāvanto bhavantyākārāstānuparidīpayan sarvajñatādhikāreṇa tāvadāha
T03n1146u_009:186: śarīraṃ rūpaskandhastaṣāmasau heturiti kṛtvā nyāyenānāmāśarīratāmupādāya hetvākārāstattvato'
T03n1146u_009:238: tadete'saṃkleśāvyavadānānupalepāprapañcāmananācalākārāḥ ṣaḍ yathākramaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānakleśavāsanārūpādiprapañcasvādhigamopalambhaparihāṇivikalpānāṃ ṣaṇāṃ pratiniyatajñeyāvaraṇānāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣātmake'
T03n1146u_009:243: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ ||2 || iti
T03n1146u_009:246: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭau sapta pañca ṣoḍaśākārā bodhavyāḥ |
T03n1146u_009:248: chando rāgo nandī ca paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇeti |
T03n1146u_009:260: vikale kāraṇe sati kāryānudayo na syāditi nyāyāt |
T03n1146u_009:266: rāgāvasthāyāṃ sākṣātpravṛttihetutvena chandaḥ pradhānamiti kṛtvā tadabhāvena rāgasyābhāvāpadeśāt |
T03n1146u_009:284: yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca |
T03n1146u_009:288: tatpratipakṣeṇa trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:311: tadevamapramāṇāntadvayānanugamāsambhinnāparāmṛṣṭāvikalpāprameyāsaṅgākārā yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgo yathā ca sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:315: dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:327: tadevamanityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā iti pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:331: tatrādhyātmabahirdhobhayavastūnāṃ nirodhenādhyātmabahirdhobhayaśūnyatākārāstrayo nirodhākārasvabhāvāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ bhājanaloke paramārthe saṃskṛte'
T03n1146u_009:346: svabhāvanirodhenābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra eva niḥsaraṇākārātmaka iti nirodhākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ praṇītākāraṃ niḥsaraṇākārañcādhikṛtya yaścādhyātmikādervastuno nirodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:352: ṣṭāvekastraya eka iti yathākramaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:355: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam |
T03n1146u_009:356: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ ||3 || iti
T03n1146u_009:357: tadanantaraṃ sarvākārajñatākārā vaktavyāḥ tatra ca sarvāryapudgalādhikāreṇa trividhasarvajñatākārasaṅgraho bhavati ataḥ sarvajñatāmārgabhedenāha
T03n1146u_009:363: tato'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti sarvathotpannānutpannasyākuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ prahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ bhūyobhāvotpādanārthaṃ ca hetubhūtavīryātmakāḥ samyak prahāṇākārāścatvāro vyavasāyikamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:368: nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagbhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:370: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca sarvathābhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:378: tadevaṃ vastuparīkṣāmārgādi saptavidhaṃ mārgamadhikṛtya sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:383: yaccānimittaṃ nirodho yena cānimittaṃ vikalpāpoḍhena mārgeṇeti kṛtvā nirodhamārgasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ dvitīyamānimittavimokṣamukhaṃ dṛṣṭinimittavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
T03n1146u_009:384: yattūktamānimittaḥ śamākārairiti tadvastunimittānuviddhaṃ śrāvakamārgamadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:385: anityaduḥkha samudayasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ tṛtīyamapraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣa iti |
T03n1146u_009:388: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvādyathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī pratyātmaṃ dhyānamārūpyasamāpattiṃ vā niḥśritya bahirdhā rūpāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇani paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau |
T03n1146u_009:389: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathāsaṃkhyamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśastatpratipakṣeṇa śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati
T03n1146u_009:390: pratyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ ca niśrityānyonyaikarasasañjñālābhena yatheṣṭaṃ rūpādhimokṣavibhūtvalābhādityeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāstrayo nirmāṇamārgaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:391: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārupyasamāpatyākārāḥ śāntavihāramārgasvabhāvaḥ sañjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ
T03n1146u_009:400: tatra ca mārgo niratiśayatvādeka eva kevalaṃ tu balavaiśāradyādyākārabhedenāsya viśeṣamārgasyāsādhāraṇabhedo vaktavya ityāha |
T03n1146u_009:416: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |
T03n1146u_009:421: jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhya nāsti chandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā vimukteśca sakāśātparihāṇīrityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ |

T03n1146u_009:592: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvādyathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī pratyātmaṃ dhyānamārūpyasamāpattiṃ vā niḥśritya bahirdhā rūpāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇani paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau |
T03n1146u_009:593: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathāsaṃkhyamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśastatpratipakṣeṇa śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati
T03n1146u_009:594: pratyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ ca niśrityānyonyaikarasasañjñālābhena yatheṣṭaṃ rūpādhimokṣavibhūtvalābhādityeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāstrayo nirmāṇamārgaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:595: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārupyasamāpatyākārāḥ śāntavihāramārgasvabhāvaḥ sañjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ
T03n1146u_009:604: tatra ca mārgo niratiśayatvādeka eva kevalaṃ tu balavaiśāradyādyākārabhedenāsya viśeṣamārgasyāsādhāraṇabhedo vaktavya ityāha |
T03n1146u_009:620: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |
T03n1146u_009:625: jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhya nāsti chandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā vimukteśca sakāśātparihāṇīrityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ |
T03n1146u_009:629: sarvasya dharmasya buddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitasya lakṣaṇārthavaikṛtyādavitathatāmupādāya sarvabuddhabhāṣitatathatākāra ekaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:646: tadete'saṃkleśāvyavadānānupalepāprapañcāmananācalākārāḥ ṣaḍ yathākramaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānakleśavāsanārūpādiprapañcasvādhigamopalambhaparihāṇivikalpānāṃ ṣaṇāṃ pratiniyatajñeyāvaraṇānāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣātmake'
T03n1146u_009:651: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ ||2 || iti
T03n1146u_009:654: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭau sapta pañca ṣoḍaśākārā bodhavyāḥ |
T03n1146u_009:656: chando rāgo nandī ca paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇeti |
T03n1146u_009:668: vikale kāraṇe sati kāryānudayo na syāditi nyāyāt |
T03n1146u_009:674: rāgāvasthāyāṃ sākṣātpravṛttihetutvena chandaḥ pradhānamiti kṛtvā tadabhāvena rāgasyābhāvāpadeśāt |
T03n1146u_009:692: yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca |
T03n1146u_009:696: tatpratipakṣeṇa trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:719: tadevamapramāṇāntadvayānanugamāsambhinnāparāmṛṣṭāvikalpāprameyāsaṅgākārā yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgo yathā ca sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:723: dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:735: tadevamanityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā iti pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:739: tatrādhyātmabahirdhobhayavastūnāṃ nirodhenādhyātmabahirdhobhayaśūnyatākārāstrayo nirodhākārasvabhāvāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ bhājanaloke paramārthe saṃskṛte'
T03n1146u_009:754: svabhāvanirodhenābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra eva niḥsaraṇākārātmaka iti nirodhākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ praṇītākāraṃ niḥsaraṇākārañcādhikṛtya yaścādhyātmikādervastuno nirodhaḥ |
T03n1146u_009:760: ṣṭāvekastraya eka iti yathākramaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:763: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam |
T03n1146u_009:764: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ ||3 || iti
T03n1146u_009:765: tadanantaraṃ sarvākārajñatākārā vaktavyāḥ tatra ca sarvāryapudgalādhikāreṇa trividhasarvajñatākārasaṅgraho bhavati ataḥ sarvajñatāmārgabhedenāha
T03n1146u_009:771: tato'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti sarvathotpannānutpannasyākuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ prahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ bhūyobhāvotpādanārthaṃ ca hetubhūtavīryātmakāḥ samyak prahāṇākārāścatvāro vyavasāyikamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:776: nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagbhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:778: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca sarvathābhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ,
T03n1146u_009:786: tadevaṃ vastuparīkṣāmārgādi saptavidhaṃ mārgamadhikṛtya sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:791: yaccānimittaṃ nirodho yena cānimittaṃ vikalpāpoḍhena mārgeṇeti kṛtvā nirodhamārgasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ dvitīyamānimittavimokṣamukhaṃ dṛṣṭinimittavikalpapratipakṣaḥ
T03n1146u_009:792: yattūktamānimittaḥ śamākārairiti tadvastunimittānuviddhaṃ śrāvakamārgamadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodhaḥ |

T03n1146u_009:824: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |

T03n1146u_009:839: tadevaṃ kṛtvā yathā balādibhirākārāṇāṃ prabhedo yaścaiṣāṃ svabhāvastathatā |
T03n1146u_009:840: yasya ca te sarvadharmavaśavartinaḥ svayambhuvo yadarthañca sarvadharmasarvākārābhisambodhāyeti yathākramaṃ daśa catvāraścatvāro'
T03n1146u_009:841: ṣṭādaśa eka eka ekaścetyekonacatvāriṃśadākārāḥ sarvākārajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānā bhavanti |
T03n1146u_009:842: yathoktā eva cākārāḥ śrāvakādibhedena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ mārgasatyabhedādavagantavyāḥ |
T03n1146u_009:850: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ savāsanakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena sarvadharmajñānitvāt samyaksambuddhasyetyekatra gaṇyamānaṃ trisaptatyuttaramākāraśatamityākārāḥ
T03n1146_010:1: viśiṣṭaprayogairākārā bhāvayitavyāste ca prayoktāraṃ vinā kathayitumaśakyā iti śravaṇādibhājanaṃ prayoktāraṃ nirdiśannāha |
T03n1146_010:20: yukta evāyaṃ śakrasya vitarko yasya yathoktaheturasti sa evādhimokṣaṃ karotītyāha |
T03n1146_010:22: tathā tvayā śikṣiṣyata ityādi padatrayaṃ prayogamaulapṛṣṭhāvasthāsu darśanabhāvanāviśeṣamārgabhedādvā grāhyam |
T03n1146_010:31: kathamidānīṃ pratikṣepāśayena pūrvaṃ pratikṣepo gamyata iti |
T03n1146_010:34: yasmādidānīṃ kuśalamūlānaṃ parīttatvāt pratikṣepāśayo mātustasmāt pūrvamapi pratikṣepo gamyate |
T03n1146_010:50: buddhatvāvasthāyāṃ vineyebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāprakāśanāt sarvajñajñānaprabhāvitā ca prajñāpāramitetyevaṃ hetuphalasambandhāt prajñāpāramitānamaskāre sarvajñajñānasya namaskāraḥ |
T03n1146_010:61: tathāgataṃ manyase pratipadyase jānīṣa iti yāvat |
T03n1146_010:94: tadayaṃ samāsārtho yadā gambhīraṃ rūpādikamityabhiniveśayogena tattvato na tiṣṭhati tadā'
T03n1146_010:96: yadā ca gambhīramityapi na yogamāpadyate tadā gambhīraṃ rūpādikamityapi na tiṣṭhatyevaṃ yogāvasthānasya niṣedhenāviparītagāmbhīryaprayogārthaḥ kathita iti |
T03n1146_010:106: mātari sarvaprakārajñānābhāvena vicikitsādisambhāvāt tasyaiva purato bhāṣaṇe ko heturiti |
T03n1146_010:136: tataḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ paścādvyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyata ityevaṃ na ,
T03n1146_010:154: vinivartanīyaprayogeṇa yuktaḥ sa paripakvakuśalamūla ityatra ko vādaḥ |
T03n1146_010:163: prajñā pāramitodgrahaṇādinā kathaṃ paripakvakuśalamūlo bodhisattvo lakṣyate,
T03n1146_010:167: yasmādbāhulyena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ karmabhiravirahitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāñcittāni samyagudgrahādivimukhatvena pratikūlāni bhaviṣyantīti
T03n1146_010:177: bahuyojanaśatikāṭavīkāntārātprasthitapuruṣavadāntarāyikadharmavarjanādipratipattimato yasyeyaṃ jinajananī śravaṇādyarthamupapadyate niyamena niryāṇāttena veditavyamabhyāsānno'
T03n1146_010:181: tadvirodhidharmānupasthāne kathaṃ śrāvakādibhūmau patanabhayaṃ na syāditi |
T03n1146_010:185: "yasmāt pudgalanairātmyamātraprabhavatvena śrāvakādibhūmiviruddhāmavikalasarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyadyotikāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanādyarthaṃ labhate tato viruddhāyā māturupalambhānna śrāvakādibhūmipātāśaṅke"ti |
T03n1146_010:224: paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇa grāmyadharmapratisaṃyuktena prayogamaulapṛṣṭhāvasthāsu yathākramamāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena sarvatra punaḥ punarāmukhīkaraṇādvahulīkṛtenemāṃ vartamānāmevarūpāmasahyāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ duḥkhamanubhavāmīti |
T03n1146_010:227: ādheyasya pratipattidharmasya kṣipraṃ dharmakāyaphalābhinirvatanādipratipattimato yathoktaprayogasāmarthyāccittaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇapūrvakaṃ ramate bhaktiṃ karotīti yāvat |
T03n1146_010:231: yasmādvyākaraṇādibhirbhūmiṣu pāramitāsu ca niveśanātsuparigṛhītāḥ suparīttāśca kalyāṇamitrapratyarpaṇācca suparīnditā bhagavatā bodhisattvāstasmādāścaryam
T03n1146_010:238: atītakālasambandhena kṛtānāṃ kuśalākuśaladharmavāsanānāṃ yathākramaṃ vivṛddhaye parihāṇaye vā yatnakaraṇāllookānukampāyai pratipannā iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_010:251: dharmadhāturūpatvena cintayitumaśakyatvādacintyaṃ rūpādīti yadi na sañjānīte tadagrahaṇasañjñānirodhāttadā yathoktaprayogena carati prajñāpāramitāyāmityarthaḥ
T03n1146_010:257: svarūpalābhapraśnaṃ kathaṃ caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhata ityanvarthasañjñālābhapraśnaṃ ca pariharannāha |
T03n1146_010:265: dharmapudgalanairātmyapratipakṣatvena gambhīrā satī prathamaphaladarśanādipratipattyā phalaratnadānaprayogavatāṃ strotaāpattyādyanuttarasamyaksambodhiphalaratnamya dātrītvādratnarāśiḥ |
T03n1146_010:282: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tarhi śīghraṃ likhyata ityāha |
T03n1146_010:305: phalaratnapradātā ca śuddhakaḥ sāvadhiśca saḥ ||11 || iti
T03n1146_010:309: tato'samyagyogavihitatvenādikarmikaḥ kṛcchreṇa tadanyaḥ sukhena vyākaraṇamavinivartyabhūmiñca prāpya niryātyavirahito bhavatyāsannībhavati kṣipramabhisambudhyate
T03n1146_010:310: tataḥ parārthaṃ kurvan na vardhate na parihīyate |
T03n1146_010:311: tato dharmādharmādau sāmānye rūpācintyādau ca viśeṣe sarvasaṃjñāprahāṇādavikalpakaḥ |
T03n1146_010:312: phalaratnapradānena parāṃ śuddhiṃ niṣṭhāṃ prāpto bhavati |
T03n1146_010:314: prayogānantaraṃ guṇadarśanapūrvakaṃ sutarāmabhyasyante prayogā iti tadguṇā vaktavyāḥ |
T03n1146_010:362: ananyathārthena tathatāyāṃ samyaksambodhau pratipattivaikalyānna tadaiva sthāsyanti |
T03n1146_010:364: mahānuśaṃsalābhānmahārthatādiguṇodayena pustakalikhitāyāṃ dhāraṇavācanavatāṃ buddhairavirahitatvaṃ sugatiparāyaṇatvaṃ samyaksambuddhatvaṃ nirvāṇāt pareṇāpi ca parārthapravṛttimadhikṛtya yathākramaṃ mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśceti catvāri padāni veditavyāni |
T03n1146_010:372: sarvasya mahāyānadharmasyānuśaṃsatve kathaṃ jinajananyā evānuśaṃsa iti |
T03n1146_010:375: yasmāt sarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyamukhena dharmāṇāṃ tattvaprativedhāya śravaṇādikrameṇa pratyupasthitā tasmāttasyā evānuśaṃso mukhyata ityarthaḥ
T03n1146_010:377: ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktā ityādi |
T03n1146_010:379: tathā hi dānādibhistisṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiranugṛhītasattvānāṃ catuḥsaṅgrahavastusaṅgṛhītenopāyakauśalena kuśale pratiṣṭhāpanādupāyakauśalapāramitā tisṛṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ sahāyabhūtā |
T03n1146_010:380: dṛṣṭe dharme kleśapracuratayā kuśale karmaṇyakṣamatvenāyatyāṃ mandakleśatve manasaḥ praṇidhānāt praṇidhipāramitā vīryapāramitāyāḥ sahāyabhūtā
T03n1146_010:382: āśayabalatvaṃ praṇīte dhātau prāpyādhyātmaṃ cittasthāpanasāmarthyalābhādbalapāramitā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ sahāyabhūtā |
T03n1146_010:387: rthe taistairdharmabhāṇakaiḥ prāpte sati pracariṣyanti sūtrāntā iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_010:388: anena ca granthena tathāgatakṛtyakaraṇāddeśanirūpaṇāguṇalābhena dharmabhāṇakānāṃ buddhasamanvāhārakāṃkṣādinirasārtho veditavyaḥ |
T03n1146_010:394: paścimasamaya iti na kaṇādādiparikalpitaḥ kālo nityo'
T03n1146_010:396: kintu bhāvasanniveśa eva kaścit paścimaḥ samayaḥ saṅketaḥ paścimakālaḥ |
T03n1146_010:397: uttarasyāṃ diśi na sarvatra kiṃ tarhyuttare digbhāge cīnaviṣayādau |
T03n1146_010:416: kalpitādisvabhāvatrayaparijñānārthaṃ pratipattyālambanasamudāgamānuttaryāvabodhārthaṃ vā yathākramaṃ paripṛṣṭāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtā iti padatrayaṃ vācyam |
T03n1146_010:430: rakṣanti devatā mantraiḥ kuśale vartate manaḥ |
T03n1146_010:462: yasmātteṣāmāśayapariśuddhiṃ cittena jñātvā vāganumoditā mayā tathāgatena,
T03n1146_010:472: atītādidharmeṣu prahīṇāśeṣaviparyāsavāsanasyāpi bhagavato yathādarśanaṃ saṃvṛtyā jñānaṃ pravartata iti vismayaḥ |
T03n1146_010:479: dauṣṭhulyavāsanāsvabhāvānīndriyāṇi iti vacanādajñānasvabhāvasyendriyasya buddhatvāvasthāyāṃ prahāṇena manobuddhivadindriyabuddhyā viṣayaparicchedena yasmāt sarvaṃ vijñānaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvaviṣayamiṣyate tasmānnirmalatayā cakṣurādijñāne nāsti kiñcidadṛṣṭādikamityadoṣaḥ |
T03n1146_010:486: dharmataiṣā yadbuddhā bhagavanto māyopamatayā sarvaṃ pratipadyanta iti |
T03n1146_010:500: upagamiṣyantītyādi padatrayaṃ śrutādijñānodayabhedena kalpitādisvabhāvatrayāvabodhena vā yathākramaṃ yojyam |
T03n1146_010:503: dharmataiṣā yaḥ pratyutpanne janmanyaparityaktavīryo granthaṃ sumṛgayate'
T03n1146_011:2: guṇānantaraṃ ke punaḥ prayogāntarāyakarā doṣā yeṣāṃ parivarjanena prayogā bhāvayitavyā ityantarāyakarān doṣān vaktumāha |
T03n1146_011:7: tathāpi kiyadbahu mārakarma na jñāyata ityāha |
T03n1146_011:22: svenāṅgena tatpratibaddhena vā parāpabhrajanāduccagdhayantaḥ iti vācyam |
T03n1146_011:31: śrutacintāmayajñānāviṣayatvāt yathākramaṃ na gādhaṃ nāsvādañca labhāmaha iti yojyam |
T03n1146_011:57: damayiṣyāmaḥ śamayiṣyāmaḥ parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti padatrayaṃ prayogadarśanabhāvanāmārgeṣu yathākramaṃ veditavyam |
T03n1146_011:78: pratyutpanne janmanyanāgatotpattiṃ prati hetumakṛtvā kleśebhyaḥ svacittamapanīya pradīpavannirvṛtiṃ karomi |
T03n1146_011:85: tāvanmātrasantoṣo lābhasatkārasya bandhanatvena kathamevaṃ niṣidhyata iti |
T03n1146_011:90: yadā tu dānādibhiḥ parānāvarjya padmavattatrāsaktaḥ sārathibhāvena lokārthakārī bhavettadā na kaściddoṣa iti |
T03n1146_011:101: tatra nagarasya madhye śakrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādo dairdhyeṇārdhatṛtīyayojanaśatapramāṇamekaikaṃ pārśvamucchrayeṇa yathāśobhaṃ vaijayantaprāsādaḥ
T03n1146_011:114: pi tathāgatatvaprāpakakaruṇādidharmanirdeśāt kathaṃ tena sarvākārajñatā paryeṣaṇīyeti |
T03n1146_011:162: samprati punaḥ pravṛtteḥ pūrvameva visāmagryo vaktavyā iti |
T03n1146_011:192: tathā hi pūrvavacchrāvaṇikasya dānaṃ daiśikasya punaralpechatā vetyagrahaṇamāveditam |
T03n1146_011:216: tathā hi bhāṣitukāma ityanena sattvānugrahāśayatayā ṣaṭpāramitāsamanvāgamaḥ |
T03n1146_011:220: likhitukāmatau vigatāvigatakāmādicchandatve ca śrāvaṇikamādiṃ kṛtvā pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146_011:222: middhādigurukatvenāśrotukāmatayā śrāvaṇikasya pratiṣedhaviṣayaṃ samanvāgamādikaṃ daiśikasya ca bhāṣitukāmatvena samanvāgamādikamapratiṣedhaviṣayamuktaṃ veditavyam |
