T03n1146_011:233: ihaiva duḥkhasyāntaḥ karaṇīya ityanantaramevaṃ śrutvā sattvārthanimittamapāyagatau vaimukhyaṃ kariṣyantīti śeṣaḥ sugatigamanasaumanasyārthamāha
T03n1146_011:243: pūrvaṃ bāhulyena śrāvaṇikaṃ paścāddaiśikaṃ niyamya vaidhuryamākhyātam |
T03n1146_011:244: idānīṃ punaḥ pūrvaṃ daiśikaṃ paścāt śrāvaṇikaṃ niyamya vaidhuryamucyate'
T03n1146_011:308: niyamādanena tatrābhilāpo janyata iti ṣaṭ doṣāḥ |
T03n1146_012:27: iti doṣānantaraṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ guṇadoṣādānatyāgena prayogā bhāvanīyā lakṣaṇajñānapūrvakamiti |
T03n1146_012:31: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhañca tat |
T03n1146_012:32: jñānaṃ viśeṣaḥ kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate ||13 || iti
T03n1146_012:33: tatra tāvat jñānalakṣaṇaṃ trisarvajñatābhedena bhidyamānaṃ sarvajñatādvāreṇa tathāgatanirvṛtijñānaṃ kathayannāha |
T03n1146_012:43: yadi yugapadekajñānakṣaṇena niḥśeṣaṃ jñeyamaṇḍalaṃ saṃvṛtyā vyāpyate,
T03n1146_012:45: tathā hyekajñānārūḍhādbhāvādanyo bhāvo nāstītyevaṃ paricchidyamānāḥ kathamantavanto na bhaveyuriti |
T03n1146_012:50: tasya sarvasya sattāmātreṇa sarvajñacetasā paricchedāttena tadvyāptamiti vyapadiśyate |
T03n1146_012:52: na caikena jñānena paricchinnānītyetāvatā vastūnāmātmasvabhāvahāniryena tānyekajñānaparicchedavaśādanantatvamātmasvabhāvaṃ jahyuḥ |
T03n1146_012:56: api tu yathaiva te santi tathaiva jñānena paricchidyante,
T03n1146_012:59: pi yathaiva sattāmanubhavati tathaiva sarvajñacetasā gṛhyate |
T03n1146_012:61: vasthita ityaparyantatayaiva tasya grahaṇaṃ na tu paryantavartitayeti |
T03n1146_012:66: ko hyatra pratibandho yatra sākalyagrahaṇaṃ tatrāvaśyaṃ paryantagrahaṇamiti |
T03n1146_012:67: tathā hi yāvantaste santi bhāvāsteṣāṃ madhye naiko'
T03n1146_012:69: api tu sarva eva sarvajñacetasā viditasvarūpā evodayante vyayante ca |
T03n1146_012:77: api tu sattāmātreṇa tena te vedyāḥ |
T03n1146_012:84: na ca deśāvastambhādyaparyantatve sati grāhyatvavirodhaḥ kaścidyenāgrāhyatā bhavet |
T03n1146_012:85: yadi paryantatayā na gṛhṇāti kathaṃ sarvajñaḥ syāditi cedata eva yata evāsau paryantatayā na gṛhṇāti tata eva sarvajño bhavati |
T03n1146_012:87: tathāhi yadasti tadastitvena yannāsti tannāstitvena gṛhṇansarvaviducyate |
T03n1146_012:90: sarvajñajñānaparicchedakṛtaṃ tu paryantaṃ vidyamānaṃ vidyamānatayā paśyan kathamasarvajño nāma syādetat |
T03n1146_012:97: yato na tannīlasyaiva saṃvedanaṃ pītasyaiva vāpitu sarvasyaivetīṣṭam |
T03n1146_012:98: yasya hyarvāgdarśanasya jñānaṃ pratiniyatārthaviṣayagrāhi nirākārajñānapakṣe tasya sarvatrāviśeṣāt pratikarmavibhāgānupaparttidoṣa ucyate,
T03n1146_012:105: vibhāgena heyopādeyavastu parijñānaṃ na syāditi cet |
T03n1146_012:107: yadi hi yugapadanantavastuni pratibhāsamāne heyopādeyavastunaḥ pratibhāsavirodhaḥ syādavirodhe vā'
T03n1146_012:108: nyaiḥ saha bhāsamānasya tasya heyopādeyavastunastattvapracyutiḥ syāt,
T03n1146_012:110: vibhaktāvabhāsasyāpi yadi paricchedakaḥ śuddhalaukiko vimarśapratyayo vā pṛṣṭhabhāvī notpādyate,
T03n1146_012:112: yāvatā viśvasmin jagatyavabhāsamāne tadapi heyopādeyaṃ vastu |
T03n1146_012:125: ākārāṇāmasadbhutatvāt yadi hyekasya pāramārthikā ākārā bhaveyuḥ,
T03n1146_012:129: bhrāntaḥ prāpnoti sarvajña iti cet | na |
T03n1146_012:132: yadi hyasatyaṃ satyatvena gṛhṇīyāttadā bhrāntaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_012:135: arthavyatiriktajñānārūḍhākāragrahaṇe satyartheṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraṃ kurvan kathamabhrānta iti cet | na |
T03n1146_012:145: na ca sarvajñacetasi parimitabhedānugatāḥ samārohanti bhāvāḥ |
T03n1146_012:150: pṛṣṭhalabdhena vā śuddhalaukikena parāmarśapratyayena deśaparyantaṃ vartitvenāparicchedāt kathamiyanta iti paricchedo bhavet ,
T03n1146_012:152: yadi nāma pratibhāsamānādanyannāstītyevaṃ parāmarśo jātastathāpi nāntavattvaprasaṅgaḥ |
T03n1146_012:153: tathāhi yadi pratibhāsamānamantavadeva nirvikalpe sarvajñacetasi pratibhāseta,
T03n1146_012:157: yāvatā pratibhāsamānaṃ vastu sārvajñe cetasyanantameva pratibhāseta,
T03n1146_012:159: tasmādanyadapratibhāsamānamantavadeva tasyaiva ca parāmarśacetasā vyavacchedaḥ kriyata iti sutarāmeva bhavatā'
T03n1146_012:161: ye punaḥ sarvameva yogijñānamanālambanaṃ satyasvapnadarśanavadvastvasaṃvāditayā pramāṇamiti pratipannāstān pratyantavattvacodyaṃ dūrīkṛtāvakāśameva
T03n1146_012:164: tatkathaṃ sāmānyaviṣayeṇa yogino jñānena bhāvānāṃ svarūpāṇyevāvabudhyanta iti cet |
T03n1146_012:169: yadyapi bhāvāḥ kecit parasparaṃ virodhinastathāpi te jñānena sahāviruddhā eva |
T03n1146_012:179: evaṃ sati sukhaduḥkhayo rāgadveṣayorvā kimekavijñāne vedanaṃ prāṇabhṛtāṃ svasantāne notpadyata iti |
T03n1146_012:180: yat sukhādīnāṃ sakṛdavedanaṃ tatkāraṇābhāvenānutpatterasannihitatvāt sukhādīnāṃ na tu viruddhatvādityavasātavyam |
T03n1146_012:182: athavā vartamānasyeva sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa vā tadupakāryopakārakasvabhāvasya pratipattyaivātītānāgatayoḥ pratipattiḥ |
T03n1146_012:188: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāśca sandarśayitrīti janayitrītvenaiva sarvajñatāyāśca pratipādikā |
T03n1146_012:192: kṣaṇikaprabandhānityatābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ na naśyati na praṇaśyatītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_012:193: vastudharmasvabhāvatvāt kathaṃ tau na bhavata iti |
T03n1146_012:194: tatkasya hetorna lujyante na pralujyanta ityāha |
T03n1146_012:197: skandhānāṃ śūnyāditvena vastudharmasvabhāvābhāve kṣaṇikaprabandhānityate na bhavataḥ |
T03n1146_012:217: tadālambanena dharmatāyāṃ praviṣṭañcittaṃ sa saṃkṣepaṃ kṣayato vināśataḥ saṃvṛtyā jānāti |
T03n1146_012:224: dharmadhātoranutpādastadamanasikāreṇa bahiḥ pravṛttāni cittāni vikṣiptāni saṃvṛtyā |
T03n1146_012:225: paramārthataḥ punaralakṣaṇāni svabhāvavirahitāni lakṣaṇānityatvenākṣīṇāni prabandhoparamādavikṣīṇāni bahirgamanāsambhavādavikṣiptānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T03n1146_012:229: mahākaruṇayā āsaṃsāramadhiṣṭhitaṃ taccittaṃ yathāyogaṃ trividhasaṃskṛtalakṣaṇāsambhavādanirodhamanutpādamasthitamato dharmirūpatvāyogādanāsravaṃ pramātumaśakyatvenā prameyaṃ dharmadhātuvadvināśānupapaterakṣayaṃ bhavati |
T03n1146_012:230: tathāgatasya yenaivaṃ cittenākāśamivāprameyākṣayatayā sarvasattvānāṃ cittāprameyākṣayatāṃ svasamādhidarpaṇatale pratibhāsanādyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T03n1146_012:244: sāmānyena sarāgādicittaṃ vītarāgādicittāñca nirdiśyaivaṃ tadupāyaṃ yathākramaṃ kathayituṃ līnāni cittānītyādikamekaṃ hārakam |
T03n1146_012:249: agrāhyāṇi subhūte tāni cittāni na pragrahītavyāni iti |
T03n1146_012:251: līnaṃ layābhiśaṅki vā cittaṃ pramodanīyavastumanaskāreṇa pragrahanimittena |
T03n1146_012:252: samaprāptaṃ cittamanābhogamanaskāreṇopekṣānimitena ca gṛhītamityevaṃ virāgādihetutvena pragṛhītāni cittāni |
T03n1146_012:255: tayoreva cittajñānayoḥ sāmānyena paryāyaṃ kathayan yathākramaṃ sāsravāṇi cittānītyādikañcāparaṃ hārakamāha |
T03n1146_012:264: tayoreva punaḥ prabhedaṃ vaktuṃ ṣaṭ sarāgāṇītyādi hārakānāha |
T03n1146_012:266: yā cittasya sarāgatā viṣayādisaktirūpatā pṛthagjanasya na sā cittasya yathābhūtatā nyāyato māyopamasvaprakāśarūpatā bhavati |
T03n1146_012:268: tathāryāṇāṃ pratipakṣabhāvanayā cittasya yā yathābhūtatā anāsravarūpatā na sā sarāgatā tatpratipakṣarūpatvāt |
T03n1146_012:271: yaścittasya vigamo rāgavigamāvasthā pṛthagjanasya na sā cittasya sarāgatā'
T03n1146_012:273: tathā yā vītarāgasya viṣkambhaṇādiprahāṇena prahīṇarāgasya cittasya yathābhūtatā tadviviktātmasaṃvedanatā na sā cittasya sarāgatā |
T03n1146_012:284: ata eva kvacidgamanābhāvenāvigamatvānna gacchantyevaṃ dharmadhātusvābhāvyādvipulāni cittānīti |
T03n1146_012:307: rthaviviktatvāt trayāṇāṃ māṃsādicakṣuṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vā pañcānāmaviṣayatvenānavabhāsagatamadṛśyaṃ cittamevamanidarśanāni |
T03n1146_012:308: yathoktajñānamevamapratighāditvena kathaṃcidvyāvṛttyocyata iti pratipādayan sapratighāni cittānītyaṣṭau hārakānāha |
T03n1146_012:317: ātmādyabhiniveśena sottarasya nyūnāvasthāṃ prāptasya cittasya yā yathābhūtatā nairātmyasaṃvedanatā na tatrāsti manyamānatā satkāyādidṛṣṭyupalambhatā
T03n1146_012:322: tasmādbuddhatvāvasthāyāmiva pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ prakṛtivaiyavadānikasvabhāvena sarvarūpādinimittāpagamānniṣpapañcānyevaṃ tattvato niruttarāṇi cittāni |
T03n1146_012:323: asamasamāni hītyādi utpādādidoṣavaiṣamyādasamena grāhyeṇa samāni tadgrāhakatvena pravṛttāni cittāni vikṣepādakṛtasamādhānatvenāsamavahitānyevamasamāhitāni
T03n1146_012:325: sarvadoṣavaiṣamyānupapatteḥ samo dharmadhātustena sahānutpādādinā tulyatvāt samāni |
T03n1146_012:347: tatra vidhimukhena yaḥ svaviṣaye cittaprasaraḥ so'
T03n1146_012:360: tathaiva sarvātmanā niranvayavināśānna bhavatīti laukāyatikānāṃ nimiñjitavikalpaḥ |
T03n1146_012:361: avasthāturekatvādavasthāyāśca bhinnatvādyathākramaṃ pūrvavadbhavati na bhavatīti digambaraprabhṛtīnāmubhayavikalpaḥ |
T03n1146_012:362: tattvānyatvarūpeṇāvācyatvānna bhavati nana bhavatīti pudgalavādināmubhayapratiṣedhādhiṣṭhāno vikalpaḥ |
T03n1146_012:377: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatathatayā ca skandhatathatayā cetyādi |
T03n1146_012:386: saṃjñātā saṃkhyātā iti bhagavatā pañcaskandhaiḥ sarvadharmanirdeśādhikāre kathitam |
T03n1146_012:410: kiṃ tarhi viśiṣṭa eva pudgala ityāha |
T03n1146_012:415: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti vacanādakṣayā tathatā'
T03n1146_012:417: tathatāvabodhādijñānacatuṣṭayamekīkṛtya nirdiṣṭamevamato jñānalakṣaṇaṃ sarvajñatāsaṅgṛhītaṃ ṣoḍaśaprakāraṃ bhavati |
T03n1146_012:468: lakṣaṇajñānaṃ niṣpannāvasthāyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā buddhānāṃ tadevāha |
T03n1146_012:470: aniṣpannāvasthāyāṃ punarasaṅgajñānāya bhāvyamānā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmevaṃ sarvākāraṃ gocaro jñānaviṣayībhavati |
T03n1146_012:523: na rūpādinirbhāsaṃ saiva lokasya dṛṣṭateti sarvamiti na jānāti |
T03n1146_012:533: lokaśūnyatādarśakajñānamityetāni trīṇi jñānāni yathākramaṃ saṃgṛhītaparipācitavimocitānāṃ vineyānāmarthāya veditavyāni |
T03n1146_012:534: "tisraḥ sarvajñatāścābhipretya trividhāryapudgalādhikāreṇa yathākramaṃ pradeśavṛttimuddeśavṛttiṃ pratyakṣavṛttiṃ vādhikṛtyāvagantavyānī"
T03n1146_013:1: sāmānyarūpatayā jñānākāreṇa paricchinnānāṃ viśeṣo jñeya iti |
T03n1146_013:26: tajjñe vākkāyakarmaṇī caitasiko vā prajñādirālambakabhāvenātra buddhatvādau na pravartate |
T03n1146_013:43: pūrvavat tatkasya hetorityāśaṅkyācintyātulyate tāvat pūrvoktābhiprāyeṇa kathayannāha |
T03n1146_013:51: rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyata ityādi |
T03n1146_013:90: yadyapyanādirbuddhavaṃśaḥ pratibuddhotpāde cāsaṃkhyeyasattvaparinirvāṇaṃ tathāpi saṃsāriṇāṃ parikṣayo nāsti,
T03n1146_013:94: ye pratipakṣasannidhāvapacayadharmāṇo dṛṣṭāste pratipakṣātyantasamṛddhau sambhavadatyantāpacayadharmāṇo yathā kanakamalādayaḥ |
T03n1146_013:124: yasmādāryapudgalasya nirvikalpena jñānena darśanamārgādau sthitasya grāhyamidaṃ phalamahaṃ grāhaka ityevamarūpo vikalpo na samudācarati,
T03n1146_013:126: anyathā sābhilāpavijñānairyathāvasthitavastvanubhavānupapattestathyajñānaviyuktatvena mārgāsambhavāt kleśaprahāṇavaikalye satyarhatvaphalodayo na syācchrutacintāvasthāyāmiva |
T03n1146_013:129: tathā ca vastutattvāgrahaṇānnāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmīti |
T03n1146_013:139: gotradvayasya tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vṛddhyarthaṃ padadvayamadhye pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā ityuktam |
T03n1146_013:145: śraddhānusāribhūmāviti nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthātaḥ pūrva sambhārabhūmau dānādyanuṣṭhānamupalambhayogena kuryuḥ |
T03n1146_013:159: ntarhitā iti bhagavataḥ prākṛtadarśanaviṣayaṃ yāvatpadbhyāṃ gatvāpareṇa svarddhyā gatā ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_014:5: tatra śravaṇacintābhāvanākriyāvirodhena yathākramaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate |
T03n1146_014:6: yato'jñānasaṃśayamithyājñānavirahānna dhanvāyati na vicikitsati na kāṃkṣatīti padārtho vācyaḥ |
T03n1146_014:41: yena pūrvaṃ na samparipṛṣṭetyādau tu sarvakālamiti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146_014:54: tenānavāsthitasādharmyātsadṛśastadupamaḥ śravaṇādyavasthāsu prayogādiṣu vā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyatīti vācyam |
T03n1146_015:4: rādhanādyathāsaṃkhyaṃ sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni iti yojyam |
T03n1146_015:11: tattvato'nutpādarūpatvāt sarvākārajñatā na kenacit prakāreṇa pratyavamarṣaṇīyā |
T03n1146_015:18: rthe pratiṣṭhāpya paścātkalpitaparatantrapariniṣpannasvabhāvakathanena traidhātukacittamātrāvagame niyojya tadanu samyagarthakriyāsu yogyamayogyaṃ tathyātathyabhedena saṃvṛtisatyadvayamavicāraikaramyapūrvapūrvasvakāraṇādhīnaṃ nirdiśya tathyasaṃvṛtau sthitvā yathādarśanaṃ māyāpuruṣeṇeva dānādyācaritavyam |
T03n1146_015:21: tadevaṃ ṣoḍaśaprakāraṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇamāveditaṃ yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate |
T03n1146_015:71: prakarṣagamanārthena rūpasya yatpāramanutpādo niḥsvabhāvatā na tadrūpaṃ bhavatīti saṃvṛtyā |
T03n1146_015:72: paramārthataḥ punaryathā pāraṃ śūnyatā tathā rūpam |
T03n1146_015:83: saṃvṛtyā punaranādikālīnasamāropāpanayanāya sūtrābhiyogaḥ saphalo bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146_015:86: bahuśo bahudhopāyaṃ bhāvayantyupanidhyāyanti na ca sākṣāt kurvantīdaṃ paramaduṣkaraṃ sahasā kartumaśaktam |
T03n1146_015:87: na cāvalīyante dānādipāramitāpuraṇe ca kauśīdyaṃ na pratipadyante |
T03n1146_015:111: tena paryavanaddhānāṃ samantādvāhyena jñānena yuktānāṃ sattvānām |
T03n1146_015:158: santo lokasya gatirbhavantīti vakṣyamāṇena hārakāntena sambandhataḥ |
T03n1146_015:184: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām |
T03n1146_015:196: vinīyate'neneti vinayo dharmadhātuḥ tatprabhavo vipakṣavivekādviviktaḥ svabhāvo yeṣāṃ te tathoktā ityanenaiva padena kleśavivekasvabhāvo rāgādiviviktasvabhāvatvena
T03n1146_015:223: tatra śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiśca samyakpravṛttatvādbodhisattvasya na pratikāṃkṣitavyā |
T03n1146_015:272: nikāyabhikṣūṇāṃ nedaṃ buddhavacanamiti prakaṭābhidhānaṃ parabhaṇitaṃ pracchannakathanaṃ paramantritam |
T03n1146_015:290: prayogamaulapṛṣṭhāvasthāsu māyopamasarvadharmabhāvanātmikayā cittasantatyā pūrvikayā sarvajñatānimnā santatirvyavacāriteti pariharannāha |
T03n1146_015:313: utpādaḥ kleśaprahāṇena vimuktiprāpakaḥ samyagānantaryamārgaḥ vyayaḥ kleśaviviktajñānasākṣātkārī vimuktimārgaḥ |
T03n1146_015:334: samyagdharmāvabodhena sañjātaprasādātiśayā bhagavatpādavandanāpūrvakaṃ māturmāhātmyaṃ śakrādayaḥ prakaṭayantītyāha |
T03n1146_015:339: apiśabdānna kevalaṃ vineyāgrahaṇādi kintarhīdamapi dharmagāmbhīryaṃ paśyata ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_015:341: na dharmadeśanāyāṃ tathāpi brahmādhyeṣaṇānmahākaruṇayā dharmacakraṃ pravartitamiti bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146_016:4: trividhasarvajñatākārasuparipūrṇābhisamayatvena sarvatra rūpādau jñānadharmasyāpratighātitvādayaṃ deśanādharmo na kvacitpratihanyate |
T03n1146_016:23: apada ityasya prayogadarśanabhāvanāviśeṣāśaikṣamārgeṣu viśeṣaṇārthamapratihatalakṣaṇa ityādi pañcapadopādānam |
T03n1146_016:46: abhyāsayogena tattathatāprāptau kathaṃ na vastudharmatvenānujātaḥ syādityāha |
T03n1146_016:98: anyathā'śrotṛsaṃskārakaṃ vākyaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_016:109: luptamapratītamadṛṣṭaṃ na luptamaluptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pratītamiti yāvat |
T03n1146_016:118: yathā sarvadharmatathatāyā nānyā tathāgatatathatā kintarhi tadātmikā evaṃ subhūtitathatāpīti |
T03n1146_016:119: na sā kasyacinna tathateti sarvasya sā tathatetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_016:129: paramārthatastu naivātra māyopamatve kaścidbhāvaḥ kvacidanugatiṃ sadṛśatā prāptaḥ |
T03n1146_016:156: yathā māyādirūpasya na bhavanti caikānekasvabhāvāḥ svaparoditā bhāvā iti vyāpakānupalabdhyā |
T03n1146_016:158: nāsiddho heturyasmātprekṣāvatāṃ pravṛtteḥ prayojanavattayā vyāptatvādarthakriyāyogyapadārthaviṣayo vicāro'
T03n1146_016:161: sa cānyonyavyavacchedarūpatvājjñeyarūpo vā bhavejjñānarūpo veti vikalpaḥ |
T03n1146_016:162: tatra yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā parasparasaṃyuktasvabhāvo vā bhavet,
T03n1146_016:163: bahubhirvā samānajātīyaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ parasparasāmarthyavidhṛtairasamāśliṣṭasvarūpaiḥ sāntaraiḥ parivṛto yadvā nirantarairiti pakṣatrayam |
T03n1146_016:164: tatra prathame pakṣe yadyekena sahaikadeśena saṃyogo'
T03n1146_016:170: tathā hi pūrvāṇurapareṇa sarvātmanā saṃyujyata iti |
T03n1146_016:173: tathā'paro'pi pūrveṇa saṃyujyata iti svasvabhāvaṃ vihāya sarvathā pūrvarūpabhavanāttasya saṃyogāśrayasyāsattvam |
T03n1146_016:176: yadi nāma samānajātīyaiḥ saṃsparśo neṣṭastathāpi chidrasyālokatamorūpatvādvijātīyairālokatamaḥ paramāṇubhirabhīṣṭa eva |
T03n1146_016:185: ekaparamāṇvabhimukhasvabhāvāśca sarve parivārakāḥ paramāṇava iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
T03n1146_016:188: asatā ca svabhāvenābhimukhyāyogāditi na cānaikāntikatāhetoḥ tataśca parivāryāvasthānābhāvena parivārakāṇāmaṇūnāmekadeśatāprasaṅgāttatvataḥ pracayābhāve tatsādhyārthakriyāvaikalyādeva tasya paramāṇornaikasvabhāvābhyupagamo yuktaḥ |
T03n1146_016:192: tṛtīyastu nairantaryapakṣaḥ saṃyogapakṣamevānupatati tatparyāyatvāt na hyantarāladeśavirahiṇāṃ parasparasaṃśleṣaṃ muktā'
T03n1146_016:196: athāsaṃyuktaḥ eva paramāṇurbahubhistu dikśabdavācyaiḥ samīpetaradeśāvasthitaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ parivṛta iti cenmatam |
T03n1146_016:200: nyasya yadrūpamavadhāryate tadasattatra tattvena pārāvārādibhedavaditi nyāyānna bhūtārthena sāvayavatvamiti cet | na |
T03n1146_016:202: pārāpārayorapi bahirarthavādināṃ vyapekṣābhedenāsāṅkaryāt pitāputrādivat tāttvikameva rūpamityabhyupagantavyam |
T03n1146_016:203: yadapekṣayā hi tatpāraṃ na jātu tadapekṣayā tadapāramiti |
T03n1146_016:210: atha saṃvedanabalādviṣayasthiterananubhūyamānatvenārthasyātyantaparokṣatvātsamanantarapratyayabalena pratiniyatasya kāryasyodayātadvyatirekeṇa kalpayitumaśakyatvācca svataḥ siddharūpamevādvayajñānamekasvabhāvaṃ paramārthato grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahitamahetukatve nityaṃ sattvādiprasaṅgānnityatve'
T03n1146_016:211: rthakriyādyanupapatteśca svahetupratibaddhodayamudayānantarāpavargi kevalamanādibhavabhāvi bhāvābhiniveśavāsanāparipākaprabhāvādākārāstatra pratibhāsanta iti jñānātmako bhāvo yogācārairabhyupagamyate |
T03n1146_016:212: tatrāpi kiṃ tvākārāstāttvikā eva kiṃ vā pratibimbādivadavicāraikaramyā iti vikalpaḥ |
T03n1146_016:218: tathā hi yadyeka ākāraścalanādiviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsate tadā pariśiṣṭā apyākārāḥ pūrvākārāvyatiricyamānamūrtisvabhāvatvāttathāvidhā eva syuriti vaicitryākārānubhavo virudhyate |
T03n1146_016:220: atha sukhādivannīlādaya ākārā anubhavātmakā evetyekasya citratvānabhyupagamānna yathoktadūṣaṇaprasaṅga iti matvā samānajātīyānyapi vijñānāni bahūni vijātīyajñānavat sakṛdutpadyanta iti varṇyate |
T03n1146_016:224: tenaiveti pakṣe parivāryāvasthānābhāvenāvaśiṣṭānāṃ na digantarāvasthitiryathārthā bhavedataśca pūrvāparādidigbhāgenānutpatternīlādimaṇḍalasaṃniveśapratibhāso na syāt |
T03n1146_016:225: anyeneti tu pakṣe svabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvādvastubhedasyetyekatā kuta iti paramāṇuvicārabhāvī doṣaḥ samāpatati |
T03n1146_016:226: nanvamūrtatvājjñānānāṃ na deśakṛtaṃ paurvāparyamasti tatkathamaṇuvanmadhyavartitvaṃ jñānānāṃ bhavet |
T03n1146_016:229: stu yaddeśavitānapratibhāsināmākārāṇāṃ satyatvamicchatā jñānānāmadeśānāmapi satāṃ bahūnāṃ tathā deśavitānāsthānenotpādaḥ parikalpyate |
T03n1146_016:230: anyathā hi yadyanekavijñānotpādakalpanāyāmapi tathā deśavitānotpādapratibhāso mithyā syāttadā'
T03n1146_016:233: tasya cālīkatve kimanyat satyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yat kiñcidetat |
T03n1146_016:234: nanu tathāpyaṇavo mūrtā vijñānaṃ tvamūrtaṃ tatkathaṃ sa evātra doṣa iti cet |
T03n1146_016:236: tathā hi tadeva nīlādi nairantaryeṇa bhāsamānamekena paramāṇvātmakamupagamyate |
T03n1146_016:245: yugapadanekajñānodaye ghaṭapadādiviṣayaḥ pratīyamāno vikalpaḥ kramabhāvī na syāt |
T03n1146_016:246: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ nirvikalpakajñānānyeva yugapaditi tadanubhavaniścayadvāreṇa vikalpānāmutpatteḥ |
T03n1146_016:247: tataśca na hīmāḥ kalpanāḥ svayamasaṃviditarūpā utpadyanta iti sakṛdanubhavaniścayaprasaṅgāt kramabhāvī vikalpo'
T03n1146_016:251: tathā hi yaccitraṃ tadekaṃ na bhavati |
T03n1146_016:260: viruddhayorapyekasvabhāvatve sakalaṃ viśvamekaṃ dravyaṃ syāttataśca sahotpādavināśādiprasaṅgo durnivāraḥ |
T03n1146_016:262: na ca nāmni vivāda iti nānaikāntikatā ca hetoḥ |
T03n1146_016:263: dṛṣṭānto mecakamaṇipratibhāsastāvat siddha ityapi na vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:267: pratibhāsamānasya nīlāderdeśakālāntarasthāt padārthānna bhedaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate dvayorapratibhāsanenaitasmādidaṃ bhinnamityagrahāt |
T03n1146_016:270: tasmādgrāhāgrāhakayorgrāhyāṇāñca parasparaṃ bhedāgrahāccitrādvayamevaikarūpaṃ pratyakṣe pratibhāsata iti |
T03n1146_016:279: yadi ca bhedasyāgrahādadvaitaṃ kalpyate tadā abhedasyāsmādidamabhinnamityevaṃ rūpasyāgrahāt dvaitaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate |
T03n1146_016:282: citraścetpratibhāsa iṣyate sa eva loke bhedapratibhāsa ucyata iti kathaṃ bhedāpalāpaḥ atha matam |
T03n1146_016:288: līkatvānna virodho yato bhavatā doṣābhidhānenālīkatvamekatvamevākārāṇāṃ pratipādyate |
T03n1146_016:291: tathā hi yadati sphuṭamābālapratītanīlādyākārarūpamanubhūyate tadalīkamananubhūyamānaṃ tu sphuṭapratibhāsyākāravyatiriktamadvayaṃ jñānaṃ yattatsatyamiti kimataḥ paramiha subhāṣitamasti |
T03n1146_016:296: yathā duḥkhe sukhādirūpamasaṃvidyamānāścākārā nīlādayo vijñāna iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ |
T03n1146_016:302: tadā sādhyadharmaviparyaye sādhanadharmasya vācakapramāṇābhāvātkathaṃ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ hetorna bhavedityapi na vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:303: yataḥ sāmānyena naivātra sādhyate na cātrānaikāntikatā |
T03n1146_016:304: tathā hi dvividhaṃ saṃvedanaṃ mukhyaṃ gauṇañca |
T03n1146_016:306: sa ca jñānasyaivāsādhāraṇaḥ svātmabhūto dharmaḥ kathamasata ākārasya syāt |
T03n1146_016:307: tathā hi yadajñānarūpaṃ na tasya mukhyaṃ saṃvedanamasti |
T03n1146_016:314: tathā hi yadasamarthaṃ na tasya gauṇaṃ saṃvedanaṃ yathā turagaviṣāṇasya |
T03n1146_016:319: tasya ca vyāpakasya nivṛtteḥ saṃvedanasyāpi tadvyāptasya nivṛttireveti nāsattvādityasya hetoḥ saṃvedane'
T03n1146_016:324: tatrāpi hi jalādyākāro yadi nāntarnāpi bahistadā tasyātyantāsataḥ kathaṃ saṃvedanaṃ syāditi tulya eva paryanuyogaḥ |
T03n1146_016:332: tataśca yasya yena saha pratibandho nāsti na tattasmin saṃvedyamāne niyamena saṃvedyate,
T03n1146_016:333: yathā jñānātmani saṃvedyamāne bandhyāsutaḥ ṃāsti ca tādātmya tadutpattilakṣaṇo dvividho'
T03n1146_016:338: tataśca yo'yamākāro jñānasamānakālabhāvitvena bhavatā parikalpitastasyāhetukatve kathamapekṣā'
T03n1146_016:342: pi yathā bhavatāṃ saṃvṛtyā jñānajñeyayoḥ pratibhāsanaṃ tathāsmākamapi nirākāre tāttvike jñāne tadapratibaddhaivā'
T03n1146_016:347: asmākantu saṃvṛtyā jñānameva jñeyarūpamiti sambandhasyābhyupagatatvāttayoḥ pratibhāsanamaviruddham |
T03n1146_016:348: atha mābhūdayaṃ doṣa iti hetumatvamabhyupagamyate tadā pratītyasamutpannatvādgrāhyagrāhakākārayoḥ kalpitatvābhāvāt paratatvatāsvabhāvaḥ prasajyate
T03n1146_016:350: yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi pāramārthikī sattā kuto labhyata iti |
T03n1146_016:353: tathā hi vijñānasyāpi na pratyayodbhavāt svabhāvādanyā sattetyataḥ pratītyotpattyavinābhāvinī pāramārthikī sattā durnivārā |
T03n1146_016:357: pyākāro nābhyupagamyate tadopalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptatvenānākārameva jñānaṃ sadā sarvaprāṇabhṛdbhiḥ saṃvedyata iti prāptam |
T03n1146_016:362: tathā hi yadyantarbahirvākārāḥ sambhaveyustadā teṣāṃ saṃvedanopajanitavibhramabalena saṃvidyamānamapi jñānaṃ na niścinvantīti syāt |
T03n1146_016:363: yadā tu nāntarna bahiste santi tadā kasyānubhavena vipralabhyeran yena saṃvedayanto'
T03n1146_016:374: athāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣastatrāpi pratibandho bhavannākārāṇāṃ tādātmyalakṣaṇo bhavenna tadutpattilakṣaṇaḥ tatsamānakālamanubhūyamānatvāt |
T03n1146_016:382: atha grāhyagrāhakabhāvarahita eva sasamprayogavijñānaskandhasya svabhāvo niścitaḥ |
T03n1146_016:384: tathā hi bhrāntivāsanā vidyata iti bhavatā'
T03n1146_016:387: yadyādyastadā vitathākārābhiniveśavāsanaivāvidyā sā ca vāsanā śaktirucyate |
T03n1146_016:389: tena pūrvapūrvasmāt kāraṇabhūtādavidyātmano jñānāduttarottarasya kāryasya vitathākārābhiniveśina utpatteravidyāvaśāttathākhyātiyukteti balāccitratvamāyātam
T03n1146_016:391: yato yathoktameva jñānaṃ samanantarapratyaya iti yatkiñcidetat |
T03n1146_016:392: atha tatra vāsanātmikāḥ śaktayo bhinnā iti cet | na |
T03n1146_016:396: tathaikajñānāvyatirekādvā śaktīnāmekatvaṃ vijñānasvarūpaṃ durnivāramiti kathaṃ samanantarapratyayabhedaḥ |
T03n1146_016:397: atha neti dvitīyaḥ pakṣo matastadā muktāḥ syurayatnena sarvadehina ityādiprasaṅgo'nivāryaḥ |
T03n1146_016:398: atha sarvameva pṛthagjanasya jñānamanāpannanīlādyākāroparāgaṃ pravartate tatraikatvahāniprasaṅgo na bhaviṣyati |
T03n1146_016:399: acitrarūpatvāt nīlādisaṃvedanarūpatāttayā tasya vyavasthāpyate sā tatsaṃvedanarūpatvānna tu nīlādirūpāpatteḥ |
T03n1146_016:400: tathā hyālambanagrahaṇaprakāra evākāro na tu tādrūpyam |
T03n1146_016:401: yattu nīlādi bahiriva pratibhāsamānamālakṣyate tanna jñānākāratayā,
T03n1146_016:402: api tu jñānaṃ nīlādisaṃvedanamanubhavan pratipattā mohāttathā bahīrūpeṇa nīlādikamadhyavasyatīti |
T03n1146_016:404: tathā hi yadi nīlādinā sahagatasya kaścit pratibandho nāsti tadā kathaṃ nīlādisaṃvedanaṃ syāt |
T03n1146_016:408: api tu tādrūpyotpattyaiva jñānasya savyāpāratā pratīyate sa eva tasyālambanagrahaṇaprakāra ucyate |
T03n1146_016:412: tathā hi yadi nīlādi nāntarnāpi bahirasti tatkathamidamavikalpe cetasi sphuṭataramanubhūyata iti vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:413: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ naiva pratibhāsata iti |
T03n1146_016:418: yasmādyadi nirākārameva sarvaṃ jñānamanubhūtaṃ tadā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvināpi vikalpena pratiniyatasya nīlāderākārasyādhyavasāyo'
T03n1146_016:421: uktamatra paratantratvaprasaṅgāt kathaṃ bhrāntāvasya pratibandha iti |
T03n1146_016:427: tadā śuddhāvasthāyāṃ tat satyarūpaṃ kuto jātamiti vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:436: yadi hi viśuddhāvasthāyāṃ sarveṣāmākārāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ sambhavettadā saṃbhāvyate evaitat |
T03n1146_016:441: nisargasiddhatve hi pratiniyatāśrayaparigraheṇānāyattatvānna tathāvidhā sattā kasyacidviramet |
T03n1146_016:444: sa tādṛśo hetudharmo yena pūrvapūrvapratipakṣakṣaṇabalenotpādāt pratiniyatakāraṇāyattasvabhāvatayā kasyacideva bhaviṣyatīti |
T03n1146_016:448: ato yadā vicāryamāṇo bhāvānāṃ na kaścidaṃśarūpo'
T03n1146_016:449: pi svabhāva eko bhāgarahitatayā siddhastadānekaḥ kathaṃ setsyati tatsamudayātmakatvādanekatvasyeti,
T03n1146_016:454: navasthānādapratipatteḥ kathaṃ siddho heturiti cet | na |
T03n1146_016:458: kasyacit pratyakṣagṛhītavyāptikenānumānena gṛhyata iti yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścitapakṣadharmagrahaṇātkuto'navasthā |
T03n1146_016:462: nyatra vicāravimardāsahiṣṇutvena tāttvikarūpavirahiṇi māyādirūpe kathaṃ vartitumutsaheta |
T03n1146_016:463: bhāvadharmatvahāniprasaṅgāditi kathaṃ prasiddhadṛṣṭāntaṃ prati viruddhatā hetoḥ |
T03n1146_016:465: māṃ prati dṛṣṭānta evobhayadharmānugato na siddho vijñānarūpeṇa māyādīnāṃ vastusattvenābhyupagamādato'
T03n1146_016:468: tathā hi vijñānānāṃ sarveṣāmeva vastutvenābhimatānāṃ yathoditānumānavidhibhirnaiḥsvābhāvyaṃ pratipāditam |
T03n1146_016:469: tato na svecchābalena vastūnāṃ tathā bhāvo lakṣyate,
T03n1146_016:470: yena pramāṇabādhitasyāpi māyādervijñānarūpeṇa siddhatvādasiddho dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāditi na kiñcidetat |
T03n1146_016:473: pi kathaṃ vipakṣādvyāvṛttirniścīyate hetoryena sandhigdhavyatirekadoṣaduṣṭatā na bhavatīti |
T03n1146_016:481: ta anyonyaparihārasthitalakṣaṇe caikatvānekatve tasmādrāśyantarābhāvādekatvānekatvābhyāṃ svabhāvaḥ kroḍīkṛta iti sādhyaviparyaye hetorastyeva vyatireka iti kuto yathoktadoṣāvakāśaḥ |
T03n1146_016:485: atha hetuḥ siddhastadā niḥbhāvatvamapi bhāvānāṃ siddham |
T03n1146_016:488: tathā hi hetustāvadyathā siddhastathā vistareṇa pratipāditam |
T03n1146_016:490: pi yadi nāma vidhirūpatayā sādhyate naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ,
T03n1146_016:491: tathāpi vastvabhiniveśasya dustyajatayā tattvataḥ samastavastuvyāpinaiḥsvābhāvye niścayādyanutpādanādvyāmūḍhaṃ prati sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāvyavahārayogyatāprasādhanānna pratijñārthaikadeśatā hetoryathopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalambhena nāstitvasyetyacodyam |
T03n1146_016:492: atha mūḍhaṃ prati naiḥsvābhāvyameva tāvatsādhayitavyaṃ vyavahārārthamityabhiniviśyate |
T03n1146_016:494: yadā tvekānekatvayoḥ svabhāvavyāpakayornivṛtyā vṛkṣanivṛttyā śiṃśapānivṛttivadbhāvikī svabhāvanivṛttiḥ sādhyate |
T03n1146_016:499: tathā hyavisaṃvādako nyāyaḥ paramārtha iti paramārthaśabdena trirūpaliṅgajanitā buddhirabhidhīyate |
T03n1146_016:500: tadā tasyā api saṃvṛtirūpatvāt kathaṃ paramārthatvam |
T03n1146_016:510: sādhvetat kintu sakalaprapañcaparivarjitaparamārthasyānukūlatvādyathoktabuddheḥ paramārthatvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāpi ca tata eva,
T03n1146_016:513: tatra ca sāmānyalakṣaṇe tadbuddhisvarūpasyāntargatatvādyathā sarvadharmeṣu sattvādibhyo hetubhyo vināśitvapratyayo bhavannātmānaṃ virahaya bhavatītyacodyam
T03n1146_016:517: pi niḥsvabhāvatā pratyakṣaiva ghaṭaviviktabhūtala ivopalabdhe tadātmabhūto ghaṭavivekaḥ |
T03n1146_016:534: paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇācca bhāvapratīteranapahnavena pratītibādhā nāstyeveti yatkiñcidetat |
T03n1146_016:535: nirbījabhrānterayogāt kathaṃ tayā samāropita ākāra ityapi na vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:536: yataḥ satyena sahālīkāyāḥ bhrānteḥ kaḥ sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_016:539: ataḥ sāṃvṛtameva kāraṇaṃ pūrvamupādānamasyā na virudhyate |
T03n1146_016:551: nanu hetumantareṇeṣṭārthāsiddheḥ sarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyaprasādhanāya hetoḥ parigrahaṃ kurvatā tasya sattābhyupagatā sarvadharmanaiḥsvābhāvyapratijñayā cāsatteti parasparavirodhāt svamātṛvandhyātvapratijñāvat svavacanavirodhaḥ |
T03n1146_016:552: yato na hetostata eva niḥsvabhāvatā sidhyati,
T03n1146_016:565: tathā hi sarva evānumānānumeyavyavahāraḥ parasparaparāhatasiddhāntāhitadharmabhedaparityāgenābālajanapratītaṃ dharmiṇamāśritya pravartate |
T03n1146_016:567: anyathā yadi siddhāntāśrito heturdharmo dṛṣṭānto vā syāt,
T03n1146_016:570: tathā svarūpāsiddhau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaścāsiddhiriti sarvathaiva dhūmasattvādibhyo dahanānityatādipratītivaikalyātsādhyasādhanavyavahārocchedaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_016:573: yo hi pratibhāsamānaṃ dharmiṇamāśritya samāropitākāraniṣedhanāya sādhanaṃ prayuṃkte,
T03n1146_016:575: tvayā tu pratibhāsamāna eva dharmī niṣidhyate |
T03n1146_016:577: naivaṃ tathā hi paramārthata iti viśeṣaṇāt,
T03n1146_016:578: pratibhāsamāne dharmiṇi samāropitabhāvikasvabhāvaniṣedhaḥ sādhyate na tu dharmasvarūpaniṣedha iti samānam |
T03n1146_016:583: nahi pāramārthikasvabhāvatvena pratibhāso vyāpto yena tannivṛttau nivarteta |
T03n1146_016:585: na caitacchakyate vaktuṃ yadyapi dvicandrādayo bahīrūpatayā'
T03n1146_016:586: līkā jñānarūpatayā tu te pāramārthikā eveti pratibhāsanaṃ yuktamiti citrarūpatayā deśasthatayā ca teṣāṃ pratibhāsanāt |
T03n1146_016:589: tasmānna dvicandrādayaḥ pāramārthikāḥ tathā ca pratibhāsanta iti pāramārthikasvabhāvanivṛtau pratibhāsanatā virudhyata iti tāttviko bhāvābhyupagamo na kāryaḥ |
T03n1146_016:596: evañca bhāvābhāvasvarūpābhāve sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā jñānajñeyayorapratibaddhavṛttitvānna tadviṣayo vikalpaḥ sarvathā tāttvika iti siddham |
T03n1146_016:599: tathā hi yadi nāma bāhye vastuni na pratibaddhastathā'
T03n1146_016:601: syātsyeva tathā samānakālabhāvini vijñāne tadavyatiriktatvena tādātmyalakṣaṇa iti vikalpārūḍhapratibimbasya kenacit prakāreṇa vidhipratiṣedhābhyāṃ vyavahāraḥ |
T03n1146_016:602: yato yathoditavidhinā vāsanāprabhavajñānābhāvena tatpratibimbavirahādvikalpānutpatteḥ kuto bhāvābhāvasvarūpābhāve vikalpa iti vaktavyam |
T03n1146_016:606: nyathā prekṣāvattvahāniprasaṅgādataḥ satyālīkatvābhiniveśasya dustyajatayā kathaṃ sarvaviparyāsaprahāṇamiti |
T03n1146_016:609: tadevaṃ bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvādvyāpakābhāve vyāpyasyāsambhavāttattvato bhāvābhāvaparāmarśarahitānavicāraramaṇīyānantabahiḥsāravirahiṇaḥ kadalīskandhanibhān sarvabhāvānevaṃ sarvākārajñatādṛṣṭābhisamayakrameṇa prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayato bhāvanābalaniṣpattau keṣāñcinmaṇirūpādijñānavadutsāritasakalabhrāntinimitta eva svataḥ pramāṇabhūto yathābhūtārthagrāhitvānmāyopamādvayajñānātmasaṃvedano viśuddhasāṃvṛtakāraṇanirjātaḥ sarvaviparyāsaprahāṇādurukaruṇāprajñāsvabhāvaḥ sāṃvṛto jñānālokaḥ samupajāyate,
T03n1146_016:610: pratītyasamutpādadharmatayā yathā na punaḥ kalpanābījaṃ prādurbhavati |
T03n1146_016:613: vidyā ca yathārthajñānaṃ tāthāgatamapi yadi jñānaṃ bhavatāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ tasmādavidyārūpatvādvidyāyāḥ samutpādābhāve kathamavidyāvinivṛttiryāvaccāvidyā na prahīṇā tāvatkathaṃ muktiriti |
T03n1146_016:618: pi viruddhadharmodayādyathābhūtapadārthāvagamena viparyāsanivṛttau kutastannibandhanamavidyātvaṃ yena tadaprahāṇānmuktirasaṅgateti yatkiñcidetat
T03n1146_016:620: darśanameva paramaṃ tattvadarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhādīnāmiva pratyayavaikalyādamanasikārato vā yaddarśanam |
T03n1146_016:622: yasmācca yathoktameva tattvajñānaṃ muktyāvāhakaṃ nānyathātiprasaṅgādataḥ prāguktameva paramatattvadarśanaṃ grāhyaṃ,
T03n1146_016:623: tena sarvadoṣavirodhinairātmyadarśane pratyakṣīkṛte sati tadviruddhatvāt kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇañca prahīyate |
T03n1146_016:624: ataḥ pratibandhābhāvādravikiraṇavadapagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatra pratītyasamutpanne vastuni tattvotpattyādikalpanārahite'
T03n1146_016:628: pratibandhābhāve satyacintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalameva vastu na prakāśayet |
T03n1146_016:630: ato'yameva sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇe sarvākārajñatvādhigame ca paramaḥ panthāḥ,
T03n1146_016:632: te hi māyākārā iva māyāṃ yathāvatprasiddhamātrā'
T03n1146_016:636: ye tu tāṃ māyāṃ bālaprekṣakajanavatsatyatvenābhiniviṣṭāstadvadbhāvamapi te viparītābhiniveśādbālā ucyanta iti sarvamaviruddham |
T03n1146_016:638: dvayaṃ māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtirūpameva śrutacintāmayena jñānena vyavasthāpya pratītyasamutpādadharmatayā sarvākārajñatādyaṣṭābhisamayakrameṇa sādaranirantaradīrghakālaviśeṣabhāvanayā bhāvayantaḥ saṃhṛtasakalavikalpamābhavamanubaddhaṃ māyopamādvayavijñānamātraprabandhamāsādayanti yogīśāḥ
T03n1146_016:640: prathamaṃ tu māyopamamiti sābhijalpaṃ vijñānaṃ vyavasthāpakaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ na tu mukhyapratipakṣabhūtam |
T03n1146_016:641: tathā hi bāhyārthanaye pudgalanairātmyādibhāvanāpi na vasturūpañcetasyavasthāpya kriyate |
T03n1146_016:643: bhāve bhāvanāvaiyarthyaprāpteḥ tasmāttatrāpyayaṃ paro nāmamātrānusyūtavikalpapratibimbe tattvāvabodhānukūlyabhāji vastvadhyavasāyo santuṣyati
T03n1146_016:644: tadatra nāmākārābhyāsāt kathaṃ jalpo na vivardhito bhavati |
T03n1146_016:652: sattvaloke caturvidhasattvanikāyamakuśalinaṃ nānādevatādhimuktaṃ māninaṃ vidyāvantañcādhikṛtya yathākramamavanamanamūrdhvagamanamadhogamanaṃ ghoṣonnadanaṃ ca |
T03n1146_016:653: aṣṭādaśamahānimittāni punareṣāmeva ṣaṇāṃ vikārāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrakriyābhedenākampat yāvat saṃprāgarjadityarthanirdeśādbhavanti |
T03n1146_016:657: tathā hi pūrvā digunnamatyaparā digavanamatīti tṛtīyaḥ |
T03n1146_016:660: ayameva viparyayeṇa ṣaṣṭha iti ṣaḍvikārā bhavanti |
T03n1146_016:681: sambhārabhūmyādau samupārjitapuṇyajñānasambhāraiḥ pūrvaparikarmabhiḥ kṛtā niṣpāditā ye tairmāyopamadharmabhāvanāyāṃ kṣāntiradhimuktiḥ pratilabdhetyeke
T03n1146_016:691: pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneriti pakṣau dvāvasyeti pakṣī naro'
T03n1146_016:714: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam ||31 || iti |
T03n1146_016:728: animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādisarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ svasantāne prādurbhāvāt samudāgame kartavye yat kauśalaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyalakṣaṇaṃ,
T03n1146_016:757: evamapi na sarvairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ prāpyetyāha |
T03n1146_016:772: dhimātraiḥ śraddhādibhiḥ samyaksambodhiḥ subodhā mṛdubhistaireva durbodhetyarthādidamākṣiptam |
T03n1146_016:798: dharmāṇāmanutpannatvena jñānāviṣayatvāt kathaṃ svabhisambhavānuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ kintarhyevaṃ dharmādhimokṣe'
T03n1146_016:819: rūpādayo dharmiṇastadvyatiriktā vā tathatā rūpāditathatālakṣaṇo dharmastatpṛthagbhūto vā nivartamāno nivarteta |
T03n1146_016:827: tasmānnivṛttyasambhavādeva kāraṇādyastasyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ sarvānabhiniveśayogena sthitaḥ katamaḥ sa dharmo vivartate |
T03n1146_016:838: saṃvṛtisatyāśrayeṇa svabhisambhavatvaṃ nirākriyamāṇaṃ paramārthato yadi sādhyate,
T03n1146_016:845: tatra na kevalaṃ pratyakṣādibādhā kiṃ tarhyabhyupetabādhāpītyāha |
T03n1146_016:847: vyavasthānaṃ na bhavatīti sarvadharmānutpādadharmanirdeśena yasmādekameva bodhyātmakaṃ sattvaṃ cittaṃ tadeva yātavyatvādyānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ buddhayānaṃ tathāgatabhūmisaṃgṛhītaṃ,
T03n1146_016:908: tatra ca mātāpitrādīnāṃ dvayaṃ dvayamekaikaṃ kṛtvā pañcākārā vaktavyāḥ |
T03n1146_016:917: svayaṃ sarvapāpānnivṛttasya dānādyeṣu pratipattyā sthitasya ca |
T03n1146_016:918: tathaivānyeṣāṃ pāpanivṛttau samādāpanena kuśalapravṛttau samādāpanavarṇavadanasamanujñānākārairālambane mūrddhagatamudyata iti |
T03n1146_016:925: yathā mūrddhasu svaparādhiṣṭhānabhedenālambanākārabhedo vyākhyātastathā duḥkhādisatyacatuṣṭayaprathamaphalādikaṃ pramuditādibhūmiñca svayaṃ
T03n1146_016:941: adhimātraṃ mātrādicittotpādena tadātve cāyatyāñca pareṣāmiṣṭopasaṃhārakāmatāmupādāya nirdiṣṭam |
T03n1146_016:947: mṛdvī madhyādhimātrā ca kṣāntiryathākramameva satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntāvityanenānyeṣāmāryamārge prathamaphalādau buddhatve ca niyoktukāmatāmupādāyoktam
T03n1146_016:949: mṛdumadhyādhimātrāstvagradharmā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pareṣāmaviśeṣeṇa yānatraye paripācanāya viśeṣeṇa bodhisattvamārge niyojanāya sarvasampatprakarṣaniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānakāmatāmupādāya sattvaparipācanānāvaraṇarūpasaddharmasthitivacanenoktāḥ |
T03n1146_016:960: bhisamaye bhāvanottarottarāvasthāviśeṣeṇa sarvākāraviśeṣamārgasaṅgṛhītaṃ jñānamanāsravaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrakrameṇotpadyata iti sakṛdutpattinirāsāya
T03n1146_017:39: dharmatābhāvanābhiyogānna ca pareṣāṃ kṛtākṛtāni kāryākāryāṇi vyavalokayati |
T03n1146_017:83: punaraparamityādi yaṃ yaṃ dharmamiti sūtrādikaṃ paryavāpnotīti svīkaroti |
T03n1146_017:115: saprāṇakadeśaparihārārthaṃ na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati |
T03n1146_017:192: ihetyasminneva janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuru caturāryasatyabhāvanayeti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146_017:196: tadā kasmātpunastvamanyamātmabhāvaṃ praṇidhānādibalena sattvārthaṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ manyasa ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_017:203: parasmātparato mārādeva naitadbuddhabhāṣitamityādīni vivekapadāni śrutvā cittaṃ dharmatāyā na parihīyata ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_017:232: kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ ṣaṭ ca pañca pañca ca dṛkpathe |
T03n1146_017:273: duḥkhe'nvayajñānāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvasya vairāgyalābhānupapattyā sa punareva kāmāvacārāndharmānadhyālambata iti yojyam |
T03n1146_017:293: narthikā eva ca bhavantīti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_017:342: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyaciddharmasyālpatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā samanupaśyatītyāryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāvacanādityeke |
T03n1146_017:356: sa cāyaṃ caturvidho vipākanirodhaḥ pratyekaṃ traidhātuko veditavyaḥ |
T03n1146_017:389: sarvathā'panayanāt prativinodayituṃ tāvatkālāsamudācārāt viṣkambhayituṃ vā cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ veti svasthānādapanetuṃ tatraivādṛḍhīkartumityarthaḥ
T03n1146_017:390: anena ca sadevakena lokena śakyanivṛttitvena sadevakaṃ lokamatikramya nyāmāvakramaṇānmārge dharmajñānasya traidhātukapratipakṣatvaṃ jñāpitaṃ bhavet |
T03n1146_017:427: yathoktairevākārairacintyopāyavatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmanairātmyadyotakaiḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇā darśanamārgasthā'
T03n1146_017:440: nanu kathaṃ yogisantānapratyātmavedyakṣaṇāḥ parapratipattaye lakṣaṇānīti cet |
T03n1146_017:443: nabhiniviṣṭagrāhyagrāhakākāraśuddhalaukikapṛṣṭhacittasaṃgṛhītaṃ svānurūpakāryaṃ rūpādisaṃjñāvyāvartanādikaṃ parapratipattiviṣayaṃ janayantyadhigamānurūpa eva sarvatra yogināṃ vyavahāro'
T03n1146_018:14: ta eva bhagavatā bhāvanāmārgasthāvaivartikalakṣaṇārthaṃ gambhīrāṇi sthānāni kathanīyānītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_018:17: yatra bhāvanāmārge sthitvā bodhisattvāścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvadaṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayeyuḥ,
T03n1146_018:42: dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhāpracāraphalatvādvigama ityevameṣāṃ śūnyatādīnāmarthabhedo vācya ityeke |
T03n1146_018:43: sarvairapyetaiḥ padaiḥ vyāvṛttibhedāddharmadhātureva nirdiśyata iti yojyam |
T03n1146_018:44: sā ca śūnyatādīnāṃ gambhīratā samāropāpavādāntadvayarahitateti pratipādanārthaṃ kākvā praśnayannāha |
T03n1146_018:54: yathā subhūte tathatā tathā gambhīraṃ rūpamityādi |
T03n1146_018:57: anena ca tathatāyāṃ ca rūpādikamiti samāropāntaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ |
T03n1146_018:59: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śunyatā saiva te matā
T03n1146_018:74: yathākramaṃ yā samāropāpavādāntamuktatā sā śūnyatādergāmbhīryaṃ śūnyatādikamiti |
T03n1146_018:97: nirvedhāṅgeṣu dṛṅmārge bhāvanāmārga eva ca ||53 || iti
T03n1146_018:100: tathā sampādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna iti ṣaṭpadāni bhavanti |
T03n1146_018:105: yo bodhisattvaścintādiprayuktaḥ samyagekadivasamapyatra bhāvanāmārge yogamāpadyate so'
T03n1146_018:139: trayo hi mūlaprakārā mṛdumathyādhimātrāsteṣāṃ punaḥ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhede kriyamāṇe navaprakārā bhavanti |
T03n1146_018:141: tatra ca mṛdumṛdunā mārgeṇādhimātrādhimātravikalpasya prahāṇaṃ yāvadadhimātrādhimātreṇa mṛdumṛduvikalpasyeti grāhyam |
T03n1146_018:151: pratipakṣaprabhedamabhibhūyamānapuṇyavacanena ca vipakṣaprabhedaṃ nirdiśan vikalpakleśā bodhisattvā iti kṛtvā'
T03n1146_018:156: tata iti dānaṃ dātuḥ sakāśādviśiṣyata iti |
T03n1146_018:180: ata eva dharmaṃ deśayediti pūrvasmādidaṃ viśiṣyate |
T03n1146_018:188: ata evānantaraṃ prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmeneti viśeṣo vakṣyate |
T03n1146_018:206: abhisaṃskāraścittābhogo vikalpo viparyāso yadā kathaṃ vikalpabījānugamāttadā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmanākāle prasavatītyucyate vikalpasyāpi māyopamatvenānugamādaviparyāsapravṛttatvena saṃvṛtyā bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti pariharannadhimātramadhyamārgārthamāha |
T03n1146_018:220: yena yenādhyātmādiśūnyatādyākāreṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityanantaraṃ saṃkhyeyaprameyādyadhigamasaṃgṛhīta iti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146_018:224: yathā ca yathā ca subhūte bodhisattva ityādi |
T03n1146_018:236: yasmin puṇyaviṣaye pratyakṣeṇa viṣayīkartumanumānena ca mātumaśakyalātpratyakṣānumānapramāṇāni na pravartante,
T03n1146_018:254: pi vikalpapratipakṣayorbhedādanāgamyadhyānāntarādinavabhūmiṣu mahopāyakauśalabalena vā kāmadhātvādinavabhūmiṣu yathāsaṃkhyaṃ yathoktanavaprakāraḥ prabandhena pravartamāno bhāvanāmārgo'
T03n1146_018:260: nanvekaikameva prakāramadhikṛtya bhinnārthāsaṃkhyeyāpramāṇapuṇyaprasavakāryavacanasya prayogeṇa kāraṇānāmapi bahudhā bhedātkathaṃ navaprakāro bhāvanāpatha ityabhiprāyavānāha |
T03n1146_018:271: sarvadharmā iti prathamādiprakārāḥ śūnyā eveti nyāyasya sarvatra tulya tvāttrivimokṣamukhasvabhāvāḥ |
T03n1146_018:277: yasmādasaṃkhyeyāprameyādinirdeśā vāgabhilāpasvabhāvā vyāvṛttyapekṣopajanitanānātvarūpeṇaikasminnarthe prayuktāstasmātparamārthena yathoktalakṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasya bhedaṃ kartuṃ na kṣamā ityāha |
T03n1146_018:285: janyate'neneti deśanābhinirhāro dharmakāyastasyodbhāvanāsaṃvṛtyā nirdeśa iti vigrahaḥ |
T03n1146_018:303: tataḥ śūnyāḥ sarvadharmā evābhilapituṃ na śakyā ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_018:304: nanu niḥsvabhāvatayā tattvānyatvābhyāmavācyasya paramārthato dharmatāsvarūpasyābhimatamārgavastuno vipakṣapratipakṣayorthathākramamapagamodayau na yuijyete |
T03n1146_018:308: yadyevaṃ bhāvanāsaṃjñakena mārgeṇa naiva kiñcidadhimātrādi navavidhaṃ vikalpajātaṃ parityaktaṃ,
T03n1146_018:330: dānapāramitā vivardhate vā parihīyate veti vastūpalambhayogenaivañcittamutpadyate |
T03n1146_018:333: nuttarā samyaksambodhirvineyānāṃ puṇyajñānānurūpatayā viśiṣṭārthapratibhāsicittajananadvāreṇa pariṇāmitapuṇyavardhanātsaṃvṛtyābhimatārthasya sādhikā tathā pariṇāmayatītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_018:334: tadvadayamapyāgantukamalāpagamādbhāvanayā sākṣātkṛto bhāvanāmārgo māyopamatvānniratiśayādhāno yathāsaṃvṛtyā vipakṣapratipakṣayorapagamodayakrameṇārthakriyākārī tathopanyasyata iti matiḥ |
T03n1146_018:347: na ca subhūte tathatā vivardhate vā parihīyate vā tatkharūpatvāttathā bodhimārgāvapīti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146_019:3: ekaikasmiṃścitte pūrvāparībhūte buddhabodhiniṣpādakasarvākārajñatādisamastārthāpratibhāsanānnaivaikaikena prathamena cittotpādena paścimena vā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyate bodhisattva ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_019:4: ekavijñānasantatayaḥ sattvā iti vacanādasambhavitvena kiṃ yugapadutpannasamīhitārthaniṣpādakadharmapratibhāsenānekacittakṣaṇena bodhimabhisambudhyata iti pakṣo nāśaṃkitaḥ |
T03n1146_019:5: viditānuttarabuddhabodhiniṣpādakadharmasvarūpeṇa kramotpattyupapannapūrvāparībhūtānekacittakṣaṇena bodhimabhisambudhyata ityayamapi pakṣo na saṃgacchata ityāha |
T03n1146_019:25: api tu prathamaṃ dīpakṣaṇamapekṣyārciṣā paścimena sā vartirdagdhā |
T03n1146_019:29: dvitīye'pi viśiṣṭajvālāvartyorutpattikṣaṇe prathamakṣaṇamantareṇa nityasattvādiprasaṅgatayā saṃvṛtyutpādābhāvātkāryakāraṇalakṣaṇadāhyadāhakabhāvavirahe paścimābhinipātenārciṣā na sā vartirdagdhā |
T03n1146_019:32: api tu paścimaṃ dīpakṣaṇamapekṣyārciṣā pūrveṇa vartirdagdhā |
T03n1146_019:42: tathāpi yadā saṃhataviśiṣṭotpannaṃ prathamadīpavartikṣaṇamidaṃ pratyayatātmakapratītyasamutpādadharmatayā samapekṣyāvicāraikaramyatvena hetuphalasambandhabalāttadāhitasāmarthyātiśaya eva viśiṣṭo dvitīyadīpavartikṣaṇaḥ syāt,
T03n1146_019:63: pūrveṇa bodhirno yuktā manasā paścimena vā |
T03n1146_019:72: yaccittaṃ prathamakṣaṇavarti niruddhamapi nu tatkiṃ dvitīyakṣaṇe saṃvṛtyā punarutpatsyate,
T03n1146_019:77: pi pāramparyeṇa prathamakṣaṇavyāpāropacārāt kṣaṇadvayena bodhiryuktā na tu saṃvṛtyāpi prathamakṣaṇasya mukhyato vyāpāra ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_019:81: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamutpannamapi nu tannirodhadharmīti |
T03n1146_019:88: tasya kiṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe nirodha ityāha |
T03n1146_019:89: tat kiṃ manyase yannirodhadharmi api nu tannirotsyata iti |
T03n1146_019:90: utpannamātrameva tannirodhagrāsatāṃ gataṃ tatprakṛtitvāt kiṃ punarnirotsyata ityabhiprāyādāha |
T03n1146_019:93: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpannamapi nu tannirodhadharmīti |
T03n1146_019:98: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yannirodhadharmi api nu tannirotsyata iti |
T03n1146_019:102: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittamanutpādānirodhadharmi api nu tannirotsyata iti |
T03n1146_019:109: yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva sa dharmo nirotsyata iti |
T03n1146_019:111: bhāvasañjñakaḥ sa eva dharmaḥ kiṃ nirotsyate |
T03n1146_019:115: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyata iti |
T03n1146_019:119: kintu sarvasyaivotpannasya vastunaḥ prakṛtyā māyopamasya saṃvṛtyā nirodhānnirodhagāmbhīryamityucyate |
T03n1146_019:121: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathateti |
T03n1146_019:127: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā tadā mā kūṭasthābhūditi |
T03n1146_019:130: api tu nityā kūṭasthā syāditi kiṃ manyase |
T03n1146_019:131: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T03n1146_019:135: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathateti |
T03n1146_019:138: pi tadavyatiriktā sākṣātkartumaśakyatvāttathatā gambhīrā durbodheti yāvat |
T03n1146_019:144: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathateti |
T03n1146_019:154: tathatāto na vyatiriktaṃ nāpyavyatiriktaṃ cittamātramidaṃ sarvaṃ vastu jñeyagāmbhīryamiti |
T03n1146_019:161: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre caratīti |
T03n1146_019:165: yo bhagavannevaṃ carati sa na kvaciccaratīti |
T03n1146_019:180: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva paramārthe carati sa nimite carati |
T03n1146_019:191: pi nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavatīti |
T03n1146_019:194: bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva pratyutpanne janmani kathamahaṃ nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti naivaṃ bodhisattvo ghaṭate vyāyacchata iti yāvat
T03n1146_019:199: etadrūpaṃ saṃvṛtyā māyopamaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ yannimittaṃ yaddhetukaṃ rūpādi jānāti |
T03n1146_019:200: tattvato'nutpannatvādānimitte ca dharmadhātau parijayaṃ karotyevaṃ paramārthena prahāṇaṃ saṃvṛtyā cāprahāṇamidamupāyakauśalagāmbhīryamiti |
T03n1146_019:205: utpāde ca nirodhe ca tathatayāṃ gabhīratā |
T03n1146_019:220: tadā tathā svapnāntaragatasyāpi vivardheta yāvatā yathā divase na vivardheta tathā svapne'pīti |
T03n1146_019:223: yadi divase carataḥ prajñāpāramitā vivardheta tadābhyāsasāmarthyāt svapne'
T03n1146_019:225: yasmātsāṃsārika-vaiyavadānikadharmāṇāṃ pratibhāsamātrasvabhāvasvapnasadṛśatvenāvagamātsaṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ svapnadivasasvabhāvayornānātvena vipakṣapratipakṣavikalpābhyāṃ vikalpayitumaśakyatvāt svapnaśca divasaścāvikalpaḥ samatātmaka ityukto bhagavateti yāvat |
T03n1146_019:228: nanu sarvadharmāṇāṃ svapnasadṛśatve sati daśakuśalādīnāmabhāvaḥ svapnāvasthāyāmiva jāgraddaśāyāmapi syādityāha |
T03n1146_019:238: saṃvṛtyā tu karmaphalasambandhasyābhīṣṭatvāt middhenopahataṃ cittaṃ svapne tenāsamaṃ phalamiti dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ syādityāha |
T03n1146_019:244: hohataḥ sādhu hataḥ suṣṭhu hataḥ sarvatrātmavyāpāropalambhānmayā hata ityarthabhedo vācyaḥ |
T03n1146_019:246: yathā bāhyārthanaye kṣaṇikatayā nirhetukavināśe karmajaṃ lokavaicitryamiti siddhāntāca paramārthato na kaścinna kenaciddhato nāpi kasyaciddravyaṃ kenacidgṛhītamityādyupagame pravṛttasantānaniruddhapadārthotpādanātmāraṇādyadhyavasāyadvāreṇāyoniśomanaskārādimato'
T03n1146_019:249: pyupacitakuśalākuśalasya prabuddhā vasthāyāmaho hata ityādivikalpena prayogāvasthādyabhiniveśaparipuṣṭyā paripoṣaprāptervahirarthanayenāpi svapnāvasthāyāmiveti dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiḥ |
T03n1146_019:250: ato madhyamakanayena jāgradavasthāyāmapi svapnasadṛśe vastuni tadanurūpārthe bhāvādyabhiniveśenākhaṇḍitasakalaviparyāsambandhanānāṃ kuśalādayo vyavasthāpyante |
T03n1146_019:251: kintu middhādikabhrāntikāraṇatvenāspaṣṭākuśalapratipattyā svapne nyūnaṃ phalaṃ jāgradavasthāyāṃ tu middhādikabhrāntikāraṇavigamātspaṣṭānākulapratibhāsatvenādhikaṃphalam
T03n1146_019:257: vikalpayan kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati kṣīṇā me saṃsāriṇaḥ skandhā ityādi kṣayasaṃjñāṃ karoti |
T03n1146_019:258: tasyāpi karmaṇa iti kleśaprahāṇakāriṇomanaskārasya karmaṇaḥ svarūpopacayādācayaḥ |
T03n1146_019:260: tataścopacitasya karmaṇaḥ prāptavyaphalaviśeṣasadbhāvādapariniṣpanna eva tathāgataḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146_019:261: vineyānurodhena tathāgatasya kṣīṇā me jātirityādivikalpo vyavasthāpito na tu tattvata ityāha |
T03n1146_019:265: sarvakalpā rūpādayaḥ svasāmānyalakṣaṇātmakā nirvikalpasavikalpajñānālambanasthānīyāsteṣu vikalpastadupalambhastena prahīṇo rahito nirvikalpadharmatādhigamādityarthaḥ
T03n1146_019:266: ālambanopalambhamantareṇa mānasaṃ karma cittaṃ cānyeṣāṃ kasmānna pravartata iti cedāha |
T03n1146_019:268: dharmataiṣā pratītyasamutpādadharmatayā yasmādanālambanaṃ karma cittaṃ ca notpadyate,
T03n1146_019:273: iti nyāyena kācidbuddhiḥ saṃkleśālambanā saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti |
T03n1146_019:276: cetanā mānasaṃ karmeti vacanāt karmaiva paryāyeṇoktamityapare |
T03n1146_019:279: atītānāgatasyāsattvenālambanabhāvānupapattervartamānasya cārthasya sākārajñānādibhirgrahītumaśakyatvena sarvālambanaśūnyatve sālambanāpi cetanā kathamutpadyata ityāha |
T03n1146_019:285: rūpādigatamasādhāraṇaṃ cihnaṃ tattvenānimittamapi yathādarśanaṃ nimittīkṛtyāropyeti yāvat |
T03n1146_019:287: lokavyavahāramupādāyeti saṃvṛtimadhikṛtyotpadyata ityanantaraṃ ucyata iti śeṣaḥ |
T03n1146_019:301: pyarthe pratyekavineyabhedena punaḥ punarāśaṅkāyāṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ parihārābhidhāne'
T03n1146_019:302: pi na sarveṣāmekabuddhotpādakāla eva viparyāsāpanayanaṃ śakyaṃ kartuṃ bhavyānāmevārthakaraṇādityetatpraśnavisarjanādhikāreṇaivānāgatabuddhaparamparotpatirityaparisamāptinirdeśo'
T03n1146_019:322: yadi tvayā ete rūpādayo dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathainān dharmān vācā bhāṣase,
T03n1146_019:326: prayogādyavasthāsu na vedmītyādi yojyam kathaṃ tarhītyāha |
T03n1146_019:329: sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇanirvikalpakajñānenaivaṃ svabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā māyopamatvena svabhāvatvāt sākṣātkṛtā yathādhigamāvasthāyāṃ vikalpāsamudācārānna kāyena spṛśyeta,
T03n1146_019:341: taṃ dharmakṣayānutpādajñānalakṣaṇamarhatvaṃ vikalpajñānenādhigamakāle kiṃ tvaṃ paśyasyupalabhasa iti yāvat |
T03n1146_019:346: tadevaṃ karmābhāvādicodyānāṃ yathoktā eva pratisamādhayo grāhyāḥ |
T03n1146_019:356: tatra sattvalokasyāśuddhiryā jighatsādikā tasyāḥ pratipakṣeṇa divyopabhogādiśuddhyupasaṃhārataḥ,
T03n1146_019:357: tathā bhājanalokasyāśuddhiryā sthāṇukaṇṭakādikā tasyāḥ pratipakṣeṇa samapāṇitalajātādiśuddhyupasaṃhārato yathākramaṃ dvividhabuddhakṣetraviśuddhirityabhisaṃkṣepataḥ
T03n1146_019:388: ladhvacchaṃ śuci pātuśca kukṣikaṇṭhau na bādhate ||
T03n1146_019:398: nutpannaḥ saṃvṛtyā saiṣā cirakālavatī prathamakāraṇarahitatvādanādirapūrvā koṭiḥ |
T03n1146_019:420: samyaksambodhimabhisambhotsyata iti vyākaraṇena pārṣadānāmevaṃvidhabuddhakṣetraviśuddhilābhasampratyaye sākṣibhāvaḥ sūcita iti kecit |
T03n1146_020:1: niṣpāditabuddhakṣetraviśuddhinopāyakauśalena sambhāraṃ paripūrya paścādyathābhavyatayā buddhakṛtyaṃ svabuddhakṣetre karaṇīyamityupāyakauśalaṃ vaktavyam |
T03n1146_020:6: rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayeti tāṃ śūnyatāṃ dharmatayā śūnyatayā rūpaṃ vastviti pratyavekṣamāṇo yathā na samanupaśyecchūnyatāṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvenāstīti yathā nopalabhate tathā pratyavekṣitavyamiti yāvat |
T03n1146_020:16: prajñāpāramitā ca mahopāyakauśalātmikā mayā parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati |
T03n1146_020:17: na ca śūnyatā sākṣātkṛtetyabhiprāyādetanniṣṭha eva śūnyatāsamādhau cittaṃ dhārayati |
T03n1146_020:18: atra ca madhye jinajananīsāmarthyānna parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
T03n1146_020:19: na cāśravakṣayaṃ kāmabhavāśravaprahāṇaṃ sañcintya sattvārthaṃ pratijanmapratigrahāt karoti śūnyatāsamādhyālambanādāśravakṣaye ca parijayaṃ karotītyarthaḥ
T03n1146_020:33: tatra śauryarūpaguṇairmṛdumadhyādhimātraiḥ yathākramamupetatvātparamaśūraśca bhavedityādi navapadāni vācyāni |
T03n1146_020:61: tatra sattveṣu sukhasaṃyogaduḥkhaviyogasukhāviśleṣahitakaraṇāśayasamṛddhau saparivārāḥ samādhayo yathākramaṃ maitrīkaraṇāmuditopekṣāḥ |
T03n1146_020:71: na ca tatrāpi niśrito na ca pratiṣṭhita iti |
T03n1146_020:72: ākāśasyāsattvānna tatra buddhyā niśrito nāpi kāyena sthito'
T03n1146_020:73: tha ca tasminneva viharatītyapratiṣṭhitavihāropāyo jñāpitaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_020:122: yo hi kaścit subhūte bodhisattva ityādi |
T03n1146_020:123: tatra śūnyatāditrivimokṣamukhaviparyayeṇopalambhe caritāvina ityādi tridhoktaṃ tasyaiva ca vyākhyānaṃ piṇḍasaṃjñāyāmityādinā yathākramaṃ kṛtam
T03n1146_020:133: tatrāveṇiko dharmaḥ sarvasattvāparityāgastaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayajñānotpādanārthaṃ yathākramaṃ na sūcayati,
T03n1146_020:136: yato na prajānāti paripṛṣṭo na vyākaroti na visarjayatīti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ yojyam |
T03n1146_020:150: tadevaṃ viṣayaprayogābhyāṃ samanvāgataṃ yathoktameva daśavidhamupāyakauśalaṃ grāhyam |
T03n1146_020:163: dhigama iti mūrdhābhisamayo vaktavyastatra liṅgaṃ tāvadasyābhidhānīyaṃ yenāsau liṅnyate |
T03n1146_020:167: evaṃ prajñopāyaparigṛhītā bodhisattvasya yogadharmabhāvanāmūrdhaprāptā yat svapnāntare'
T03n1146_020:168: pyasya yogavidarśanāmanaskārāstathābhūtadharmā sākṣātkaraṇena sattvadhātusāpekṣā eva pravartanta iti |
T03n1146_021:24: hīnādahaṃ śreyān sadṛśena vāsadṛśa iti cittonnatirmānaḥ |
T03n1146_021:25: sadṛśādahaṃ śreyān śreyasā vā sadṛśa ityatimānaḥ |
T03n1146_021:79: yacca māreṇa nirdiṣṭaṃ nāmadheyaṃ tadetadubhayaṃ sameti saṅgacchata iti nirūpya maṃsyata iti sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_021:82: evaṃ nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvānāṃ tiraskāriṇo durlabhā bodhirityādi |
T03n1146_021:99: yathoktadharmāṇaśca sarva eva saddharmāvaraṇādaya ti nyāyānniḥśeṣaṃ kṣayaṃ yātyeva mananāpattisthānam |
T03n1146_021:100: yatpunaḥ praṇaśyantītyādi vacanaṃ tadasatyāṃ pratipakṣabhāvanāyāmiti jñeyam |
T03n1146_021:117: nāmāpadeśenaivaṃ mārakarma nirdiśya vivekaguṇenāpi mṛdu mārakarmārthamāha |
T03n1146_021:133: tenāraṇyavāsādinā vivekena viharannasmin bodhisattvaviveke mahopāyakauśalādau na saṃdṛśyate |
T03n1146_022:19: vipraṇāśakāraṇavikṣepadauṣprajñapratipakṣeṇa tathaiva dhyānaprajñāpāramite cetyevaṃ vipakṣapratipakṣavyavasthānataḥ ṣaḍiti saṃkhyāvyavasthānam
T03n1146_022:21: vikṣepaḥ sampadyate yamavikṣepaṃ niśritya yathāvaddharmatattvāvabodhādbuddhadharmāḥ samudāgacchantītyevaṃ sarvabuddhadharmasamudāgamapadasthānataḥ saṃkhyāvyavasthānam |
T03n1146_022:26: sattvān paripācane yogyān kṛtvā vikṣiptacittānāṃ samādhānāya dhyānapāramitayā,
T03n1146_022:58: tatra hetuphalabhāvarahitatvādyathāsaṃkhyaṃ viviktāḥ śūnyā iti kecit |
T03n1146_022:68: pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃvṛtyā karmaphalasambandhasya vidyamānatvādyathābhiniveśastathā saṃkleśo yathā cānabhiniveśastathā vyavadānaṃ prajñāyata iti |
T03n1146_022:80: mūrdhaprāptasya yogasya liṅgaṃ dvādaśadhā matam ||1 || iti
T03n1146_022:83: sacet punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvā ityādi |
T03n1146_022:121: yāvat sā vā'nyā vā pratilabdhā bhavatīti |
T03n1146_022:122: sā vā prajñāpāramitā anyā vā samādhirājādisūtrāntadharmatā prāptā bhavati |
T03n1146_022:133: tasmācchūnyāḥ sarvadharmā ityālambanānmanaskārasyāpi śūnyatvādhimokṣe satyaviparyatvāt prajñāpāramitāmanaskārādvirahita ityādi |
T03n1146_022:140: yataḥ prajñāpāramitāyā hānivṛddhipratiṣedhabaddhobodhisattvasya paramārthato hānivṛddhipratiṣedhastato māyopamabhāvanayā saṃvṛtyā puṇyajñānasaṃbhāraṃ samudānayatyanuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate'
T03n1146_022:145: caratyayaṃ bodhisattva ityanena kaścit tāttviko dharmaḥ samākṣipta ityabhiprāyādāha |
T03n1146_022:157: sarvadharmānupalambhādeva paramārthadvāreṇānupapattau māyopamabhāvanayā saṃvṛtyā caraṇādanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu viśiṣṭādhimuktirbhavati |
T03n1146_022:168: anenākikalpā mūrdhābhisamaye prajñāpāramiteti kṛtvā bodhisattvasyaivaṃ vikalpābhāvaṃ svavyājenāha ||
T03n1146_024:11: mṛdumadhyādhimātrasukhodayena tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāstathaiva trividhasaumanasyotpādātpramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ |
T03n1146_024:25: yadi sā sarvajñatā parityaktā tadā kalahādisamutthapāpāpanayanārtham |
T03n1146_024:29: sambhavapratipattipakṣatvena sarveṣāmeva sampratikarmako dharma iti vyāptamāvedayannāha |
T03n1146_024:31: etaduktaṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ saṃyāne saṃghādiśeṣādyāpatteḥ pratikriyādeśanayā sampratikadharmako dharmadeśikastathā mahāyānikānāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakādau deśita iti |
T03n1146_024:38: yo'haṃ jalpite sati parasmin pratijalpāmīti kalahādayaḥ praśastatvena durlabdhā ityevaṃ cittamutpādayatītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_025:6: kathamanyatra śikṣāyāmanyatra śikṣā vidhīyata iti pṛcchayannāha |
T03n1146_025:14: kṣīyante'smin sarvavikalpā iti buddhatvaṃ kṣayo dharmadhāturvināśarahitatvādakṣaya iti |
T03n1146_025:46: pi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaśuddhadharmāparijñānavatāṃ sattvānāṃ tathābhūtajñānotpādanārthaṃ māyopamadharmabhāvanayā saṃsīdanatvena saṃvṛtyā balādipariśuddhiṃ prāpnotīti |
T03n1146_025:52: alpakāste bodhisattvā ityanena buddhagotrāṇāmūrdhvābhigamanasamaye vaivṛddhilābhayogyānāmalpīyastvaṃ jñāpitaṃ syāt |
T03n1146_025:83: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityādi |
T03n1146_025:92: upamāṃ bahudhā kṛtvā vivṛddhiḥ ṣoḍaśātmikā ||2 || iti
T03n1146_026:0: vivṛddhyaivaṃ vardhitasya mūrdhābhisamayasya sātmībhāvagamanaparyantalakṣaṇāṃ nirūḍhiṃ vaktuṃ prasaṃśayannāha |
T03n1146_026:7: sarvadoṣavaiṣamyābhāvānsame pārime tīre nirvāṇe buddhatva iti yāvat |
T03n1146_026:8: svaparobhayārthasampatsampādakatvena yathā kramamabhīpsitāḥ paricintitāḥ parigṛhītā iti kecit |
T03n1146_026:16: evambhūtādhigamāvasthāyāmapi nirvāṇapātaparihārārthaṃ mahākaruṇāsaṃmukhakaraṇāt sattvāvatāraṇādicittotpādācca mahākaruṇayā yuktāḥ |
T03n1146_026:40: sambhavatpramāṇasya vastuno yogibhiriyattayā palapramāṇena parimāṇaṃ prāmāttuṃ śakyata iti nyāyāccaturdvīpāditrisāhasralokadhātuprāmāṇaṃ gṛhyate
T03n1146_026:47: tatra caturvidho vipakṣo grāhyagāhakavikalpaḥ sapratipakṣo vaktavya ityādau tāvatsakalapravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaṃ prathamaṃ grāhyavikalpamāvedayanāha
T03n1146_026:65: anupalambhopalambhasvabhāvau pravṛttinivṛttipakṣau yathākramamādānasaṃtyāgākāreṇa grāhyāviti pravṛttinivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānau grāhyavikalpau vastunyapratibaddhavṛttitvena vitathapratibhāsitvādayathāviṣayasvarūpau vakṣyamāṇaviṣayaprabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakārau vibandhakatvāt kleśavadvipakṣau jñeyāviti |
T03n1146_026:67: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca pratyekaṃ tau navātmakau |
T03n1146_026:74: dravyasanneva ātmā grāhaka iti vikalpābhiniveśena pṛthagjanairanumoditāni kuśalamūlāni yatastasmātsatkārādikaṃ phalamuktaṃ na tvanyadbuddhatvādikamityarthaḥ
T03n1146_026:75: nanu cānātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityapi pṛthagjanāḥ pratipadyanta ityavyāpinī prathamagrāhakavikalpavyavasthā |
T03n1146_026:76: adhimuktimanaskāraḥ sa teṣāṃ tattvamanaskāraśceha vivakṣita ityasāram |
T03n1146_026:80: prajñaptisannevātmā grāhaka iti kalpābhiniveśenāryāṇāmanumodanācittotpādādvivivardhamānā bodheranuttarāyāḥ samutpādakā mukhyato bhaviṣyantītyarthaḥ
T03n1146_026:84: nanu cāryasyāpyevaṃ bhavatyaśrauṣamahaṃ bhikṣavo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye śṛgālasya prāṇino vāśitaśabdaṃ tathāhaṃ sa tasmin sayaye'
T03n1146_026:90: yadā tadviṣayabhāvāpannagrāhyāvathau na tathā grāhyarūpeṇa bhavatastadā na kasyacittau grāhakāviti |
T03n1146_026:91: grāhakarūpeṇānayorviviktarūpamiti vitathapratibhāsitvādayathāviṣayasvarūpau vakṣyamāṇaviṣayabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakārau vibandhakatvādvipakṣāviti
T03n1146_026:98: tatra kathaṃ viṣayabhedena prathamo grāhyaḥ vikalpo na ca veti prathamavikalpārthamāha |
T03n1146_026:100: kathamiti kena prakāreṇa māyopamaṃ cittaṃ na māyā nāpyanyo dharmastattvena kathañcidabhisambudhyata iti |
T03n1146_026:103: yaścātyantavivikto dharma iti yo dharmaḥ svabhāvaśūnyaḥ so'
T03n1146_026:105: na ca nirviṣayaḥ sādhuḥ prayogo vidyate nañcaḥ vikalpāpāśrayatve vā sāṃvṛtaḥ syānna tāttvika iti nyāyānnāstitāñca na pratipadyata ityarthaḥ
T03n1146_026:157: avikalpatvādeva bhagavannityanena bodhisattvasyāpi tathāgatapriyāpriyāsaṃvidyamānadṛṣṭāntena pratipakṣavipakṣavikalpāpoho darśitaḥ |
T03n1146_026:173: calādibhūmipraveśena viyatabuddhagotramāyopamapratipattyā darśanādimārgasamudāgame pratibhāsamātreṇābhrāntajñānālambane guṇadoṣapūrvakopādeyaheyatvena pratipakṣavipakṣe sarvatragāditvena svādhigame hīnāpraṇītatvena śrāvakādibhūmidūrīkaraṇe yathāśayānurūpanirmāṇena sattvārthavyāpāre samyagupāyakauśalabalena sarvajananirvāṇapratiṣṭhāpanakriyāphale ca nirdoṣatayā sarvathopādeyatvena pravṛttiḥ kāryetyevaṃ pravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro mūrddhābhisamaye darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastattatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādena vyatirekamukhena pratipādita iti |
T03n1146_027:1: kathaṃ nivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo navadheti prathamavikalpārthamāha |
T03n1146_027:3: prajñākaruṇayoḥ saṃsāranirvāṇāpātakāritratvena sakalādhigamādhipatyādyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñcarati sa sāre pradhāne caratītyanena nyūnatādhigamavikalpo niṣiddhaḥ |
T03n1146_027:4: kintu tatrāpi sāratvābhiniveśo na kārya ityāha |
T03n1146_027:13: na ca tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvantītyanena pratipattiviśeṣajñāpanāt pratipattivaikalyavikalpābhāvo darśitaḥ |
T03n1146_027:57: tataścarati mukhyato niryāṇasvabhāvāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmevañca pṛṣṭhato niryāṇavikalpāpoho darśitaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_027:59: saṃsāranirvāṇānyataraprapātitvena śūnyatādhigame kalyāṇamitropāyakauśalavikalatvena saṃparigrahābhāve samastajñeyāvaraṇāpratipakṣatvena pratipadvaikalye tathāgatādyupadeśasāpekṣatvena parapratyayagāmitve sarvasattvāgratāmahattvādyapravṛttatvenoddeśanivṛttau kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣatvena prādeśikamārgavyāpāre sopalambhena prathamaphalādyadhigamanānātve sarvāvidyānuśayāprahīṇatvena sthānagamanājñāne mahāyānasarvasaṃgrāhakatvena sarvākārajñatāsarvanirvāṇapaścādanugamane ca sadoṣatayā grāhyatvena nivṛttiḥ kāryā |
T03n1146_027:60: ityevannivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasantānopādeyatvasamudbhavo dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārge cittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ praheyastattatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhena pratipādita iti |
T03n1146_027:99: sarvadharmāścānena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavantītyanena bhāvābhiniveśavikalpaśca pratikṣiptaḥ |
T03n1146_027:102: dharmavastuprajñaptivikalpo mayā prahatavya ityuktārthasya niṣpādanādyathāvādī tathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati |
T03n1146_027:111: pramuditāṃ bhūmimārabhya yāvat samantaprabhābuddhabhūmyadhigamalābhādyathākramaṃ nātho bhaviṣyasītyādyekādaśapadāni vācyāni |
T03n1146_027:127: pi tathāgatā madbuddhakṣetrāvasthitabodhisattvānāṃ nāmādikīrtanaparā dharmaṃ deśayantīti |
T03n1146_027:140: etadeva te punaḥ katama ityāśaṅkya pratipādayannāha |
T03n1146_027:142: akṣobhyasyeti vacanaṃ bāhulyena tadbuddhakṣetre pariśuddhasantatīnāmutpādāt anyānapyatidiśannāha |
T03n1146_027:152: nabhiniveśena sarvābhiniveśe dravyasadbhāvena sarvadharmaprajñaptau tattvajñānāsaktyānabhiniveśapūrvakasaktau samatābhāvanā'
T03n1146_027:153: pratipakṣatayā pratipakṣe samyagavijñātaprajñāpāramitatvena yathecchagamanavyāghāte ca pāramārthikabhāvābhiniveśena dravyasannevātmā grāhakaḥ pravartata ityevaṃ pṛthagjanasambandhī prathamo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyaḥ,
T03n1146_027:159: saktau ca pratipakṣe ca yathecchaṃ ca gatikṣatau ||14 ||iti
T03n1146_027:166: na ca tāvat prakarṣavatīmanutpattikadharmakṣāntimavinivartanīyavaśitāprāptiṃ cādhigatā bhavantītyevamuddeśāniryāṇavikalpābhāvo darśitaḥ |
T03n1146_027:182: ye bodhisattvāḥ kāṃkṣādikamakṛtvā vistareṇa śravaṇādikaṃ kariṣyantīti teṣāñcāntike brahmacaryacaraṇādikamanuṣṭhāsyanti te'
T03n1146_027:186: rūpādisthānavikalpānupalambhena ye tvadhimucya prajñāpāramitāṃ tathatvāya ca sthitvā buddhatvanimittaṃ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
T03n1146_027:192: dharmadhātusvabhāvatvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatāvyatiriktānyadharmānupalambhe sati naiva kaścitparamārthatastathatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
T03n1146_027:199: tattvato na tathatā nānyo vā dharmo bodhimabhisambudhyate kintu saṃvṛtyā prārthanā'
T03n1146_027:203: tattvato na tathatā dharmaṃ deśayatyapi tu saṃvṛtyā hetvabhāvavikalpavirahāddhetusadbhāvena deśayatītyabhiprāyaḥ |
T03n1146_027:205: so'pi subhūte nopalabhyate yo dharmo deśyeteti |
T03n1146_027:208: śrāvakādiniryāṇatvena yathoktoddeśāniryāṇe hitāhitaprāptiparihāratvena mārgāmārgāvadhāraṇe saṃvṛtikāryakāraṇabhāvenotpādanirodhe nirantaretarapratibhāsatvena samastavastusaṃyogaviyoge vyomāvasthitaśakunisadṛśarūpādisthāne,
T03n1146_027:210: tyantamātsaryadharmatayā pratyarthikamārādivastūpalambhe ca tāttvikabhāvābhiniveśena prajñaptisannevātmā grāhakaḥ pravartata ityevamāryāṇāṃ sambandhī dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgacittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokto bhavati |
T03n1146_027:222: syāt gotrameva na gotravikalpa iti paścātpādakaḥ |
T03n1146_027:223: yastāvadgotravikalpo gotramapi tat tadyathā pratipakṣasamudāgamakāle gotram |
T03n1146_027:227: pi saḥ tadyathā samudāgacchataḥ samyagālambane prayogaḥ |
T03n1146_027:231: darśanamārge vipakṣaṃ sapratipakṣameva nirdiśya yanmahābodhipariniṣpattaye darśanamārgo yena trividhakāraṇena sahita iṣyate |
T03n1146_027:233: mahābodhau darśanādimārgasandarśanenānyeṣāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathayannāha |
T03n1146_027:239: nuttarāṃ bodhiṃ saṃvṛtyā boddhukāmāste duṣkarakārakā ityutsāhapravedanādbodhau darśanādimārgasaṃdarśanānyeṣāṃ pratipāditā syāt |
T03n1146_027:248: dharmasya cānudharmamiti yathā praṇihitasya śūnyatādharmasya pratipattiḥ |
T03n1146_027:256: kāmādidhātutraye pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśaprahāṇakāriṇoḥ darśanamārgasya śūnyatārūpeṇa darśitatvādyathākramaṃ prajñāpāramitāmapi tāvannopalabhyata ityārabhya yāvaddharmameva tāvannopalabhyata iti navapadāni vācyāni |
T03n1146_027:259: yadyevaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ samāna eva śrāvakāṇāṃ vihāra iti cedāha |
T03n1146_028:10: yaṃ śastrarogābhyāṃ durbhikṣeṇa ca nirgamādapakarṣaḥ prathamo'
T03n1146_028:18: paścimasyotkarṣakāla iti samānakālāḥ sarve bhavantyevamekenāntarakalpena bhājanānāṃ dhvaṃsādekonaviṃśatyā śūnyībhavanādviṃśatimantarakalpān lokaḥ saṃvartate,
T03n1146_028:23: ato'pakarṣa eva kāle yathoktāntarakalpapramāṇena kālasya paricchedādviṃśatikalpasahasrāṇītyucyate |
T03n1146_028:24: bodhinimittārthamevānyeṣāṃ samyaggranthārthādidvāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratyarpaṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaktumupodvātayannāha |
T03n1146_028:31: yadyanyathāpraṇidhikaraṇānna visaṃvādayiṣyatyevaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya na dāsyati vipākamityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_028:37: dhāraṇādyartha meva pratyarpaṇānmahāvajradhara eva saṅgītikāra ityapare |
T03n1146_028:53: bodhiprāptaye cāvyavahitaṃ svataḥ pracurataraprajñāpāramitābhāvanādipuṇyalakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathayannāha |
T03n1146_028:56: tatrādhvaparyantaḥ kṣaṇaḥ viṃśatkṣaṇaśataṃ punastatkṣaṇaste punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ |
T03n1146_028:59: iti nyāyātkathaṃ kṣaṇenaikena dharmaṃ deśayatīti ceducyate |
T03n1146_028:61: tena tasya dharmo deśita iti vyapadiśyate |
T03n1146_028:112: ayamabhiprāyaḥ yathākāśasya dravyābhāvamātrasvabhāvatvātpramāṇādi grahītuṃ na śakyate tathā māturapīti |
T03n1146_028:120: tatra dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvādhivacanaṃ nāmakāyāsteṣāmeva viśeṣādhivacanaṃ padakāyāḥ tadubhayāśrayākṣarāṇi vyañjanakāyāḥ |
T03n1146_028:121: nāmādisvabhāvā prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā sāpi na mukhyataḥ prajñāpāramitetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_028:124: etaduktaṃ paramārthatastāthāgataṃ jñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā tatpratipādanādupacāravṛtyā granthātmikā prajñāpāramitā tattvata iti |
T03n1146_028:146: iti dharmadhātusvabhāvānāmākāśasyeva nirodhotpādābhāvādekānekasvabhāvakāryakāraṇavicārakapramāṇādyupapannabhāvavaidhūryādgaganakamalavadvā yathākramaṃ malānāṃ kṣayotpādābhāvādakṣayānutpādajñānātmikā sarvadharmāviparītādhigatilakṣaṇā mahābodhiryathāvatprajñāpāramitā dharmakāyo'
T03n1146_028:151: evañca tattve nirdiṣṭe kecidbahulataropalambhābhiniveśena bhāvavināśābhisandhinā kṣīṇe kṣīṇamiti jñānaṃ kṣayajñānamanāgatabhāvānutpādābhisandhinā cānutpādajñānaṃ varṇayantīti mahābodhisvarūpaṃ vipratipattisthānatvenāhatya pratipādayitumāha |
T03n1146_028:160: naiṣa doṣo yasmātprayogakālamevārabhya vināśotpādavigatānmāyopamān sarvadharmān bhāvayatītyāha |
T03n1146_028:164: tatra pūrvajanmani kleśāvasthehāvidyā tathā puṇyādikarmāvasthā saṃskārāḥ tatheha janmani pratisandhikṣaṇe pañcaskandhavijñānam |
T03n1146_028:176: tataḥ pareṇa yāvadvedanāvasthā sā jarāmaraṇamityādyantayordve dve madhyasthāviti trikāṇḍo dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo'
T03n1146_028:199: yasmādevaṃ sarvadharmādarśanamato ye bhāvavināśābhisandhinā kṣīṇe kṣīṇamiti jñānaṃ kṣayajñānaṃ bhāvānutpādābhisandhinā cānutpanne'
T03n1146_028:202: tathā hyutpannānutpannayoryathākramaṃ kṣayotpattivighātalakṣaṇanirodhenāniruddhāyāṃ paramārthatastathatārūpāyāṃ prakṛtau satyāṃ kataradvikalpādirūpamutpannaṃ kṣīṇaṃ kataraccānutpannamanutpattidharmakaṃ jātaṃ darśanamārgabalena vitathabhāvābhiniveśināṃ vādināṃ |
T03n1146_028:208: anyathā tāttvikadharmasattvopagame bhagavataḥ sarvathā vikalpakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ durupapādaṃ syāt |
T03n1146_028:209: tathā hyudayavyayaśūnyatvānnāstyātmeti vibhāvayannātmābhiniveśaṃ parityajya tadviviktasvabhāvaṃ skandhādikaṃ pratītyasamutpannamudayavyayadharmakaṃ samupalabhya nīlataddhiyoḥ sahopalambhaniyamāccittamātramevedaṃ na bāhyārtho'
T03n1146_028:210: stīti manasikurvannaparityaktagrāhakākāracittābhiniveśo bāhyārthābhiniveśaṃ tiraskṛtya grāhyābhāve grāhakābhāva iti nidhyāyaṃstāmapi grāhakākāralakṣaṇaṃ vijñaptimātratāmavadhūyādvayajñānameva kevalaṃ bhāvato bhāvarūpamiti niścitya tadapi pratītyasamutpannatvānmāyāvanniḥsvabhāvaṃ tattvato'
T03n1146_028:211: pagataikāntabhāvābhāvādiparāmarśarūpamiti bhāvayan bhāvanābalaniṣpattau keṣāñcinmaṇirūpyādijñānavadutsāritasakalabhrāntinimittāyā māyopamātmapratibhāsadhiyo nirvikalpāyāḥ kathañcit pratyātmavedyāyāḥ samutpāde jñeyāvaraṇaṃ samyagyogau prajahyāt |
T03n1146_028:212: anyathā paraiḥ sarvadā ākāśasya dravyābhāvamātrarūpadhāraṇavadanādheyānapaneyasvarūpadhāraṇāddharmmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ jñānamātrarūpāṇāṃ jñeyalakṣaṇānāñca yadi paramārthato vidyamānatā syāttadā pratipakṣabhāvanayā ākāśasyaiva teṣāṃ na kiñcit kriyate |
T03n1146_028:213: ato bhāvābhiniveśaviparyāsāvinivṛtyā yadbhagavataḥ sarvathā jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ dharmāṇāñcayatsattopagamyate tatparasparaviruddhārthābhyupagame vismayasthānīyaṃ bhavet |
T03n1146_028:215: sattā ca nāma dharmāṇāṃ jñeye vāvaraṇakṣayaḥ |
T03n1146_028:216: kathyate yatparaiḥ śāsturatra vismīyate mayā ||20 || iti
T03n1146_028:218: pavādasamāroparūpamapanayanaprakṣepaṃ kasyaciddharmasyākṛtvedameva pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃvṛtyā tathyarūpaṃ rūpādiniḥsvabhāvādirūpato nirūpaṇīyamevañca māyāgajenāparamāyāgajaparājayavadviparyāsanirvṛtyā tattvadarśī vimucyata iti pratipattavyam |
T03n1146_028:221: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate ||21 || iti
T03n1146_028:229: nanu mukhyato darśanamārgasya mahābodhikāraṇatvātkathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyamityuktamiti |
T03n1146_028:237: iha tu granthasaṃkṣepasyābhipretatvādupalakṣaṇatvena pratyekaṃ dānādipāramitācaryayāpi ṣaḍeva pāramitā bhāvanāniṣpatiṃ pratipadyanta ityavagantavyam
T03n1146_028:239: "iha subhūte bodhisattvasya dānaṃ dadataḥ sattveṣu maitraṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavatyevaṃ śīlapāramitā |
T03n1146_028:242: tasyaiva ca taddānaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmivikṣepacittābhāvena dhyānapāramitā |
T03n1146_028:244: evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣato yāvatprajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ pratyekaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrisaṃgraho yathā sūtraṃ vācyaḥ |
T03n1146_028:246: dānādiṣaṭpāramitānāṃ pratyekamekaikabhāve dānādau yaḥ parasparaṃ sarvapāramitāsaṃgrahaḥ,
T03n1146_028:250: ekaikasyeva dānādau teṣāṃ yaḥ saṅgraho mithaḥ |
T03n1146_028:253: evaṃvidhavikalpānāṃ prāgeva prahāṇasambhavāt kathamasyāṃ prakarṣaparyantādhigamāvasthāyāṃ prahāṇaṃ nirdiśyata iti cet |
T03n1146_028:254: nāyaṃ doṣo yasmātsūkṣmaguhyānupraveśamahābhijñāvibandhakasammohau tadvījaṃ ca daśamyāṃ bhūmau prahīyata ityāryasandhinirmocanādisūtre paṭhayate
T03n1146_028:255: tasmādyathoktasavāsanasaṃmohanidānasamucchedena nidānināmevaṃvidhagrāhyagrāhakacaturvikalpānāṃ prakarṣaparyantādhigamasvabhāvatvena daśamyāṃ bhūmau pratividdhe mūrdhābhisamaye niyamāt prahāṇaṃ pratipadyate |
T03n1146_028:257: mandabuddhīnāṃ vyutpādanādanugrahābhiprāyeṇa yathānirdiṣṭavikalpānāṃ viṣayabhedāt pratyekaṃ navadhā bhedaḥ kṛtaḥ |
T03n1146_028:263: tasmin prahīṇe tanmūlā grāhyavikalpādayaḥ kathamavasthānaṃ labheranniti |
T03n1146_028:264: asmiṃśca darśanamārge samutpanne kāmarūpārūpyadhātubhedena pratyekaṃ caturvikalpanavaprakāratayā'
T03n1146_028:265: ṣṭottaraśatagrāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahāṇena tatsaṃgṛhītavikalpajanakavāsanākleśāṣṭottaraśataprahāṇaṃ pratītyasamutpādadharmatayopalabhya tatra vaśitvārthaṃ tāmeva punaḥpunabhāvayatītyāha |
T03n1146_028:267: darśanamārgaprāpto yogau kleśajñeyāvaraṇabhayābhāvāt siṃhavijṛsbhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyottarakālamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityādyanulomaṃ jarāmaraṇanirodho jātinirodhādityādi pratilomaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ nirūpayati |
T03n1146_028:277: prathamadhyānamārabhya yāvannirodhaṃ gatvā tato nirodhamārabhya yāvatprathamadhyānamāgamyaivamanulomapratilomakramadvayena caturdhyānacaturārūpyanirodhalakṣaṇā navasamāpattīrgatvā' '
T03n1146_028:279: gamya punaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya tato vyutthāya nirodhamevaṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānirodhaṃ samāpadya tato vyutthāyānantarasamāpattimālambya kāmāvacaraṃ vijñānaṃ maryādārūpeṇāvasthāpyopāyakauśalyabalena vyutthāya tadeva vijñānamasamāhitamāmukhīkṛtya tato nirodhaṃ tato'
T03n1146_028:280: samāhitaṃ tato nirodhamekaṃ parityajya naivaṃsaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ tato'
T03n1146_028:282: samāhitamevaṃ yāvadaṣṭau parityajya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya tato'
T03n1146_028:283: samāhitamityekādiparityāgenānirodhaṃ yāvadvisadṛśadvāreṇa gacchatītyatulyagāmavaskandasamāpattiṃ vaśitvalakṣaṇāṃ bhāvanāmārgasvabhāvāṃ sarvopāyakauśalyātmikāṃ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyamiti |
T03n1146_028:291: pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāmamumevārthamadhikṛtya vistareṇa punariha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkasavicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharatītyādyabhidhānānna sandehaḥ kāryaḥ | yastvāha |
T03n1146_028:295: kiṃ khalu vāyasasya pāyasena sālakṣaṇyamanyadevedaṃ prasthānam |
T03n1146_028:308: kīdṛśī sabhāgatā nānyā gatirityapi tu samyaksambodhigatiḥ ime'
T03n1146_029:1: bhāvanāmārgamevamabhidhāya tatra praheyaścaturvidho grāhyagrāhakavikalpaḥ vipakṣapratipakṣapratipādanaparatvena vaktavya ityupodghātayannāha
T03n1146_029:37: saṃkṣiptarucisattvānugraheṇa dharmasaṃkṣepe vistararucisattvānukampayā dharmavistare yathāvihitārthānānuṣṭhānena buddhasānāthyāparigrahe samutpananiruddhatvena prayogamārgāguṇābhāve samyagutpattivaidhuryāddarśanamārgaguṇābhāve anāgatāsattvena bhāvanāmārgaguṇābhāve śāntatvādinā nirvāṇaprayogamārge śūnyatābhinirhāratvena darśanamārge naiḥsvābhāvyabhāvakatvena bhāvanāmārge ca māyopamatayā pravṛttirmayā kāryetyevaṃ pravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro bhāvanāmārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastattat pratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokta iti |
T03n1146_029:43: prathamamevaṃ nirdiśya dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro vaktavya iti |
T03n1146_029:62: tasmādajānānāḥ santo dharmā vartamāne notpannā dharmadhāturivātyantānutpādāt |
T03n1146_029:73: kalyāṇamitrādivaikalyādbodhicittānutpāde viśiṣṭabuddhā lambanapuṇyābhāvādbodhimaṇḍāmanaskāre śrāvakagotratvāttadyānamanaskaraṇe pratyekabuddhagotratvāttadyānāmukhīkaraṇe prajñāpāramitāpratipattivaidhuryātsamyaksambodhyamanaskaraṇe sopalambhatvena bhāvanāyāṃ nirūpalambhavattvenābhāvanāyāmanupalambhānanupalambhatvānnabhāvanānābhāvane viparītābhiniveśādayathārthatve ca bhāvādyabhiniveśādduṣṭatvena nivṛttirmayā kāryetyevaṃ nivṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro bhāvanāmārge cittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastattatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokta iti |
T03n1146_029:80: dvitīyamevaṃ grāhyavikalpaṃ nirdiśya prathamagrāhakavikalpo navaprakāro vaktavya iti |
T03n1146_029:121: dravyasadanupapattyā sattvaprajñaptau pratibhāsamātratvāt sarvadharmaprajñaptau sarvatragatvāt sarvākārajñatādidharmāśūnyatve sarvathābhiniveśaprahāṇāddharmasaktau niḥsvabhāvāvabodhena dharmapravicaye samuddeśākaraṇena vastūddeśakaraṇe rūpādyupalambhatvādyānatrayaniryāṇe samyagapratipannatvena dakṣiṇā'
T03n1146_029:122: śuddhau dānādyupalambhapratipattyā caryāvikopane ca dravyasannevātmā grāhaka ityevaṃ dravyasatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro bodhisattvānāṃ bhāvanāmārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyastatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokta iti |
T03n1146_029:126: kṛte ca vastuno yānatritaye ca sa kīrttitaḥ |
T03n1146_029:127: dakṣiṇāyā aśuddhau vā caryāyāśca vikopane ||31 || iti
T03n1146_029:128: prathamamevaṃ grāhakavikalpaṃ nirdiśya dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro vaktavya iti prathamavikalpārthamāha |
T03n1146_029:156: sarvākārāparijñānena sarvakārajñatāvaraṇasaṃmohe sarvamārgāparijñānena mārgajñatāvaraṇasaṃmohe sarvavastvaparijñānena sarvajñatāvaraṇasaṃmohe
T03n1146_029:157: parijñānena sarvaśāntamārgasaṃmohe tathatājñeyarūpādyaparijñānena tathatādisaṃyogaviyogasaṃmohe mārādisvarūpāparijñānenāsamatvasaṃmohe yathārutārthagrāhitvena duḥkhādisatyasaṃmohe rāgādisvabhāvāparijñānena kleśapravṛttisaṃmohe grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇāparijñānenādvayasaṃmohe ca |
T03n1146_029:158: sattvaprajñaptitadvyavasthāpanapratibhāsamānahetuviṣayaḥ prajñaptisanneva ātmāgrāhaka iti prajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro bhāvanāmārgacittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ praheyastattatpratipakṣāvasthāpratipādanena vyatirekamukhenokta iti |
T03n1146_029:165: dvayābhāve ca saṃmohe vikalpaḥ paścimo mataḥ ||34 || iti
T03n1146_029:166: yathoktabhāvanāmārge vipakṣamevaṃ sapratipakṣaṃ nirdiśya tadadhigamenaiva caturvikalpaprahāṇāt sarvaguṇasampado bhavantītyāha |
T03n1146_029:168: etaduktaṃ bhāvanāmārgābhyāsādāsāñcaturvikalpajātīnāmupadravatvenetīnāṃ kṣaye sati maṃrodhavaikalpena saṃharṣocchāsaprāptā iva sarvāstriyānasaṃgṛhītā guṇasampadaḥ kṛpāpāratantryātsarvaprakārajagatsaukhyotpādanadakṣāḥ sarvathābhimukhyā gamanaprakāreṇa prakarṣaparyantādhigamaphalaiḥ prāptaśobhaṃ bhāvanāmārgasthaṃ bodhisattvamāśrayante mahāsamudramiva nadya ityevaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ samudāgamāparyantatvena mahānuśaṃsāsvabhāvena bhāvanāmārgo'
T03n1146_029:177: etaduktaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau bodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātavīyasattvān pratiṣṭhāpya kaścidyatpuṇyaṃ prasravati tadupamīkṛtya tadviśiṣṭapuṇyabahutvena yā sarvākārajñatā buddhatvamiti buddhatvaprāpteravyavahito yaḥ pūrvasamanantaraḥ samādhiḥ so'
T03n1146_029:183: ānantaryasamādhiḥ sa sarvākārajñatā ca tat ||38 || iti
T03n1146_029:184: asya cānantaryasamādheḥ sarvadharmābhāva ālambanapratyayaḥ smaraṇañcādhipatipratyayaḥ prakṛtiśāntatā cākāro'
T03n1146_029:191: atra ca sthāne duravagāhatvādaviditopāyakauśalānāṃ pravādināṃ nānācodyamukhaparamparā prasarpiṇī vipratipattiridānīṃ nirākartavyeti |
T03n1146_029:199: sarvathā nirūpatvādālambanasvabhāvadhāraṇe dvitīyavipratipattiṃ nirākartuṃ prakṛtiviśuddhatvādasamatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathaivālambanasvabhāvavyavasthāpanādabdhātvaparyantatayā
T03n1146_029:202: dānādyanupalambhena prayoge pañcamavipratipattiṃ nirākartuṃ prajñaptisattvādākāśasamatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvavatprayogasvabhāvaniścayādākāśadhātvaparyantatayā
T03n1146_029:203: bodhavyābhāvādbuddharatne ṣaṣṭhavipratipattinirācikīrṣayā vijñaptimātrātmakatvādvijñānasamatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathaiva tathāgatarūpatvādvijñānadhātvaparyantatayā prajñāpāramitānugantavyetyāha |
T03n1146_029:211: rūpādyālambanapratiṣedhātsaṃgharatne vipratipattiṃ nirākartuṃ māyopamatvātsarvadharmasañcayavigatatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvavat saṅgharūpatvāt,
T03n1146_029:224: vibhāvitamārgaphalāsākṣātkaraṇena mārge vipratipatternirākaraṇāya māyopamatvena śūnyatāparyantadharmatvātsarvadharmāṇāṃ sattvenādhigamābhāvāśchūnyatāparyantatayā
T03n1146_029:227: hānopādānābhāvena vipakṣe pratipakṣe ca vipratipattiṃ nirākartumavidyodbhūtapratibhāsacittacaitasikāparyantatvena sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃvṛtyāvasthāpitavipakṣapratipakṣabhāvāccittacaitasikāparyantatayā
