T03n1146_029:235: pi vipratipattīnāṃ sannihitavineyajanavipratipattinirācikīrṣayā yathoktā eva parasparaviruddhā bhāṣārthānusthānenāyujyamānatayā saṃśayarūpāḥ ṣoḍaśavipratipattiryathānirdiṣṭaviṣayatvena sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ |
T03n1146_029:236: sarveṣāmeva viditabodhisattvopāyakauśalajanapravādināṃ yathāsaṃbhavamubhayasatyāśritopāyakauśalena nirākṛtya samyaksarvathā niścayamutpādya kalyāṇakāmairbodhisattvairānantaryasamādhiradhigamyata iti pratipattavyam |
T03n1146_029:241: prayoge triṣu ratneṣu sopāye samaye muneḥ |
T03n1146_029:249: samyak daśabhūminiṣpādakena smṛtyupasthānādinā saptabodhyaṅgākāreṇāryāṣṭāṅgamārgatayā ca paramārthato'
T03n1146_029:250: smaraṇalakṣaṇena trividhabuddhānusmaraṇena yathākramaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyadarśanabhāvanāmārgadyotakena tathaiva kuśalākuśalāvyākṛtadharmānusmaraṇena pūrvavadāryāvaivartikabodhisattvasaṅghasmaraṇena tathaiva śīlatyāgadevatānāmanusmaraṇena rūpādisarvadharmābhāve svabhāvenāvabuddhena ca yo'
T03n1146_029:263: prathamaṃ tāvadeko bhāvaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ sarve bhāvā ekasvabhāvāḥ |
T03n1146_029:264: eko bhāvastattvato yena dṛṣṭaḥ sarve bhāvāstattvatastena dṛṣṭā iti nyāyānna kevalaṃ bahubhirekasya saṃgrahaḥ,
T03n1146_029:277: tadanu yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatā'
T03n1146_029:278: vasthā sarvakalaṅkāpagamena śaradindujyotsnāvat śuklasvabhāvā jātā tadaikasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānāmanāsravasarvadharmāṇāṃ bodhājjñānaṃ prajñāpāramitetyevaṃ vipākadharmatā'
T03n1146_029:284: tadanupūrvaṃ svapnopamasarvadharmābhyāsena sambhāradvayamanubhūyādhigamāvasthāyāṃ svapnasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣūpādānaskandhādiṣu sthitvā dānādiṣaṭpāramitāpratipattyā dānādirūpanirūpaṇākāreṇālakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti |
T03n1146_029:289: tadanu nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvādunmūlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate tadā sarve'
T03n1146_029:290: pyevaṃ dharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaivakṣaṇena paśyatītyevamadvayalakṣaṇasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇo bhavatyekakṣaṇābhisambodhaścaturthaḥ
T03n1146_029:295: nāsravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇābhisambodhadvayaṃ nirdiśyaivaṃ viśiṣṭādhigamāvasthāyāṃ dharmataikarasatvenāsaṃbhedāt svapnasvabhāvībhūtasarvadharmāvagamārthaṃ tṛtīyamalakṣaṇasarvadharmaikakṣaṇābhisamayaṃ pratipādya svapnāvasthāyāmapi grāhyagrāhakayostattvenānupalambhādadvayapratipattyarthamadvayalakṣaṇasarvadharmaikakṣaṇādhigamo nirdiṣṭa ityevaṃ lakṣaṇenaikakṣaṇābhisamayaścatuḥprakāro'
T03n1146_029:297: anye tu yadi nāma catuḥprakāraḥ sannihitavineyajanānurodhena vyāvṛttibhedātkathañcidupāttastathāpyanyatama evaikaḥ prakāro yoginā kenacitsākṣātkartavya iti manyanta iti |
T03n1146_029:303: yena sādharmyeṇa rūpādīnāṃ samudrādibhistulyatvaṃ tathā samudrāparyantayetyādi padavyākhyāne prāgeva vyākhyātamiti na punarucyate |
T03n1146_029:311: vatariṣyati sarvākārābhisambodhenāvabhāsyate mūrdhābhisamayena cintayiṣyati anupūrvābhisamayena tulayiṣyati ekakṣaṇābhisamayenopaparīkṣiṣyate dharmakāyābhisambodhena ca bhāvayiṣyati,
T03n1146_029:312: tadā nāsya bodhisattvasya durlabhā sarvaguṇānāṃ dharmakāyasvabhāvānāṃ buddhakṣetrasya sāmbhogikakāyalakṣaṇasyānuttarāṇāñca buddhadharmāṇāṃ sakarmakanirmāṇakāyasvarūpāṇāṃ paripūrirityavayavārthaḥ |
T03n1146_029:314: sa ca dharmakāyābhisambodhaḥ svābhāvikakāyādibhedena caturvidha iti |
T03n1146_029:315: tatra prathamo ye smṛtyupasthānādayo jñānātmakā lokottarā dharmadhāturūpatvādanāsravāmalānāmāgantukatvena sarvaprakārāṃ viśuddhiṃ prakṛtiviviktalakṣaṇāṃ prāptāsteṣāṃ yā prakṛtiḥsvabhāvo'
T03n1146_029:317: yaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato lokottareṇa mārgeṇa prāpyate na kriyate ityakṛtrimārthena māyopamavijñānasarvadharmapratipattyā'
T03n1146_029:318: dhigataḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ pariśiṣṭakāyatrayaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtyā pratibhāsamānaṃ paramārthato dharmatārūpaṃ yathādhimokṣaprabhavitaṃ buddhabodhisattvaśrāvakādigocaratvena vyavasthāpitamiti kathanāya;
T03n1146_029:323: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
T03n1146_029:326: adhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatīti dvau |
T03n1146_029:332: adhyātmarūpārūpasaṃjñinau pratyekaṃ parīttādhimātrākārābhyāṃ bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatastānabhibhūya jānīta iti catuṣṭayam |
T03n1146_029:336: saṃsāramāsamāhitāvasthāyāṃpravartata iti praṇidhijñānaṃ ṣaḍabhijñāścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pūrvoktā āśrayālambanacittajñānapariśuddhaya iti catasraḥ śuddhayaḥ |
T03n1146_029:339: pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācārastathāgato nāstyasya viparītasamudācāratā yāṃ paraparijñānabhayāt pracchādayitavyāṃ manyetetyarakṣaṇaṃ trividham
T03n1146_029:346: sarve cāśrayaparāvṛttyā parāvṛttā bodhipakṣādayo niṣprapañcajñānātmakā dharmakāyo dvitīyo'
T03n1146_029:364: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
T03n1146_029:366: yathārutattvena lokottarānevānāsravān dharmānabhyupagamya teṣāṃ yā prakṛtiranutpādastallakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ kāyaḥ sa eva ca dharmatākāyo dharmakāya iti bhāvapratyayalopādvyapadiśyata iti vyākhyāya |
T03n1146_029:367: ke punaste'nāsravā dharmā yeṣāṃ prakṛtilakṣaṇo dharmakāya ityāśaṅkya bodhipakṣetyādikārikāmavatārayanti |
T03n1146_029:371: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā |
T03n1146_029:372: iti nyāyāddharmatātmakakāyapratipādanādevādvayajñānātmako dharmakāyaḥ pratipādita iti cedevaṃ tarhi nyāyasya tulyatvātsāmbhogikanairmāṇikakāyadvayamapi pratipāditamiti pṛthaṅnirdeśo na kartavyaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_029:373: atha pravacane paṭhitatvādyogisaṃvṛtyā tannirdeśa iti matamamunaiva nyāyenādvayajñānātmako'
T03n1146_029:389: iti śrāvakādipraṇidhijñānāttathāgatapraṇidhijñānasya ko viśeṣa iti cet ucyate |
T03n1146_029:396: syādevaṃ nityaṃ mahākaruṇāmayadharmakāyāvasthāne kathaṃ sakalaprāṇabhūtāṃ sadā nārthakriyeti |
T03n1146_029:398: yasya sattvasya yasmin kāle dharmadeśanādikaṃ kriyamāṇamāyatipathyaṃ bhavati,
T03n1146_029:402: ato yathā devarāje varṣatyapi sati pūtībhāvādinā'
T03n1146_029:407: paripākaṃ gate hetau yasya yasya yadā yadā |
T03n1146_029:408: hitaṃ bhavati kartavyaṃ prathate tasya tasya saḥ ||9 ||
T03n1146_029:409: varṣatyapi hi parjanye naiva bījaṃ prarohati |
T03n1146_029:416: tasmāt kathaṃ jñānātmako dharmakāyaḥ pratiniyatayogisantānādhāravartī pratikṣaṇamutpadyamāno vyāpī nitya ityapi kathyata iti na mantavyam |
T03n1146_029:419: akṣayatvācca tasyaiva nitya ityapi kathyate ||11 || iti
T03n1146_029:421: yaṃ kāyo dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavirājitagātro rūpakāyasvabhāvastṛtīyo buddhasya bhagavato grāhyaḥ |
T03n1146_029:695: mṛdvī tanvī ca raktā ca jihvā jīmūtaghoṣatā |
T03n1146_029:705: tadanu yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇāsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṅkarotyasau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā'
T03n1146_029:709: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
T03n1146_029:712: dānādicatuḥsaṅgrahavastuni pratiṣṭhāpya śrutamayādijñānena vipakṣapratipakṣaṃ heyopādeyadvāreṇa bodhayitvā māyākāra ivānunayādiviviktatayā maitryādilakṣaṇe parārthe sattvārthayāthātmye pratisthāpya,
T03n1146_029:722: tato balapāramitābalenāṣṭamyāṃ śrāvakādyasādhāraṇe bodhisattvamārge punastatraiva sarvabhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇe,
T03n1146_029:724: tadanantaraṃ jñānapāramitābalāddaśamyāṃ dvividhabuddhakṣetraviśuddhau pratiṣṭhāpya punastatraiva jātipratibaddhasvarūpe samyaksambodhipratiniyame daśadiglokadhātavīryasattvārthe sarvalokadhātubuddhopamasaṅkramaṇādiguṇe ca niveśayatyevamanukrameṇa punastatraiva viśeṣamārgasvarūpe samastabodhyāvāhakadharmalakṣaṇe bodhyaṅge karmaphalasambandhāvipraṇāśe,
T03n1146_029:727: śūnyatāsvabhāvena saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtāvyatibhedaparijñāne ca pratiṣṭhāpya tāthāgatyāṃ bhūmau nirvāṇe niveśayatītyevaṃ dharmakāyavadasyāsaṃsāraṃ saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karmavineyajanapratibhāsabhāk tadādhipatyāśrayeṇāyātaṃ saṃvṛtyā jñānameva sāmbhogikakāyādipratibhāsotpādadvāreṇārthakriyākārīti dharmakāyasyeṣyata iti kāritramavasātavyam |
T03n1146_029:730: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karma saṅgrahe ca caturvidhe ||34 ||
T03n1146_029:745: tataśca kenacidabhisamayālaṅkārakārikāpāṭhaṃ bāhulyena nānyathā kṛtvā pratibhātu te subhūta ityādi vākyamārabhyāsyā māturyadasambaddhaṃ samyaksamudāyāvayavārthānabhidhānādvyākhyātam
T03n1146_030:22: mā pūrvādidigbhāgena na yathā nātmato na satkāyataścalasītyādi |
T03n1146_030:24: rūpādīnāṃ darśanapathārūḍhānāṃ nirātmakānāmavidyamānatvenāvabodhādyathā tebhyo na calasi tathā gacchetyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_030:30: ṣaddoṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇāṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgatena samādhinā prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvan pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchaivaṃ śroṣyasītyavavādo dattaḥ syāt |
T03n1146_030:31: tathāhi samādhiguṇeṣṭhabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā yogina śraddhayā chandaḥ samutpadyate |
T03n1146_030:43: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittamālambane niṣprakampamanabhisaṃskāravāhi pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
T03n1146_030:52: parijñāyai prahāṇāya punaḥ sākṣāt kriyāṃ prati |
T03n1146_030:54: iti vacanādyenākāreṇa pratibhāsate sa ghaṭādyākāraḥ kalpitasvabhāvastasya parijñānārthaṃ śūnyatāsamādhiruktaḥ |
T03n1146_030:55: kalpito hi svabhāvaḥ parijñeyo bhrāntimātreṇa sattvāt |
T03n1146_030:56: sarvadharmābhiniveśaviviktamāyopamajñānasya sākṣāt kriyārthamānimittaḥ samādhiḥ yogisaṃvṛtyā tathyārūpasya pariniṣpannasyādhigantavyasvabhāvatvātpudgaladharmābhiniveśasya paratantrasya prahāṇārthamapraṇihitaḥ samādhiḥ |
T03n1146_030:62: tatra sambhārabhūmau puṇyasambhāropārjanārthaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānadhimukticaryābhūmau tu jñānasambhārātmakanirvedhabhāgīyotpādanārthaṃ yathākramamanutpādājātāniruddhābhāvān sarvadharmān deśayantītyarthaḥ |
T03n1146_030:68: aṣṭaṣaṣṭayāṃ trīsahastraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samanvitamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā na cittasyānyathātvaṃ kāryamityādi
T03n1146_030:84: punaruktadeśanāyāḥ prāguktaṃ prayojanaṃ saptavarṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpannamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvamupalabhya na śithilavīryeṇa bhāvyamityāha
T03n1146_030:86: prativāṇiriti pratikulatā kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti sambhārabhūmau |
T03n1146_030:92: pi āryadharmodgatavimokṣadarśanaśaktivaikalyādāryadharmodgatasyaivādhiṣṭhānāttatparipācanopāyakauśalātiśayādadarśanenāryadharmodgatavimokṣaprabhāvitagandhavatyā nagaryāḥ kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti nirghoṣo mayā na pṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_030:96: pūrvoktadharmapudgalanairātmyāvavādādabhyārabdhaprajñāpāramitāmanaskāratvācca sambhārabhūmāveva cittakarmaṇyatāyāṃ satyāṃ dharmasroto nāma samādhiṃ
T03n1146_030:121: niṣṭhāntatvena sthāpitaśabdasya na pūrvanipāto lakṣaṇasya vyabhicārāt |
T03n1146_030:130: vāriṇa iti kṛtpratyaye kartari sambandhavivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī |
T03n1146_030:143: tasyāṃ citrīkāraḥ prasādastenānugataṃ yuktaṃ suṣṭhu gatamavabuddhaṃ śrutaṃ cittaṃ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ yeṣāṃ te yathoktāsteṣāṃ pūrvakarmavipākeneti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_030:145: gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāmabhilakṣyabhūtasthānasya śṛṅgāṭakasya madhya iti sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_030:153: iti nyāyenātmātmīyagrahābhiniveśapūrvakatvena sarva eva rāgādayaḥ kleśā duḥkhavipākahetavo bhavanti |
T03n1146_030:154: māyopamasarvadharmabhāvanayā punaḥ sattvavinayanamupādāya kleśavaśitvalābhenāśayaviśeṣānmāyāpuruṣasyeva kāmaparibhogo jinātmajānāṃ na doṣakṛttathā
T03n1146_030:159: iti vacanāt kāmaparibhogo bodhisattvānāṃ na doṣakṛt |
T03n1146_030:168: avicchinnaṃ cirakālaprārthitaprāptyupāyaśravaṇena mṛdumadhyādhimātrasukhasaumanasya lābhādyathākramaṃ tuṣṭa ityādi ṣaṭpadāni |
T03n1146_030:178: yasmin samādhau vyavasthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ māyopamatvādinā vyavalokayati,
T03n1146_030:185: āśayapariśuddhibalādeva prathamabhūmyadhigamārthaṃ samāhitāvasthāyāṃ tathāgatapratibhāsapūrvako vistareṇāvavādo jāta ityāha |
T03n1146_030:187: pramuditādibhūmau buddhaśatādikaṃ paśyatīti pradeśāntare yadvacanaṃ tadavaśyaṃbhāvitveneti pratipattavyam |
T03n1146_030:190: nanu dvayostathāgatayorekasmin lokadhātau sambhavavirodhāt kathamevamiti cet |
T03n1146_030:191: lokadhātvantare sthitānaprameyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati smetyeke |
T03n1146_030:192: yatkhalvidamapūrvācaramau dvau tathāgatau loke notpadyeyātāmiti janmaniṣedhanaṃ tacchāsanapravṛttimabhiprāyīkṛtyoktamato na dvayostathāgatayoryugapalloke śāsanaṃ pravartata ityayamevārthastatra santiṣṭhate |
T03n1146_030:193: yasmātparamārthaparatantrotpattitveneyameva tayorutpattiryaduta śāsanapravṛttirevañca satīha lokadhātusthāneva samānābhiprāyatvena vihitaikaśāsanakramānavikalakāraṇatvādyugapadutpannānekatathāgatān paśyati smetyapare |
T03n1146_030:198: puṇyavadbhiḥ punaryathā puṇyamalpīyāṃso bhūyāṃso vā samupalabhyanta ityanye |
T03n1146_030:222: āśayamahattvādeva mahatī pūjā na tu dravyamahatvenetyabhiprāyādyadvikalpitaṃ taddehītyuktavān |
T03n1146_030:247: trādarotpādanārthaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ saptabhirbandhanairbaddhā saptasu granthisthāneṣu saptabhiḥ svanāmamudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitetyeke |
T03n1146_031:8: kintveṣāmeva yā tathatā sā tathāgata ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_031:12: tatra tu parṣanmaṇḍale bahavo bhinnamatayaḥ sanniṣaṇā iti |
T03n1146_031:15: mī dṛṣṭāntā na samuccayenetyevaṃ sarvatrādhikavacane parihāraṃ varṇayanti |
T03n1146_031:16: tathā dṛṣṭāntasyaiva kathanātpratītyasamutpannatvādiko hetuḥ prājñairabhyūhanānnokta iti |
T03n1146_031:29: na hi tathāgato rūpakāyato draṣṭavya iti kalpitasyaikāntaśūnyatvānna rūpaskandhātmakastathāgataḥ |
T03n1146_031:36: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ supta ityādi |
T03n1146_031:39: janmanyanyatra tasmin vā tadā kālāntare'pi vā ||
T03n1146_031:40: taddeśo'nyadeśo vā svapnajñānasya gocaro na bhavatyanyākārajñānasyānyālambane'
T03n1146_031:52: śīlādapi varaṃ bhraṃśo na tu dṛṣṭeḥ kadācana |
T03n1146_031:53: śīlena gamyate svargo dṛṣṭyā yāti paraṃ padam ||
T03n1146_031:54: iti nyāyena ta eva māyopamadharmatādhimuktā bhagavataḥ śiṣyāḥ |
T03n1146_031:55: kalpitādipadārthatrayatattvarūpaniṣedhe sati nāstyeva tathāgata iti mandadhījanāśaṅkāmapākurvan pratītyasamutpannastathāgato'stītyāha |
T03n1146_031:59: ti vacanāt sādhāraṇaṃ sattvānāṃ śubhaṃ karma pratītya saṃvṛtyā kuśalamūlahetukatvānna ca tānyahetukāni,
T03n1146_031:61: na cāhetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāya iti buddhavineyānāmeva sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlavaśena niṣpattigamanānnāhetukaḥ kāyaḥ |
T03n1146_031:75: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścaratītyādinā |
T03n1146_031:77: sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyata ityanenāpi prājñaptikaśabdanirdeśena sāmagyāstāttvikaṃ janakasvabhāvaṃ nirasyati |
T03n1146_031:79: anekaṃ kāraṇamekaṃ kāryaṃ karotyanekaṃ vā tathaikamapi kāraṇamanekamekaṃ vā kāryaṃ kuryāditi catvāro vikalpāḥ |
T03n1146_031:81: pi kāryasya bhedābhāvānna kāraṇabhedo bhedakaḥ kāryasya syāt |
T03n1146_031:85: evañca sati bhedābhedāvyatirekādviśvasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syādahetoranyānapekṣaṇāt |
T03n1146_031:86: nanu sāmagrī janayitrī kāryasya tasyāśca bhedābhedānuvidhānacaturāvimāvanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā kāryasya bhedābhedāvataḥ kathaṃ tāvahetukau bhaviṣyata iti cet |
T03n1146_031:88: tathā hi na sāmagrī nāmānyā kācana samagrebhyaḥ kintarhi samagrā eva bhāvāḥ sāmagrīśabdavācyāḥ te ca parasparavyāvṛttasvabhāvāścakṣurādayo bhinnāḥ santo yadyekamevābhinnaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kāryamupajanayituṃ śaktāstadā sāmagryantarāntaḥpātino'
T03n1146_031:89: pi bhāvāḥ samagrāḥ kimiti cakṣurvijñānasyopajananaṃ na kuryuḥ |
T03n1146_031:92: pi parasparaṃ bhinnasvabhāvāḥ kathaṃ janayantīti vaktavyam |
T03n1146_031:100: kintu yadekasya tajjanakaṃ rūpaṃ tadanyasya nāstyanyo'
T03n1146_031:102: ataḥ svarūpājjanakādvyāvṛttyasiddheryathāsvaṃ bhinnāśca janakāśca svabhāveneti ko'
T03n1146_031:104: tathā hyekasmājjanakādvyāvartamānastadrūpo na syānna tvatatkāryastenaiva ca tatkāryaṃ kartavyaṃ nānyeneti ko'
T03n1146_031:105: tra nyāya iti yadyevamekenaiva tatkāryaṃ kṛtamiti kimapareṣāṃ tatkāryakaraṇe prayojanam |
T03n1146_031:107: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yato'
T03n1146_031:111: evaṃ tarhyekena hetunā yaḥ kāryasya svabhāvo janyate sa evāpareṇeti prāptam |
T03n1146_031:113: kāraṇabhedo visadṛśasyābhinnasa kāryasyotpādakatvena bhedako na syāt |
T03n1146_031:115: pi cakṣurādaya eva kenacitsvabhāvātiśayena cakṣurvijñānajanane niyatā nāpare kṣityādayaḥ |
T03n1146_031:116: tathā hi teṣāmeva cakṣurādīnāṃ sa svabhāvātiśayo nāpareṣām |
T03n1146_031:123: evaṃ vilakṣaṇakāraṇakalāpādvilakṣaṇamavilakṣaṇāccāvilakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ jāyata ityetāvataivāṃśena hetubhedābhedābhyāṃ phalasya bhedābhedāvuktāviti
T03n1146_031:125: yasmādya evobhayaniścitavācī hetuḥ sa eva sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇañceti nyāyādabhedāviśeṣe'
T03n1146_031:126: pi hetudharmasāmarthyādyathā na sarvaṃ sarvasādhakaṃ tadvadbhedāviśeṣe'
T03n1146_031:127: pi na sarvaṃ sarvasādhakamityevasabhyupagatahetuphalasambandhaṃ sāṃkhyādikaṃ pratyucyamānaṃ śobhāmādhatte |
T03n1146_031:128: vastutattvato hetuphalabhāvāpavādī mādhyamikastaṃ pratisvabhāvātiśayasteṣāṃ svahetoriti hetudharmasāmarthyalakṣaṇo heturasiddhaḥ svapakṣasiddhaye siddhavat kathamupādīyate |
T03n1146_031:133: ayathādarśanaṃ tarhi niṣedha iti vyaktamidaṃ kūrmaromotpāṭanam |
T03n1146_031:135: na tattvataḥ pramāṇasahāyatvenāpramāṇasahāyasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasyābhyu pagamātkathaṃ nāyathādarśanamabhyupagamaḥ |
T03n1146_031:139: yastu pramāṇopapannasvarūpaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo varṇyate sa pratyakṣasamādhigamyo na bhavati nirvikalpakatvena pratyakṣasya pramāṇopapannasvarūpāvadhāraṇāsāmarthyavaikalyāt
T03n1146_031:140: na ca vastupratibhāsanādeva tadavyatiriktatathāvidhasvarūpasya pratibhāsanamiti yuktaṃ vaktumatathāvidhasvarūpasyāpi keśoṇḍūkādeḥ pratibhāsanāt
T03n1146_031:148: yāvatā vicāravimardāsahiṣṇutvenāvicāraikaramyaṃ pūrvapūrvasvakāraṇaṃ samāśrityottarottaramīdṛśaṃ pratiniyata deśakālādisatkāryaṃ pravartate
T03n1146_031:149: ata eva ca saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇa vaikalyācchaśaviṣāṇādīnāmanutpattiḥ |
T03n1146_031:155: yathā ca bādhā yathādarśanaṃ tathā nyāyābhāvāt |
T03n1146_031:156: atha matamanekameva kāraṇamanekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi dvitīyaḥ pakṣo'
T03n1146_031:158: kāraṇasvabhāvaviśeṣasya kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣe vyāpriyamāṇatvena kārye kāraṇavyāpāraviracitānāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣāṇāmasaṃkīrṇatvāt |
T03n1146_031:162: pi vastutaḥ kāryasya nirvibhaktarūpasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavantīti na kāraṇabhede'
T03n1146_031:168: athā bhedastebhyo na siddhastathā ca nānekatvaṃ vijñānasya bhaviṣyatīti cet |
T03n1146_031:170: bhyupagamyamāne tadvijñānaṃ nirhetukameva syātkāraṇavyāpārasya vijñānādanyatropalambhātmatādiṣūpayogādevaṃ ca nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā bhavediti doṣaḥ |
T03n1146_031:172: tathā ca satyupalambhātmatādīnāṃ parasparato bhedo na syādekavijñānasvarūpatvādvijñānasvātmavat |
T03n1146_031:179: yadyevaṃ te viśeṣāḥ kalpanoparacitatvena vyomotpalādaya iva na hetuvyāpāramapekṣanta iti kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhavantīti na yuktamabhidhātum |
T03n1146_031:180: athāpekṣanta iti nirbandhastathā sati kalpanāśilpighaṭiteṣṭhevopalambhātmatādiṣu kāraṇavyāpāro vyavasthāpyamānaḥ kālpanika eva bhūtārtho na syādevañca kāryamahetukaṃ kāraṇavyāpārasya kalpitasvabhāveṣūpayogāt |
T03n1146_031:181: athoktadoṣabhayādabhinnamekaṃ kāryaṃ viśeṣāśca bhinnā na ca kāryātmavyatiriktā iti matiḥ |
T03n1146_031:182: evantarhi bhinnābhinnasvabhāvādhyāsitatvāddharmadharmiṇorvastutaḥ candratārakādivadbhedānna kevalaṃ vyatiriktameva sāmānyaṃ balādāpatati,
T03n1146_031:187: pi tasya sambhavo viṣayākārasvātmavadityeka eva kārye sambhavāsambhavau kāraṇe caikatra janakājanakau yugapattattvato virudhyate |
T03n1146_031:191: nahi sarvaṃ darśanaṃ bādhyamānamapi pramāṇena pramāṇaṃ,
T03n1146_031:193: athaikameva kāraṇamanekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi tṛtīyaḥ pakṣo'
T03n1146_031:196: ekasmādanekakāryotpattau na kāraṇābhedaḥ kāryasyābhedaka iti bhedo'
T03n1146_031:197: pi bhedasya na heturiti bhedābhedau viśvasyāhetukau syātām |
T03n1146_031:203: athānyenaivaṃ tarhi kāraṇābhedo na yuktimān na hyātmātiśayādanyo bhāvaḥ |
T03n1146_031:211: cakṣuryena svabhāvena cakṣuḥkṣaṇaṃ janayati kintenaiva cakṣurvijñānamapi |
T03n1146_031:213: evaṃ yena vā svabhāvena cakṣurvijñānaṃ janayati tenaiva cakṣurapi |
T03n1146_031:220: yadi vyatiriktau tadā tāvevārthakriyālakṣaṇatvādvastuno janakau vastunī syātāṃ cakṣustvavastu syādakiñcitkaratvāt |
T03n1146_031:227: atha mataṃ svahetorekajananasvabhāvamutpannaṃ kāraṇaṃ yathā kāryamekaṃ janayati tathā svahetorevotpannamanekaṃ janayatīti |
T03n1146_031:229: tathā hi yathaikasyānekajanakatvaṃ nirācikīrṣitaṃ tathaikajanakatvamapīti kiṃ mādhyamikaṃ pratyevamucyate |
T03n1146_031:231: syādetat,yadi bhedajanananiyatasvabhāvādabhedotpattiḥ na tarhi kāraṇasvabhāvānuvidhāyi kāryaṃ syādityahetukatvaprasaṅgaḥ yāvatā cakṣuṣaḥ sakāśādbhedajanananiyatasvabhāvāccakṣuṣo vijñānasya vā cakṣuḥsvabhāvasyodayātkathaṃ na bhedotpatiḥ |
T03n1146_031:232: tathāhi na kāraṇaṃ prati kāryaṃ parasparavilakṣaṇābhiḥ śaktibhiranugatamiti bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ karotītyapitu svabhāvāditi |
T03n1146_031:234: yaṃ svabhāvo nāma viśvarūpo yena prāguktānekaprakāravirodhe'
T03n1146_031:240: pratibhāsamānasya śāstrādyāśrayeṇa parikalpitarūpasya tattvotpattyādyākārasya niṣedhādyayā buddhyā tattvaṃ sandhriyate,
T03n1146_031:241: yasyāṃ vā buddhau sā tādṛśī lokapratītiḥ saṃvṛtiriṣṭā tayā sarvamidaṃ pratīyamānasvarūpaṃ viśvaṃ satyaṃ,
T03n1146_031:243: ato yathādarśanaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo durnivārastathā ca sati yat kaiścidevaṃ dūṣaṇamucyate'
T03n1146_031:244: bhāvaḥ saṃvṛtirutpādo bhāva iti yugapadarthakriyāyāṃ yogyamayogyaṃ vastvabhyupagatam |
T03n1146_031:245: athotpādaḥ saṃvṛtistadā saṃvṛtyotpāda ityasya vākyasyotpattyotpāda ityabhyupagamānna kiñcidniṣṭamāpatitam |
T03n1146_031:246: tathānutpādaḥ paramārtha ityevaṃ paramārthena notpāda ityasyānutpādena notpāda ityarthaḥ |
T03n1146_031:249: athaikameva kāraṇa mekaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāditi caturthaḥ pakṣo'
T03n1146_031:255: bhyupagamyamāne cakṣurādijātyucchedenaikasmājjñānakṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ na cakṣurādayo nāpi jñānamiti tadevāndhatvādikamanāyāsena jagataḥ prāptam |
T03n1146_031:258: tathā cāmī sarve rūpādayo bhāvā iti svabhāvahetuḥ |
T03n1146_031:259: yathādarśanaṃ pratītyotpādadarśanānnāsiddho hetuḥ sapakṣe bhāvānna viruddhaḥ pūrvaprabandhena vipakṣe bādhakapramāṇopadarśanādanaikāntikaśca na bhavatītyamunā nyāyena pratyayādhīnavṛttitvādyathāśabdaḥ prājñaptikastathā bhagavatāṃ kāyo vyavasthāpita iti |
T03n1146_031:264: tasmādbhāvādyabhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsaṃ tadvirodhinaiḥsvābhāvyajñānātprahāya tanmūlaṃ sakalaṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ krameṇāpākurvāṇaḥ prathamādibhūmau niyato bhaviṣyasyanuttarabodhāvityartha |
T03n1146_031:267: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartata iti |
T03n1146_031:274: na kṛpā mandatedānīṃ na ca me dharmamatsaraḥ |
T03n1146_031:276: na ca me niṣṭhitaṃ śāstraṃ tarkayāmi na cāntikāt |
T03n1146_031:277: ājñātuṃ na ca me śaktāḥ vineyā na ca sādarāḥ ||
T03n1146_031:280: iti nyāyādāryasadāpraruditasya pariśuddhāśayatājijñāsārthaṃ saptavarṣāṇi samāpanna eva sthita ityeke |
T03n1146_031:291: yadyapi sarva eva sarvadharmasamatādayo deśanāprakārā dharmanairātmyadyotakatvena tulyāstathāpi pauruṣeyatvādvakturabhiprāyaṃ kāryatayā sūtrayeyuramī
T03n1146_031:299: tadanantaraṃ ca sambhārāṣṭādhimuktibodhisattvatathāgatabhūmiṣu dharmakāyasya yathābhavyaṃ vineyajanapratiṣṭhāpanakarmaparidīpanārthaṃ sarvadharmānupalabdhitayetyādi padacatuṣṭayaṃ veditavyamityayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ |
T03n1146_031:304: yasmin samādhau vyavasthitaḥ sarvadharmasamatāṃ pratipadyate sa sarvadharmasamatā nāmaḥ samādhirevaṃ sarvadharmaviviktaśca nāma samādhirityādi vācyam |
T03n1146_031:306: tathā hi prathamena kalpāsaṃkhyeyena sambhārabhūmimārabhya yāvatprathamā bhūmirniṣpadyate dvitīyena tu vimalābhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bhūmiḥ,
T03n1146_031:307: tṛtīyena punaḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyenācalābhūmimārabhya yāvadbuddhabhūmirityevaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbuddhatvamadhigamyata iti yathārutameva sūtraṃ virudhyate |
T03n1146_031:308: trikasāmānyāt tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairityuktaṃ na punaḥ paramārthata ityevaṃ neyārthasūtravyākhyāne nitarāmeva virodhaḥ |
T03n1146_031:311: tadanu pramuditābhūmimupādāya yāvaddharmameghāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ pratyekaṃ tribhistribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbodhisattvo niṣpādya samantaprabhāṃ buddhabhūmimāsādayatītyevaṃ trayastriṃśatā kalpāsaṃkhyeyairbuddhatvaṃ prāpyata ityācāryavasubandhupādāḥ |
T03n1146_031:314: atra samādhyabhinirhāropāyā eva samādhimukhāni na tu samādhayaḥ "
T03n1146_032:16: evaṃ saṃkṣiptavistararucisattvānugraheṇa sarvākārajñatādayaḥ sakāritradharmakāyāvasānāḥ sarva evāṣṭau padārthāḥ samupajātā bhavanti |
T03n1146_032:24: tatastasya phalamiti trisarvajñatāvipāko dharmakāyaḥ sakāritra ityamunā ṣaṭprakāreṇārthasaṅgraheṇa saṃkṣiptamadhyarucisattvānukampayā pūrvavadiyaṃ jinajananī vyākhyeyā |
T03n1146_032:33: tadanu dharmakāyaḥ sakarmaphalamityevaṃ trividhenārthasaṅgraheṇa saṃkṣiptasaṃkṣeparucisattvānurodhena tathaiveyaṃ bhagavatī vyākhyeyā |
T03n1146_032:38: sānnidhyamātratastasya puṃsaścintāmaṇeriva niḥsaranti yathākāmaṃ kudryādibhyo deśanā iti nyāyena bhavyavineyajanadaiśikatvādhyavasāyādimanantaroditamakhilaṃ prajñāpāramitāsūtraratnatattvamavocaduktavān bhagavānāttamanā hṛṣṭacitaḥ |
T03n1146_032:41: te cāryamaitreyapramukhā mahābodhisattvā vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhādāttamanaso bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti sambandhaḥ |
T03n1146_032:45: devamānuṣāsuragandharvaiḥ saha vartata iti sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvo lokaḥ |
T03n1146_032:51: ete sarve'pi saddharmaśravaṇānnānyat svahitaṃ parahitaṃ ca gurutaramupalabdhavantaḥ,
T03n1146_032:52: ataḥ pramodakāraṇasadbhāvāt saṃjātapramodātiśayāḥ santo bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ sādhu bhagavan parameśvara karuṇāmayamūrte subhāṣitamidaṃ yuṣmākaṃ
T03n1146_032:69: saṃbuddhaiḥ sasutairiyaṃ suvivṛtā mātā kka vā saṃsthitā
T03n1146_032:72: mabhyuhyaiva midaṃ kṛtaṃ na viduṣāṃ yuktaṃ samullaṅghitum ||
T03n1146_032:76: tasmādeva tathāvidhān prati na naḥ sūkṣmāpi kācidvyathā ||
T03n1146_032:91: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
T03n1146_032:92: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
